Sarutobi explains how she'd essentially be under Naruto's control
151112222222222222211221231222133322122.content:
"Lord Hiashi, to what do I owe this visit?" Sarutobi said as he saw Hiashi Hyuga enter the office, his daughter Hinata and several retainers in tow.

"I came here to disown my daughter Hinata," Hiashi said matter-of-factly, causing Hinata to cringe at the cold reply.

"May I ask the reason?"

"She hasn't been living up to her full potential as a Hyuga heiress. During all of our sparring sessions, she has exponentially gotten worse and worse, and quite frankly, I'm sick of seeing her lack of progress. With your permission, as soon as I remove her from the Academy's roster, I would like to sell her to some other family, after applying the Caged Bird Seal to her, of course."

Sarutobi glared at Hiashi for a while, upset at the cold, unrepentant stance the Hyuga lord was taking. While thinking of an alternate solution, he said, "Perhaps there is an alternate solution."

"And what's that?"

"I am opposed to simply selling a little girl as a slave; that's inhumane."

"Then what would you..."

"I know of a certain boy who would benefit greatly from having someone his own age to hang out with. I would like to place Hinata under Naruto Uzumaki's care."

Hinata blushed as soon as she heard Naruto's name as Hiashi asked, "You mean the "demon brat" the town rants against?"

"Don't believe all the rumors you've been hearing. He's just lonely and wants people to treat him like any other person. My thinking is having someone his own age to interact with on a daily basis might set him on the right path. And who knows? You might find that Hinata will grow as a result of being in a different environment than she's used to."

Before Hiashi could ask further, Hinata shyly asked, "Um...do you really mean that I'll be with Naruto every day?"

Sarutobi smiled and said, "There are a few details you'd need to be familiar with, but yes."

"Wh...when would I start?"

"Hold on, little one. Before we get to that..."
151112222222222222211221231222133322122.title: Problems with the Hyuga

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"...I need to explain the circumstances under which you would be living."

"Um, okay," Hinata said as she sat in front of the Hokage's desk.

"You see, Naruto has a special seal that would have to be applied to you. This seal would force you to obey his every order as if it was the law. You'd lose most of your free will to Naruto. Is this something you can live with?"

Hinata stared at the floor for a while, then finally said, "Well, I'm not exactly happy with it. But, to be with Naruto, I'll do whatever it takes."

Sarutobi looked up at Hiashi and asked, "Is this an agreeable arrangement for you?"

Hiashi looked at Hinata, seeing the bliss her eyes were reflecting, and said, "I guess I can accept these terms. How soon can the arrangements be made?"

"Just let me get Naruto and bring him up to speed," Sarutobi said, alerting the ANBU hidden in his office to fetch Naruto.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Sarutobi explains how she'd essentially be ...

choices: Cut to Naruto and Hinata as they walk home
Cut to Naruto and Hinata talking to Mikoto as they arrive home
Cut to Mikoto as she waits for Naruto to return home
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"What'd you need me for, Gramps?" Naruto asked as he walked into the Hokage's office. Noticing the number of people already gathered, he asked, "Uh...I'm not in trouble, am I?"

"Of course not, Naruto," Sarutobi politely said. He then extended his arm to the empty chair in front of his desk and said, "Please have a seat."

Naruto nervously entered the office and took his seat, unnerved by the eyes that followed his every movement. He then noticed that the girl next to him didn't look in his direction, but he did notice a reddening under her eyes. "Is she sick or something?"

"Naruto," Sarutobi said, causing the boy to look up to him. "Do you recognize Hinata Hyuga?"

Naruto looked at the girl again and said, "Oh, yeah! She's in my class at the Academy! Nice to see you again!"

Hinata shyly looked at him and, smiling, said, "Um...you too, Naruto..."

"Well, Naruto, she's the reason you're here. There's an important decision you must make about her."

"What kind of decision?" Naruto asked, suddenly getting hot around the collar.

"Well, her father thinks she isn't living up to her potential, so is adamant about disowning her and selling her as a slave."

"What? That's not right!! A father should love his kids more than that!!"

"What would you know, Demon Brat? It's not like you have any parents!" one of the Hyuga's attendants retorted, despite Hiashi's motions to not say anything.

"That doesn't mean I don't know how a father and mother should act! They should encourage their kids, try to make them better people, not treat them like they mean nothing!!"

"Settle down, everyone!" Sarutobi's voice called out, prompting all eyes to turn back to him. "Naruto, the reason you are here is because you can give Hinata a better outcome that will be relatively the same as she had before."

"Really? How can..." Naruto was about to finish his question, but then the realization hit him like a ton of bricks. "No. No, no, no! You can't be suggesting that..."

"What's wrong with you using the Living Puppet seal to allow Hinata to continue her regular life here?"

"Because it won't be her regular life! She'll have to stay with me and forcibly obey me! I don't want her to..."

"...Naruto..."

Naruto turned to Hinata as she said, "I already know what this means for me...and I don't mind. I know you'll take good care of me. Please, don't say no!"

"The choice is yours, Naruto," Sarutobi said. "Do you grant the lady her wish or leave her to be sold as a slave?"

"Either way she's going to be a slave. What kind of choice is that?" Naruto weakly argued, though it came out as a whisper. As Sarutobi, Hinata, Hiashi and the Hyuga attendants continued to stare at the Uzumaki, he suddenly screamed, "DAMMIT!!!!" He then cut his index finger and began to draw the seal on Hinata's exposed skin. The one part he left out was the seal that sealed her memories. With a bright flash, Hinata slumped forward, only to be caught by Naruto. After a while, Hinata looked up to Naruto, who tearfully asked, "Are you okay, Hinata?"

With a smile, Hinata answered, "I...I think so, Master."

"How do I know this isn't some sort of prank by the child to deceive me?" Hiashi said. He knew some sort of jutsu was used, but he didn't sense that big a change in his daughter.

"Naruto, would you offer a demonstration for him?" Sarutobi asked.

Immediately, Naruto said, "Hinata, punch your father in the stomach for making me do this to you!"

Without hesitation, Hinata answered, "Right away, Master," and ran over to carry out her deed. The attendants were too slow to stop the girl from landing a hard hit on Hiashi's gut, causing him to cough and stumble to one knee.

"You bastard!" the attendants yelled. "We're gonna kill you for tha..."

"Wait!" Hiashi yelled, lifting himself up to stare at Naruto. "Lay a finger on him and you'll answer to the Hokage."

When the attendants uneasily stepped back in line, Sarutobi looked at Naruto and Hinata and said, "You two are dismissed. No doubt you have a lot to talk about."

"Sure. Come on, Hinata; let me take you to my home. We can talk along the way."

Hinata blushed as she answered, "A...As you wish, Master."

When the two children left, Sarutobi looked at Hiashi and said, "...be honest; you wanted that to happen, didn't you?"

Hiashi gave a faint smile as he said, "That girl needs someone who will encourage her more than I can. The elders of my clan expect excellence from the clan head's heir and Hanabi is already starting to show great progress. Being with Naruto will allow Hinata the chance to grow without having to be scrutinized by my clan's elders."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Naruto is hesitant, but agrees

choices: In the bathroom with Mikoto and Hinata
Follow Naruto as he receives Hinata's belongings
The next morning, with Naruto and Hinata going to the Academy
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Mikoto stood in the kitchen as she cooked dinner. She had just begun when ANBU arrived to take Naruto to the Hokage's office for an important matter. It had been an hour since he left, but she knew she could relax since the Hokage's ANBU would make sure he wasn't injured.

When the front door opened, Mikoto practically danced over to the doorway, saying, "Welcome home, Master? What did the Hoka..." Her welcome was cut short when she noticed a girl about Naruto's age finish opening the girl, then bowing while she said, "Welcome home, Master."

The girl, after welcoming Naruto home, looked at Mikoto and blushed, asking, "M...Master...who is this?"

"Master, what happened in the Hokage's office?" Mikoto asked.

Naruto brought the girl over and said, "Mikoto, this is Hinata, and she'll be living with us for a while. Hinata, this is Mikoto. I told you about her during out walk here."

Though still confused about the situation, Hinata held out her hand and said, "Um...nice to meet you, Miss Mikoto."

Mikoto accepted the handshake and said, "Likewise, Hinata, though please just call me Mikoto. From the sound of it, we're both in the same position as Master's slaves."

"Please, don't call yourselves that!" Naruto said. "As far as I'm concerned, we're all friends now! I don't want to see you as slaves!"

Mikoto bowed as she said, "Forgive me for using that word, Master!"

"It's okay, Mikoto," Naruto said. He then sniffed and said, "Is that dinner?"

Mikoto smiled and said, "Yes! I just need to set the table and we'll be able to eat."

"Do you need any help, Mikoto?" Hinata asked.

"Yes, would you mind putting the plates on the table?"

"Sure!"

Hinata grabbed the plates and went to the table. She then set the plates down, then looked confused. "Um...how do I do this?"

"Have you never set a table before?" Mikoto asked, keeping her tone neutral.

"Well, I...um..."

"Mikoto, Hinata came from a clan that had servants. She's probably never done this before," Naruto said as he walked over.

"Oh, I'm sorry; I didn't know."

"It's fine, Mikoto," Hinata said as she turned away from Naruto, feeling her face redden from her being defended by Naruto. Mikoto noticed and smirked to herself. "Oh, dear. Master's got himself an admirer," she thought.

After Mikoto finished setting the table, everyone sat down and ate dinner. Afterwards, Naruto said, "Mikoto and Hinata, you two get in the bathroom and get cleaned up. You can sleep in my bed tonight."

As Hinata's blush deepened, Mikoto asked, "But what about you, Master? Where will you sleep?"

"I'll sleep on the couch, and I don't want to hear any argument from you. Hinata, your Dad said he'll send over your clothes and other belongings over here tonight, so I'll take care of it when it gets here."

"Yes, Master," Mikoto and Hinata said in unison. After dinner, Mikoto taught Hinata how to dry dishes while she washed them. They then left for the bathroom while Naruto sat on the couch, waiting for Hinata's things.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Cut to Mikoto as she waits for Naruto to return

choices: Naruto interrupts their bath with a change of clothes for both of them
Mikoto and Hinata get ready for bed
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Hinata blushed as she sat in the bathtub, still not believing what she had just gone through in only three hours. Sitting on a stool next to her was another woman who had to obey Naruto's orders, whom she instantly felt a connection with even though it was their first time meeting. She eventually worked up the courage to ask, "Um...Miss Mikoto?"

Mikoto turned to Hinata and, with a kind smile, said, "I already told you; you can just call me Mikoto. What do you want, Hinata?"

"Oh, yeah, sorry. Um, when did you start serving Master?"

"Believe it or not, just this morning, although the seal was applied to me sometime last night."

"Last night...when the Uchiha clan was murdered."

"...so you've heard about it?"

"It's kind of hard not to. Everyone I saw on the street today wouldn't stop talking about it, and even the attendants at my old home were talking about it."

"You know all about it, then? Well, what are your thoughts about it?"

"Well, I don't think I like this Itachi person. I mean, killing his whole family just to test his power...I didn't think anyone would be capable of doing that. How did he turn out that way? Was he not loved enough?"

"I LOVED HIM LIKE I DID SASUKE! I STILL DON'T UNDERSTAND WHY HE DIDN'T THINK OF ANY OTHER..."

Mikoto quit her tirade before it became too big as she revealed a little too much information. She looked at the Hyuga girl, who just stared and said, "You're a survivor of the Uchiha Massacre, aren't you? That's why your being alive has been kept secret from the rest of the village." There was no hint of excitement or surprise in Hinata's voice, which troubled Mikoto a little.

Mikoto sighed as she said, "Technically, I'm dead. Itachi substituted me with a woman who looked just like me and killed her in my stead. His plans for me were to help Master grow, so he placed the Living Puppet seal on me in order to give him someone he could see as family. This essentially robbed Sasuke of his mother, and me of my only family left in the village."

Hinata sank into the tub as she softly cried, "I'm sorry, Miss Mikoto. I...I didn't mean to hurt your feelings..."

Hinata was surprised, however, when Mikoto entered the tub and wrapped the girl in a hug. "You have nothing to apologize for, Hinata. I'm just scared of this new life I have to live. Luckily, it seems Master wants to help us be as comfortable as possible, so I'm thankful to serve him. I imagine it's the same, or more, for you, right?"

Hinata blushed as she admitted, "Y...yes. He protected me from bullies a few years ago. Even though we didn't know each other then, Master came to my rescue and treated me like I, Hinata, mattered. That's...all I ever wanted from everyone!" Hinata finished her last sentence by crying into Mikoto's shoulder. Mikoto kept hugging her, letting the girl let out her emotions.

Hinata continued as she lessened her crying. "Ma...Master rarely puts himself above others and he just wants people to love him. None of his pranks were dangerous, so I don't know why people get upset at him. Why do people ignore Master and treat him like an outcast? I don't understand, Mikoto!"

"I don't know the answer to that, myself," Mikoto said. She then put her chin under Hinata's chin, lifting it to make the Hyuga girl look her in the eye. "However, let's not dwell on what we don't know and focus on what we do know. We are forever bound to Master, eager to do anything to make him happy. I have to stay indoors as much as possible, so my role is limited. Since you don't need to keep your identity a secret, you can go almost anywhere with Master and assist him however he can. It's an important task that can only be entrusted to you. Consider it your thanks to him for standing up for you when no one else could."

Hinata blushed heavily, but ultimately gave Mikoto a military-like salute and said, "I will do the best I can, Mikoto!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: In the bathroom with Mikoto and Hinata

choices: Cut to Naruto and Hinata at school the next day
Cut to Naruto and Hinata becoming Genin
Cut to Naruto and Hinata at the Chunin Exams
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Before Mikoto and Hinata could talk more, they heard a knock at the door. "Hinata; some of your dad's servants were here a minute ago and left your things here," Naruto said through the door. "I'm just leaving some clean clothes for you and Mikoto."

"Why not come in and give them to us, Master?" Mikoto asked, causing Hinata to blush wildly.

"I know you don't mind, but I don't want Hinata to feel uncomfortable. I'm just gonna leave them right outside the door. My bed's ready for you two when you want to go to sleep."

"Um...are you sure you don't want anything during the night, Master?" Hinata asked.

"I'll be asleep, Hinata; but thanks for your concern. Well, I'm heading to bed. Good night!"

The girls heard Naruto's footsteps walk away from the bathroom door. Mikoto got up and got the things while Hinata dried off. "Here, Hinata," Mikoto said as she handed her the clothes left for her. She then put on her own clothes.

Mikoto now wore a black nightie with a matching robe while Hinata wore pink pajamas with bunnies on them. Mikoto chuckled at how cute Hinata looked while Hinata blushed at how seductive Mikoto looked.

Mikoto and Hinata then snuck a peek at Naruto, who had thrown a blanket over himself on the couch and was now snoring loudly. Nervously, Hinata walked over and adjusted the blanket to cover more of him, then gave him a light kiss on his forehead.

As she returned to Naruto's bedroom, where she and Mikoto would be sleeping, Hinata heard Mikoto ask, "What was that about?"

Hinata blushed as she said, "I...I didn't want Master to be cold in the night. I was trying to keep him warm."

"Is that the reason for the kiss as well?"

"Wha...I, um...that was..."

Mikoto chuckled and said, "Don't get so flustered, Hinata. Master's a very sweet, kind person; I can understand why you'd feel that way about him."

"Um, Mikoto...could you not tell..."

"Your secret's safe with me, Hinata. If anyone should tell Master about your feelings, it ought to be you."

"Thanks," Hinata muttered before she yawned and collapsed on the bed. Mikoto set herself down on the bed herself before she heard the light snores from the young girl. Mikoto felt her smile grow wider as she tucked herself and Hinata under the covers, thinking, "I guess I'm in for quite the experience from now on. I wonder how Master and Hinata will get along from now on."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Naruto interrupts their bath with a change of c...

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Well, well! It's rare to see you here before the bell, Naruto," Iruka Umino commented as he saw Naruto and Hinata walking in the classroom.

"Yeah, well I figured if I want to be Hokage, I need to take my studies seriously," Naruto said.

"That's the spirit, Naruto," Iruka said. He then looked at Hinata and asked, "Why are you here with Naruto, though? I thought your house was on the other side of the village."

Hinata said, "Um...I was out walking and...um..."

"I found her and she asked me to escort her to school," Naruto said quickly, causing Hinata to blush.

Iruka kept a wary eye on the two children, but ultimately said, "If you say so. Now get to your seats; class is going to start soon."

"Yes, Iruka-sensei," Naruto and Hinata said as they bowed and took their seats. Before Hinata could sit down in her usual spot, though, Iruka told her, "Hold on, Hinata. There's been a change in seating arrangements. You're sitting next to Naruto from now on."

"What? Bu...but when..."

"Don't look at me, I just got the news a few minutes ago."

Blushing, Hinata went and sat next to Naruto. She then whispered to Naruto, "Do...do you think Lord Hokage did this, Master?"

"It wouldn't surprise me," Naruto whispered back. "He's always tried to cause as little fuss as possible in the village. Also, don't call me Master!"

"I...I can't. Ever since the seal was put on me, I can't say your name. It just comes out as Master."

Naruto grumbled a bit and said, "Okay, then. Try to not address me by name when we're in public, okay?"

Though looking a little depressed, Hinata nodded. Both she and Naruto then turned to the front of the class as Iruka began his lesson.

After a few hours, lunch and playtime had started. Naruto and Hinata sat under a tree as they ate the lunch Mikoto had prepared for them both. Naruto ate his rather quickly, but gagged when he felt all the vegetables go down his throat. "Ugh, why are there vegetables in here?!"

"Maybe because you need a more balanced diet," Hinata politely suggested. "You do need to keep up a healthy lifestyle if you're going to perform at your best."

Naruto groaned more, but ultimately said, "Yeah, you're probably right. Thanks, Hinata."

Hinata blushed and said, "Um...thank you, Ma..."

"Hey, everybody; check it out! Demon kid's got a girlfriend!!"

Naruto looked up to see a group of kids who enjoyed bullying him. They made their way over to the two with wicked sneers on their faces. Two boys then grabbed Hinata while the others ganged up on Naruto. "Hey, what are you..." was all Naruto could get out before the leader of the bullies started beating him up.

"Maybe if I beat you, your girlfriend will want to be mine instead!" the leader said as he continued punching and kicking Naruto.

"Stop it!" Naruto yelled as he struggled to fight back, only to be held back by the other bullies as their leader kept hurting him.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Cut to Naruto and Hinata at school the next day

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
As Naruto struggled to stand up, he noticed Hinata suddenly gain a blank expression on her face. "Oh, no!" he thought as the girl threw the boys holding her down over her head and on the ground. She then ran up and pushed the lead bully away from Naruto.

"Hey, what are you doing?" the bully asked.

Hinata assumed her battle stance and emotionlessly said, "Do not come anywhere near him again."

The bully was uneasy, but three more ran toward Hinata, one of them shouting, "Screw it, beat them both up!" No sooner had the words escaped his lips than he found himself sprawled out on the ground. Hinata had made quick work of him, then beat up the other two using her Gentle Fist.

The lead bully watched scared as Hinata turned to him and said, "I will not ask again. Go away and leave him alone." He tried to remain strong and stand his ground, but ran as soon as Hinata took one step towards him.

Hinata was about to run after him, but Naruto held her arm, saying, "Hinata, I'm fine. Don't worry about it."

At this, life returned to Hinata's eyes as she trapped him in a hug and cried, "Master, wha...what was that? What did I do?!"

"I'm sorry; I should have told you about that," Naruto said as he returned the hug. "If I'm ever in trouble, the seal will put you in a puppet-like state, forcing you to defend me no matter what."

"Tha...That's horrible! Why would..."

"I don't know. I'm okay, though, so you don't have to worry about me now."

Hinata, though keeping her blush, hugged Naruto tighter and cried, "I'm sorry, Master."

"Master?" Naruto and Hinata heard from behind them. Turning around, they saw...
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Hinata goes into Puppet mode and defends Naruto

choices: A rumor of Hinata being sold as a slave
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Naruto and Hinata were surprised to find an older girl watching them. The girl had brown hair arranged in two buns on top of her head and wore sleeveless shirt with dark pants. "Why did you call him Master?"

Hinata blushed as she said, "I...um...well, you see..."

"I used to spar with her until a couple of months ago!" Naruto hastily said. "Since she would always lose, she took to calling me Master. Isn't that right, Hinata?"

Hinata blushed and said, "R...Right, Master."

The girl continued watching them with a wary eye, but ultimately said, "Well, I guess that's a good reason." She then extended her arm and said, "Sorry, I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Tenten; nice to meet you!"

Naruto took the girl's hand and said, "I'm Naruto Uzumaki, and I'm gonna be the next Hokage! Believe it!!"

Hinata gingerly took Tenten's hand and said, "Um...Hinata Hyuga."

Tenten then turned to Hinata and asked, "Hey, Naruto, do you mind if I have a little girl-on-girl talk with Hinata for a bit?"

"Sure, I guess," Naruto said, getting back to his lunch.

When she and Tenten had gotten a few feet away from Naruto, Hinata asked, "What did you want to talk to me about?"

"Is it true?" Tenten asked, in a serious tone.

"Wha...What do you mean?"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Tenten, who had watched the whole fight

choices: "...actually, my apartment's not the best place to go to."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"I heard that your dad tried to sell you off as a slave," Tenten quietly said, causing Hinata to turn to her with a surprised look. "People are talking about it all over the village. They're saying you were about to be sold off, but Naruto took you into his home. Is that right?"

Hinata figured she hadn't heard about the seal, so cautiously said, "Y...Yeah, it's true."

"Oh, that's so romantic!" Tenten said, causing Hinata to blush. "I wish I had someone like that who cared for me! My parents are usually too busy to give me the time of day."

"Well, I'm sure you'll find someone who'll treat you better in the future."

"Thanks, Hinata," Tenten said as she walked back to Naruto. "You'd better treat this girl right, you hear me?"

"Um, sure," Naruto said, unaware of the conversation the girls had.

"Say, do you mind if I come over to your apartment sometime?" Tenten asked, catching Naruto off guard. "I really want to hang out with you two."

Naruto was concerned about Tenten finding out about Hinata and Mikoto's predicament, if she hadn't already, so said, "Um..."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: A rumor of Hinata being sold as a slave

choices: Naruto and Hinata talk about Tenten with Mikoto
Flash forward to Tenten going to Naruto's apartment.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"A week? Why so long?" Tenten asked.

"Well, it's a little cluttered now, and I want to have a chance to clean up before I show anyone else. Hinata said she doesn't mind, but I still want to leave a good impression on any future guests! Also, there's the issue of what to cook and what we'll be doing; I've just got to sort out my priorities."

Tenten smiled and said, "Okay, I can buy that." She then pulled out a piece of paper, wrote down something and, giving it to Naruto, said, "Here's a list of my favorite food and games. I hope it will help you out in your planning."

"Thanks, Tenten!" Naruto said, flashing her a toothy grin.

Tenten smiled back and said, "Well, see you later!"

"Yeah, seeya!" Naruto called out while Hinata politely waved.

The rest of the day seemed to fly by quickly for Naruto and Hinata. Since they were in the same classes, there was rarely a need to worry about each other. Hinata, though, found herself feeling odd due to their encounter with Tenten.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: "...sure, how about in a week?"

choices: Mikoto teaches Naruto and Hinata how to clean.
One week later, hanging out with Tenten
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Welcome home, Master," Mikoto said as she saw him enter the door. She then knelt down and said, "Are you okay? I sensed you were in trouble earlier and was about to go help you!"

"Yeah, I'm fine. A bunch of bullies were trying to pick a fight with me, but Hinata scared them off."

"What?" Mikoto looked at the girl who stood behind Naruto. Before she could ask what happened, Hinata started to silently shed tears while Naruto turned to comfort her. Believing she could put the pieces together, she instead changed the subject and asked, "So, did anything else exciting happen today?"

"Well, yeah. Hinata and I may have made a new friend."

"Really? That's wonderful! Who is it?"

"She said her name was Tenten," Hinata answered. "She said she wants to come over in a week to hang out."

Mikoto could sense a tinge of jealousy in the girl's voice, but kept her thoughts to herself as she said, "So, do we need to do anything to prepare?"

"Actually, we need to get a few food items and party games."

"I can get those while I go shopping tomorrow, Master."

"But I thought that..."

"One of Lord Hokage's ANBU was here earlier and showed me a market where I could go and not be recognized by anyone important. I can get anything you want there, Master."

"Great! Hinata, would you mind helping me clean up the apartment?"

"Yes, Master; I would love to!"

"Pardon me, but do either of you know how to clean up properly?" Mikoto asked.

"Um, well, I thought you just moved a broom across the floor until you got bored."

"I...I don't know all that much, myself."

Mikoto sighed and said, "I guess I'll have to teach you how to clean up after yourselves."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Naruto and Hinata talk about Tenten with Mikoto

choices: Tenten overheard their conversation and agrees to keep the secret
Tenten found the scroll with the Living Puppet seal and wants answers
Tenten doesn't know a thing and continues hanging out with Naruto and Hinata
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
A knock on the door alerted Naruto to Tenten's arrival. He went to open the door, but then whispered to Hinata and Mikoto, "Okay, remember; do not call me Master while Tenten is here!"

"Just like when we're at school," Hinata said, struggling to prevent herself saying Master.

"It might be hard, but I'll manage," Mikoto said.

Naruto then breathed a deep breath and opened the door. "Hey! Nice to see you, Tenten! Please come in!!"

"Thanks," Tenten said as she walked in. She then looked at Hinata and said, "Hey, Hinata; how's it going?"

"It's been...okay, Tenten," Hinata said, accepting the girl's handshake.

Tenten then turned to Mikoto and asked, "Um...hi, Ma'am."

Before Naruto could explain, Mikoto smiled and said, "My name is Naomi, and I've been housekeeping here under Lord Hokage's orders. For today, though, I will be catering to your every whim, Mistress."

Naruto and Hinata internally panicked at Mikoto's lie, and worried that Tenten would see through it easily. However, Tenten just laughed and said, "Oh, that's awesome! You've got the royal treatment here, Naruto."

"Yeah, I guess," Naruto agreed, a nervous chuckle.

"So, you got any food ready?"

"There are snacks ready for you on the table, Mistress," Mikoto said, bowing and directing Tenten's attention toward the mini-buffet on the table in the dining room. As she looked, she grew a wide smile as she saw a bowl full of a mix of nuts and berries. "Hey, thanks a lot! This is my favorite!!" Tenten told Naruto as she picked up the bowl and started wolfing down the contents.

"Anything for a friend!" Naruto said with a smile, while Hinata nodded silently.

(2 hours later)

"What? Again?!" Naruto screamed.

"I guess shogi isn't really your game, huh Naruto?" Tenten said.

"One more go!" Naruto said.

"Sorry, but I need to take care of some personal business," Tenten said as she got up. She turned to Mikoto and asked, "Where's the bathroom, Naomi?"

"Right this way, Mistress," Mikoto said. "It's the room on the right."

"What's on the left?"

"That would be Master's bedroom, so you probably don't want to go in there."

"Okay. Thanks!" Tenten said as she disappeared behind the bathroom door.

Naruto collapsed on his chair and exhaled deeply. He then grinned and said, "I can't believe how well this is going! I'm having so much fun!"

"It is nice to have someone else to play with you, Master," Mikoto said. "Plus, I haven't seen you go out to prank anyone lately."

"That's because I finally have a family with you and Hinata," Naruto said, causing Mikoto and Hinata to blush. "No matter how twisted the circumstances were that bound us together, I'm thankful to be able to have you two in my lives."

"Th...Thank you, Master," Hinata muttered.

"Maybe we should keep our voices down," Mikoto silently suggested. "I don't think our guest would be too thrilled to learn Hinata and I are actually bound to your will."

As soon as Naruto agreed, Tenten returned.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: One week later, hanging out with Tenten

choices: Mikoto is moved by Naruto's optimism
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Tenten sat down next to Naruto and said, "So, both Naomi and Hinata call you Master, but for two different reasons?"

Naruto said, "Yeah, of course!"

"Funny, because you mentioned something about twisted circumstances binding you three together."

Hinata and Mikoto stared at Tenten with a definite glare as Naruto said, "What? When did I..."

"When you were talking to Hinata and "Naomi," if that really is her name."

"How much did you hear?" Mikoto asked.

"Enough to know Naruto was lying to me this whole time."

Before Naruto could defend himself, Tenten said, "Naruto, I really do want to believe you're a great guy and be your friend, but you need to be honest with me. What happened between you, Hinata and Naomi?"

Naruto sighed and said, "Well, first off, Naomi's real name is Mikoto."

"Master, don't!"

"Don't stop me, Mikoto. I want to do this."

When Mikoto silently nodded, Naruto proceeded to tell Tenten the story of how she and Hinata came to live with him. As he was talking, Tenten kept looking at Mikoto and Hinata. Their somber expressions told her Naruto's story was true.

"Please don't tell anyone about this!" Naruto pleaded. "I probably shouldn't have told you, but I don't want to lose your friendship!"

"So those stories you made up for them...they were so no one would know the truth," Tenten said.

"Please, Tenten, Master has been very kind to both me and Mikoto! Don't get him in trouble with everyone!!"

Tenten smiled and said, "Are you kidding? My lips are sealed!" When everyone looked at her in surprise, Tenten looked at Naruto and said, "Naruto, what you did for these two is the sweetest, most selfless thing I've ever heard in my life! I'd be crazy to strain our friendship over that. For however long it may be, I'll keep this secret; that I'll swear on my life!"

Naruto smiled and said, "Thanks, Tenten."

After a few more games, Tenten got up and said, "Well, this was fun, but I need to get going. I'm afraid my mom'll tear the village apart looking for me if I don't get back."

"Do you think we could hang out again?" Naruto asked.

"Hm...maybe. Let's talk about it over ramen in a couple of days."

"Make it Ichiraku's Ramen! Theirs is the best!!"

Tenten giggled and said, "I'll keep that in mind. See you later!"

When Tenten left, Naruto let out an excited, "YEAH! I've got another friend!!"

"Another, Master?" Mikoto asked.

"Yeah! There's the Old Man, Iruka-sensei, Mr. Teuchi, his daughter Ayame, you, Hinata, and now Tenten! I'm the luckiest guy in the world!"

"Um, Master, what about Choji, Shikamaru and Kiba?" Hinata asked.

"Well, we don't know each other that well. I might consider them my friends in time."

"I'm happy for you, Master," Mikoto said, wiping a tear from her eye.

"Is something wrong Mikoto?" Naruto asked.

"Well, it's just..."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Tenten overheard their conversation

choices: Mikoto talks to Naruto about his parents
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"...I really wish Sasuke will find as great a friend as you, Master," Mikoto said, tears starting to form in her eyes.

"You really miss him, don't you?" Naruto asked.

"It's been over a month since I've seen him last. I know Lord Hokage wants to cover up my existence, but..." Mikoto fell to her knees and started crying. "I just miss him so much I want to run out to hug him once more!"

Mikoto cried so much she didn't notice as Naruto came up and hugged her. "Maybe someday you'll get the chance. I know Itachi must have had some reason for doing this to you and Sasuke. If I can, I'll find out what it is."

Mikoto was about to object, but Hinata joined Naruto in hugging her. "I...I think you should be grateful for the life you have. If Itachi didn't save you, then you would never have the chance to see Sasuke again. At least this way, you still have the chance. Besides, Master is all the better for having met you...as am I."

Mikoto was so moved that she hugged the two children back. "Thank you, Hinata, Master. I love you!"

"I love you too, Mom."

Mikoto and Hinata both looked at Naruto with confused looks as he blushed and said, "Oh, um, I mean, yes, Mikoto; I love you too!"

"No, you called her Mom. Why?" Hinata asked.

"What happened to your parents, Master?" Mikoto asked.

Naruto looked to the ground and said, "I don't have any. Gramps told me they died right after I was born. I was raised in an orphanage until a couple of years ago, when Gramps rented this apartment out to me."

Hinata put a hand on his shoulder and said, "I'm so sorry, Master."

"When were you born again?" Mikoto asked.

"The same day the Fox attacked the village."

Mikoto thought to herself, "But that's when Kushina and Lord Fourth were...wait, Kushina said she was naming her baby...no, it can't be!"

Naruto looked at Mikoto and asked, "What's wrong?"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Mikoto misses Sasuke

Hiashi Hyuga, to talk to Naruto and Hinata
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
A sharp knock on the door alarmed Naruto and the girls. "Hinata, Mikoto, go in my bedroom; I'll handle things here."

"Yes, Master," the two girls automatically said as they walked to the bedroom. Naruto then went up to the door and saw...
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Someone interrupts them

choices: Naruto and Hinata talk about Hiashi's visit
Cut to Naruto and Hinata graduating the Academy
That night, with Hinata and Mikoto
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Naruto opened the door to reveal Hiashi Hyuga standing before him. "Good afternoon, Naruto."

"What are you doing here?" Naruto asked, a little angrier than he would have liked.

Hiashi frowned, but kept his demeanor and said, "I wanted to talk to both you and Hinata. Do you mind?"

Although tempted to say yes, Naruto stepped aside and said, "Come in." As soon as Hiashi was seated, Naruto said, "Hinata, could you come here please?"

The bedroom door opened as Hinata rushed out and said, "What do you need, Master?" She then stopped for a while as she saw Hiashi. Fearing the man, she hid behind Naruto while saying, "He...Hello, Lord Hyuga."

A look of hurt passed his face as he responded, "Hello, Hinata. I trust you are well."

"Hinata, could you make us some tea?" Naruto asked. As Hinata left, Naruto asked, "What did you want to talk about?"

"I wanted to apologize for making you take Hinata as a slave."

"Hinata isn't my slave; she's my friend! And why would you want your daughter to live a life like this?!"

"Because with you, she has a better future than if the elders had their way."

"The elders?" Hinata asked, having returned with their tea.

Hiashi accepted his tea and drank before starting the story.

"Hinata was always a sweet child, but to the elders, sweetness wouldn't do much in politics or combat. Hanabi had shown tremendous progress since her youth, while Hinata seemed to become weaker in the elder's eyes. I knew Hinata was still growing, but Hanabi was a prodigy, on par with their cousin Neji."

"Never met this Neji guy," Naruto said.

"He's a year older than us, Master; I'm not surprised," Hinata told him.

"Anyway, the elders convinced themselves that Hanabi was more worthy to take over the Hyuga clan and demanded I place the Caged Bird seal on Hinata."

"The what?"

"It marks me as a member of a Branch Family," Hinata commented. "I would have to be subservient to the Main House for the rest of my life."

"That's cruel!"

"I agree," Hiashi said. "I didn't want to go through with it, and the elders thought that even being a branch family member was too good for Hinata, since they were stronger in the elders' eyes. Therefore, they demanded I sell her off as a slave."

"Those bastards!" Naruto growled. "I'm going to get them back for this!!"

"Master, please don't get upset!" Hinata said, placing a hand on his shoulder.

"But they disowned you and placed a seal on you to..."

"Actually I never placed the seal on Hinata," Hiashi said, catching Naruto by surprise. "The elders' plans for her were too much for me to agree with completely, but it is against the Clan's laws to go against a decision by the elders. I quickly whisked Hinata away before they discovered my failure to mark her with the seal. I then went to Lord Hokage to announce the Clan Elders' intentions to make Hinata a slave because I knew he'd find the happiest solution for her. As luck would have it, you came into focus and you know what happened by now."

Naruto looked at Hinata and gripped the hand on his shoulder tightly. Hinata, meanwhile, was amazed that Hiashi went so far to make her happy. "What if the elders..."

"I told them that you were a slave to the Uzumaki boy, whom they already despise. They seemed content, thinking it was a fate befitting an ill-performing child of the Clan's Head." As Naruto glared at him, Hiashi added, "However, I came here to tell you I do not share their opinion."

"Really?"

"Yes. I want what I feel is best for my daughter, and I can tell that she's already grown a little since I left her in your care. I want her to continue her studies as a shinobi, and being with you will give her more confidence in herself and a better life than she would have otherwise."

Naruto and Hinata then stared in awe as Hiashi set his tea down and bowed to them. "I know my explaining things probably won't excuse what I have done, but please forgive me. I do want what is best for Hinata, and I pray my leaving her in your care was a wise choice on my part."

Naruto continued to stare, but Hinata went up and hugged Hiashi. "Thank you for everything, and don't worry; I am happier than I have ever been...Father."

Hiashi hugged Hinata back and said, "Thank you, Hinata."

Naruto then stood and said, "I guess if Hinata forgives you, I can't hold a grudge. Thanks for explaining everything."

Hiashi nodded and said, "I felt you at least deserved to know why I did what I did. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have other matters to attend to."

As Hiashi stood to leave, Hinata said, "Father, could you please visit me again sometime?"

Hiashi smiled and said, "Of course. I'll be looking forward to it." And with that, he left.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Hiashi Hyuga, to talk to Naruto and Hinata

choices: Cut to Naruto and Hinata graduating the Academy
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Wow; that must have been nice to hear," Mikoto said as she washed Hinata. Ever since Hinata was taken in by Naruto, both she and Mikoto had enjoyed their time together at night where they could just talk without having to worry about Naruto interrupting them too much.

"Yeah, it was. To know my father still loves me and wants me to do better...it makes me happy."

"You know, your father's not alone. Master and I feel the same way."

"I know, but if you had been there and seen how he acted in front of Lord Hokage, you'd understand how I felt when he acknowledged he didn't want to do it."

"Okay, new topic!" Mikoto said suddenly after a moment of silence. "How do you feel about Master?"

Hinata blushed a little and said, "You know I love him! He saved me when I was..."

"I know that, but when are you going to make the move?"

"What move?"

"I mean, saving you when he didn't even know you, taking you in to prevent you from being sold off, defending you when he felt your honor was being tarnished...I would have thrown myself at Master right away! Why haven't you?"

Hinata's blush deepened as she said, "I...well, um...it's not that I don't want to, but..."

"What is there to be embarrassed about? I'm sure he'd return your feelings for him."

"But we're still kids! What if I don't really love him?"

"Why don't we let time be the judge of that? Right now, I think you're being foolish for not letting him in."

After that, the two girls finished the bath and went to get dressed for the evening. As they got dressed, Hinata thought about Mikoto's words and started to wonder if she should talk to Naruto about her feelings.

Naruto knocked on the door and said, "Good night, Mikoto, Hinata!"

"Good night, Master," Mikoto answered back.

"Master, wait!"

"What is it, Hinata?" Naruto asked, now peeking his head into the bedroom.

Hinata gained a blush as she asked, "Um...could you...please sleep with us?!"

Naruto was aghast at Hinata's question, unprepared for it. "Well, I thought you two would want your privacy, being girls and all, so..."

"Well...I...I just feel like you should," Hinata stuttered. "After all, this is your bed and we're...well..."

"I think Hinata is saying she wouldn't mind if you sleep with us, Master," Mikoto said. "And honestly, neither do I. No matter what you might claim, we are still technically your property. You should do with us as you please."

Naruto stood for a moment, unsure of what he should do. "Well...if you really don't mind...then maybe for tonight I wouldn't mind..."

"Thank you, Master!" Hint screamed, jumping on him and hugging him tightly.

Naruto was surprised at first, but then hugged Hinata back. Mikoto then escorted Hinata and Naruto to the bed and laid them down. She laid down next to Naruto and threw the blanket over her and the two children. "It looks like there's room enough for all three of us, Master."

"But what about when Hinata and I get older?"

"That's for you to decide, Master, but let's worry about that later."

Naruto nodded, then drifted off to sleep. Hinata quickly went to sleep as well, cuddling close to Naruto as she did. Mikoto stared at the two for a while before getting to sleep herself. The last conscious thought to pass through her mind was, "I wonder what the future holds for us."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: That night, with Hinata and Mikoto

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"So, how was it, seeing Naruto make all those Shadow Clones?" a classmate asked Hinata.

HInata blushed a little as she said, "Well, it was...um...I don't feel like talking about it."

"Aw, come on! You must have some reaction to his saving you!"

Hinata simply shook her head as she thought about what happened the other night.

*Flashback*

Naruto and HInata hid behind a few trees as Mizuki and Iruka faced each other. Irk had been injured trying to protect Naruto from one of Mizuki's shuriken. "You saw his eyes earlier, didn't you? He's gonna use that scroll for something terrible, I'm sure."

"...you're right..."

Hinata could see the hurt that appeared in Naruto's eyes. She knew that besides her, Mikoto and Lord Homage, Iruka was one of the few people he had come to trust. She was about to fight on his behalf when she heard the rest of Iruka's response.

"...the Nine-Tailed Fox would do that...but Naruto's different. He's one of my most excellent students. True, he's not the hardest worker, very clumsy, and few people accept him, but he already knows to feel pain deep in his heart. He's not the Nine-Tailed Fox! He's a member of the Hidden Leaf; Naruto Uzumaki!"

Naruto's eyes swelled up with tears as a smile started to appear on his face. Hinata smiled as well, knowing the person she was bound to for the rest of her life was happy.

"Whatever!" Mizuki said, drawing everyone's attention to him. "I was gonna finish you later, but now I've changed my mind. Prepare to die!!"

Naruto panicked and said, "Hinata, try fighting him off, I need more time!"

"Yes, Master!" Hinata said as she ran to stop Mizuki's advance. As soon as she got between Mizuki and Iruka, she assumed her clan's signature stance and struck Mizuki in the stomach and shoulder, blocking his chakra flow to those areas.

Mizuki glared at Hinata, then chuckled and said, "Oh, well, I can always get Naruto later. For now, why don't I help myself to the whore who's been led astray by his wicked lies."

"You take that back!" Hinata yelled. "I won't have you insult him any further!!"

"He won't for much longer!" Naruto said as he appeared on a tree branch. He held the scroll to his side and sported a look that promised payback if Mizuki harmed Iruka or Hinata.

Mizuki, however, laughed and said, "Perfect! Now I don't have to hunt you down! I don't care if this bitch blocked my chakra, I can still take you down in one shot!"

"Try it!" Naruto said as he put his hands in a cross shape, and shouted, "Shadow Clone jutsu!"

At once, the area was filled with over a hundred clones of Naruto. Iruka and Hinata were surprised at the success of the jutsu, while Mizuki was now afraid of his chances.

"What's wrong? Didn't you say you could take me down in one shot?" Naruto asked before he and his clones started to beat Mizuki up."

*End Flashback*

"I'd still rather not talk about it," Hinata told the classmate who had asked her about that night.

Before the classmate could pressure her further, Iruka walked in and said, "Okay, everyone, get to your seats and settle down." As Hinata made her way to her seat next to Naruto, Iruka announced, "I just want to say how proud I am of all of you for graduating. Now, you will be put into your three-man cells. First, let's get to Team 7: Naruto Uzumaki, Hinata Hyuga and..."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Cut to Naruto and Hinata graduating the Academy

choices: Kakashi Hatake with the Third Hokage
Mikoto Uchiha (using the alias Naomi Uzumaki) with the Third Hokage
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"...Tenten!" Iruka announced as the girl in question walked into the room. She then went up to where Naruto and Hinata were sitting and said, "Hey, guys! How's it going?"

"We're really on the same team?" Hinata asked.

"Yep! I can't tell you how excited I am!"

"But how? Didn't you graduate before us?" Naruto asked.

"I did, but hanging out with you two was so much fun I wanted to wait for you to graduate. Besides, Lord Hokage insisted that I be with you."

"Okay, Team 7. I've received word that your Jonin instructor is waiting for you at Training Ground 8. Therefore you don't need to be here. Get going, and good luck!"

Naruto, Hinata and Tenten left after hearing that Ino Yamanaka, Choji Akimichi and Shikamaru Nara were assigned to a team together, as were Shino Aburame, Kiba Inuzuka and Sakura Haruno. Sasuke was to be placed in a squad with one year's experience over him due to his advanced skills.

Along the way, Tenten quietly said to Hinata, "So, have you and Naruto come out yet?"

"Out of what?"

"You know; are you an official couple, or are you still too shy to make a move?"

"Tenten! There's more to it than if I like him or not! He's still my Master; I have to do everything he says, so..."

"He hasn't exploited you or anything, has he?"

"Well, only in dire situations, but..."

"Then I think it's fine! He wants you to be you; what greater reason to ask him out?"

"But...I don't know if he really loves me or..."

"Fine, whatever. I think you're being pretty stupid, but you just do what you want to do. Besides, it frees Naruto up for me."

"What? No! I want Master to be mine!!"

"Then make the move already!"

Tenten's father watched the boy with a wary eye for a solid minute, causing Naruto to grow increasingly nervous. He then let out a loud laugh and roughly patted Naruto on the back. "Good to meet you, lad! I've been hearing a lot about you for quite some time!"

"Serves 'em right, I say! Those guys were a bunch of pricks, anyway. I'm glad they got pranked. I'd also like to say thanks for never pranking us, kid."

"Really?"

"Yeah. Our Jonin instructor says she used to do it with her teammates when they were Genin to help get their team closer together."

"Well...I'm sure you can do fine. However," Tenten's father said before lowering a short sword toward Naruto's genitals. "You treat my daughter the wrong way, and you'll be begging for hell to take you. Got it?"

With an audible gulp, Naruto said, "Crystal clear, sir!"

Naruto immediately ran to help out Tenten. Upon reaching her, she said, "I hope my dad wasn't too much. He really is a nice guy once you get to know him."

Naruto started moving Tenten's bed and dresser toward the center of the room as he answered, "Yeah, I'm sure he is."

"...say, Naruto?"

"Those seals that made Mikoto and Hinata...you know, the way they are..."

"What about them?"

"Why haven't you exploited them? I mean, you have the ability to turn anyone you wished into your puppet, dancing to your strings. I'm sure anyone else would've taken advantage of that to get either a harem of loyal female slaves or an army of obedient shinobi, yet you..."

"I don't ever want to be like that! I feel guilty enough forcing Mikoto and Hinata to live like that! Please...don't ever let me...be that kind of guy."

"So what do we do about her?" She pointed to their fallen foe.

"Hmm." Mikoto pondered as she looked at the paper once more, noticed a worn out drawing of what use to be a seal.

"It would seem that whoever created this seal left one of them on to the paper itself as a defense mechanism, causing whoever touches it to be caught in the trap and effected by the seal."

"I think the more important question is, what exactly does that seal do?" Hinata asked.

"Nobody knows, whatever it does she is now influenced by it." Mikoto explained. At that moment the fallen girl groaned a bit as she started to move once more.

"Looks like sleeping beauty is awake." Tenten remarked. Mikoto nodded and drew a kunai of her own, she walked towards the fallen girl and pointed it at her as she awoke. When she awoke something was not quite right, she looked frightened terrified even as she saw the weapon looming over her, pointed directly at her. Panic was clear in her eyes.

"Don't move." Mikoto warned.

"P...please don't hurt me miss kidnapper, I'll give you anything you want." Kurostsuchi fearfully said. Mikoto was confused by her remark.

"We're not kidnappers, you attacked us!" Tenten growled.

"I did?" Kurostsuchi asked

"Yes you did, what's wrong with you?!" Tenten asked. Causing the other girl to panic some more.

"S..sorry, please don't hurt me." She begged. Tenten was baffled, what was going on with her. Mikoto was in thought for a moment.

"I think I know what's wrong." Mikoto began as she turned to the frightened girl. "What's your name?"

"My..my name?" She began "I...I don't know, I don't remember, I don't remember anything!!" She began panicking "Who am I, what am I doing here, why did you kidnap me?!" Mikoto sadly nodded as she activated her Sharingan and looked in the frightened girls eyes. It didn't take long for the girl to be captivated by them and then fall asleep.

"As I thought, this is what the seal did to her." She explained as she deactivated her bloodline, "From the looks of it, it seemed to be some Memory Wiping Seal, causing the victim to have their memory erased."

"N..no way." Tenten exclaimed, now she was extra glad they didn't find that first, that could've been one of them.

"In any case we got the paper that has how to make this seal now, time to head back." Mikoto's voice sounding somber.

"What about her?" Hinata pointed to the sleeping girl.

"We have to take her with us, and figure it out from there." Mikoto mentioned as she picked her up. With the jutsu in hand and an unconscious amnesiac in Mikoto's hands the group went back to Konoha.

"It's clear we have a situation on our hands one that isn't easily solved." The Hokage began in his formal tone.

"However, her situation is a bit more complicated, she happens to be the granddaughter of Ōnoki the Tsuchikage of Iwagakure and were I to do anything to her, he could use that as an excuse to declare war on our village, something I cannot afford."

"What is to be done then?" Mikoto asked causing the old man to sigh.

"My only course of action is to broker peace with him, maybe use this to forge an alliance or a truce at best out of this but in order to due this we need to show her hospitality." He explained.

"No, you're not, because I want her to live with you and your team until arrangements are made to send her back to her village."

"Isn't there anywhere else she could live?" Hinata wondered.

"Good, now is there any other matter?" He asked

"I see, I'll look into this immediately, in the meantime you are dismissed." Team Seven nodded and headed home with Kurostsuchi fearfully following them not wanting to displease these strangers. As soon as they were gone the Hokage growled.

"This was your doing wasn't it Danzo?" He spat.

"You had no right to do this behind my back, you risk everything by..." He began before being cut off

"I don't risk enough, if we don't have that boy properly trained all is lost, if you'll only let me train him we'll have a powerful asset on our side!" Danzo countered.

"I told you before you will go nowhere near him." His eyes narrowed at his old friend. "But you're right about one thing he needs some proper training, I'll summon Jiraiya he can take care of Naruto's training."

"You'll be sleeping with me, I can keep an eye on you the best and the others aren't ready to be civil towards you." The older woman addressed.

"Why not?" She asked.

"We'll save that question for another time, right now I'll show you to your room." She extended her hand. Kurostsuchi gulped a bit before cautiously nodded and shakily grabbing her hand, as the older woman led her to her room.

"I can't believe this." Tenten growled.

"I don't like this either Tenten, but need to put up with this, at least for now." Hinata agreed her own growl forming "Master what do you think?"

"What choice do we have?" Naruto reasoned "We'll just have to try to make the best of it." The other two nodded as Tenten grabbed him to a side.

"Master, remember what I said earlier." She whispered seductively. Naruto blushed a bit than nodded

"What about our guest?" He asked.

"We'll just have to set up privacy seals then." She explained.

"Alright but later tonight." Naruto agreed.

"Great, I can't wait Master." She kissed him on the cheek and walked ahead of him, making sure to wiggle her ass at him as she walked.

Nartuo smiled coyly and entered the apartment himself.

At the forest of death, team seven were facing Jiraiya as he looked at them with an unreadable expression, Mikoto was standing by near a tree to watch the training. After what seemed like minutes the toad sannin began.

"Alright, my job is to prepare you for the Chunin Exam by working on your strengths, fixing your weaknesses and teaching you techniques that will so you." He paused "To do this I will first ask for a spar just to get an idea on what I'm working with.....all except for Hinata, I have a special training in store for you. Follow me please." The girl in question nodded and followed the older man. The two of them walked towards another secluded area, separate from the others.

"Where are we going?" She asked him.

Luckily someone requested to personally handle your training, you'll be training with this person from now until the Chunin Exam, listen to him as you would your own instructor." He explained, the two of them walked towards the designated area where her eyes widened as to who was waiting for them.

"F...father?!" She exclaimed as it was indeed Hiashi Hyuga standing there greeting them.

"Hello Hinata, when I heard your were to train for the Chunin Exam I requested to handle your training myself." He explained. "Words cannot express how sorry I am that I failed you, Hitomi would curse my name if she were still alive." He sighed before continuing. "I cannot undo what has been done, but I can make up for part of my sins by doing what I've should've done from the start, train you the right way, a style fit to suit you and not the traditions of the Hyuga clan."

"But what about the elders, won't the be angry at you for teaching a 'failure' like me." She asked him.

"What they won't know won't hurt them, as far as they are aware I'm merely going for a walk." He said with an eye smile. This caused the girl to smile at him. "It goes without saying but for the purposes of your training I'm not your father, I'm your instructor."

"Understood sensei." She acknowledged, earning another eye smile from him.

"With that taken care of, I'm going to train the other two." Jiraiya mentioned as he headed back. Hiashi activated his Byakugan.

"Now, let us begin and this time do not hold back." He explained as he took his stance.

"Yes sensei." Hinata obeyed activating her own bloodline and going into her own stance.

Meanwhile the toad sannin facing both Naruto and Tenten.

"Now, come at me with the intent to kill, show me what you two are capable of." He began taking up a stance.

Nartuo and Tenten nodded to each other and took their own stances.

Many bruises and soreness were accumulated upon the three members of team seven as they were panting heavily at their heavy work out. Naturally none of the members even landed a scratch on their instructions but the point wasn't to win, the point was to grow and grow they have. Once Jiraiya had a better understanding on what he was working with he began his instructions.

"Tenten it's clear you're skilled in weapon training but simply throwing them isn't sufficient enough you'll need a weapon to master for close range combat. Fortunately there's someone within Konoha that can help you with that, his name is Hayate, I'll contact him and he should be more than happy to help you hone in on your skills." This earned a nod from the brunette still panting a bit.

"Naruto, I'm going to really need to work with you, the village did a poor job handling your training but you have the key ingredient to learn many times faster than any other ninja." He told him, which earned a confused look from the blonde.

"What do you mean?" He asked.

"Your shadow clones, you've simply been using them to rush in there and hope for the best but they can be used for so much more." The older instruction began. "For example, create a shadow clone for me." The blonde nodded and did just that.

"Now I'll bring your clone far away and tell him something, once you've seen me finish talking with him I want you to dispel it and tell me what I said to it." The older man advised. With that he brought the clone far away and told him something, Naruto upon seeing this dismissed the clone as the Sannin approached him. "Now, what did I say?"

"You said the apples only bloom twice." Naruto recited then his eyes widened at this. "N..no way." This earned a smile from the older man.

"As you can see your shadow clones obtain the memory of everything that happens, and when you dismiss them you learn what they learn. You can use this for training purposes too, this would normally be dangerous as both the overflow of knowledge and the amount of Chakra used could kill a person but with your reserves you can pull it off." This explanation left Naruto stunned, he never considered this before.

"I guess I have work to do then." The blonde mentioned.

"That you do, once you're brought up to speed I'll give you some new techniques to go along with it. How would you like to summon toads?" He asked.

"Really, that would be awesome!" Naruto happily exclaimed.

"Good, I'll teach you that once you're ready, then after you master that I'll teach you a technique the fourth Hokage taught me!" The older man smiled.

"That is awesome, I'll be Hokage in no time!" He said happily before reeling himself in, looking a bit flushed. Both Tenten and Mikoto couldn't help but giggle at this, Jiraiya was also chuckling at this.

"Glad you like it, I'll give you the rest of the day off. Come back tomorrow for your training, Tenten I'll have you meet up with Hayate for your training at the training grounds, don't be late." He instructed, earning two nods from the teens.

Meanwhile Hinata was equally panting heavily, facing her father and holding her arm a bit. Hiashi looked at her before stopping.

"I think that's enough for today, we don't want to over exert yourself." He mentioned.

"Yes sensei." She mentioned before relaxing.

"You're not there yet, but with time and practice I'll see to it that you will get there." Her father mentioned. "I'm proud of the good job you did so far regardless."

"Thank you sensei." Hinata replied, earning an eye smile from her father.

"I not only speak to you not only as your sensei but as your father as well." Hiashi mentioned. "Now I wish speak to you as your father for this conversion."

"What is it?" She asked, Hiashi looked at her for a moment before starting.

"You and Naruto, you consummated your relationship haven't you?" He asked, earning a blush from Hinata and her to look away from him. "I thought as much." He sighed a bit before continuing "All I ask is for you to be careful and make the right decisions and do not do anything you feel you're not ready for." This earned a smile from his daughter, she knew him well enough that this was his way of approving of their relationship.

"Thank you father." She happily exclaimed, before this went further he gave a fake cough.

"Now with that out of the way, we shall pick up where we left off tomorrow. Until then." He mentioned, earning a nod from her daughter. Team seven caught up to one another and went to their apartment to rest up.
