"It's who I am Ino, I help my precious people no matter what." He said without hesitation.

"You know, you're one of the good ones Naruto. Never lose that." Ino smiled "Thank you, and sorry about everything."

"Use to it, as long as people get to see the real me and then judge accordingly I'm all good. Also I'm sorry about this as well, I hope you understand it's nothing personal." The Kyuubi released her.

"It's fine, it's like you said we do what we have to do. I look forward to our training session when the time presents it self." Ino mentioned before leaving his mind.

"Save your thanks brat, I did this because I was bored." Kyuubi mentioned.

"If you insist." Naruto commented before leaving. Kyuubi had a small smile on its face when he left. Your plan may work after all Minato.

Back in the real word, Naruto began writing the test for real now that he had the answers.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: He Cons Ino to Mind Transfer him to trap her

choices: Naruto and his team encounter someone (RC on who)
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
The first part of the exam was over, it ended with Ibiki trying to get them to answer a tenth question, and should they get it wrong they fail automatically. This caused a lot of people to leave but not enough, everyone else there was determined to answer it which caused them to pass. The point of it as it turned out was to carry on the mission no matter what, which is the soul purpose of any ninja.

Not everyone can be an infiltrator or information gatherer but a true ninja never abandons the mission, even if it means death. With that revelation he brought it over to the second portion of the exam which introduced them to their next proctor Anko, a purple haired woman wearing some type of chain shirt. She smiled with glee as she brought them to the Forest of Death and promised to cut the participants in half. She grinned maliciously at them before starting.

"Alright brats listen up, this part of the exam is simple each team has one scroll either the Earth Scroll or the Heaven Scroll. You're job is to get the opposing scroll you don't have and bring it to the designated building, do not open your scrolls until you reach the area or you'll fail. Inside the forest anything goes and there will be a lot of nasty surprises waiting for you, with that I will have you all sign a waver stating we are not responsible for anything that occurs inside the forest, up to and including death."

"Is killing allowed?" Gaara asked.

"Like I said anything goes, killing included which reminds me, if one of your teammates dies your team fails so either you all pass or you all don't, this is where you really get to put your teamwork into action, if this terrifies you feel free to drop out now." Anko smirked. Some of the people did but most stuck around, Naruto was looking bored.

"Yeah, yeah, can we get on with this?" Naruto asked, Anko smirked and went behind him with a kunai drawn to his cheek.

"Cheeky brat aren't you, it's people like you that die first." She licked his cheek and pressed her weapon close to him to cut him finding it to poof out of existence.

"Maybe." He started as she felt his weapon on her cheek "But I welcome the challenge, and I don't plan to lose." Anko laughed at this.

"I like you brat, what's your name?" She asked.

"Naruto, nice to meet you Anko sensei." He introduced.

"Just Anko, the sensei life isn't for me, you have a promising future kid, but." She melted into a pile of snakes as he found himself in her headlock with her weapon drawn to him "Don't let it get to your head." She winked at him and let him go. She turned to the others.

"Alright brats we'll start in a few minutes once you signed your wavers make any necessary preparations you can, you'll need everything you can think of." She started. All of them nodded as they began their preparations and signed their wavers. Naruto, Hinata and Tenten got themselves ready and saw they had the Earth Scroll.

"Was that necessary Master?" Hinata quietly asked.

"Probably not, but you know me." Naruto admitted, Tenten looked amused.

"Always need to make a spectacle, let's hope it doesn't draw unwanted attention." Tenten smirked.

"It'll be fine if one of them has the Heaven Scroll." Naruto assured.

"I just hope that red head doesn't find us." Hinata sounded worried "He seems interested in you, and not in the good way."

"I know, but I have the feeling if anyone can handle him, I can." Naruto replied "At least I hope." As though if it was on cue said read head was there and glaring at him.

"Can I help you?" Naruto asked. Gaara smirked with killing intent in mind.

"Mother wants your blood." He stated and left. Naruto couldn't help but shiver at that.

"If our brother has you in his sights you're a dead man." Naruto turned to that voice to find the makeup wearing man from earlier and a blonde busty woman carrying a fan.

"Word of advice, run from our brother." She warned.

"How about introducing yourselves before taunting us?" Naruto demanded.

"I'm Temari, this is Kankuro and this isn't a taunt it's a warning, one I really advice you to heed." She mentioned.

"How kind of you, but we'll be fine." Tenten growled at her.

"Suit yourselves, but when he kills you, don't come crying to me." She scoffed as she left with her brother. They didn't have time to ponder on that as Anko started again.

"Alright brats, the next part of the Exam begins....now!" She started and everyone entered the forest determined to pass.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Before the forest of death

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
The Forest of Death lived up to its names as Naruto and his team can hear screams and the sounds of wildlife, if it weren't for the fact they trained here in preparation they'd be severely lost. Fortunately that's not the case as they were walking around being cautions and formulating plans on passing.

"Alright so all we need the Heaven Scroll and not lose our Earth Scroll all the while making sure we survive, this one's going to be tough." Tenten mentioned.

"Agreed, but we'll be fine if we play this smart." Naruto replied. "How do we want to play this offensively or defensively?"

"Either option has it's own advantages and disadvantages, maybe a bit of both." Hinata suggested.

"That can work, what did you have in mind?" Tenten asked.

"I was thinking we can have Master scout for a team that has a scroll with his shadow clones." She suggested.

"Sounds like a plan." Naruto agreed and used his Shadow Clone Jutsu, he then had the clones go off in separate paths to scout ahead.

He waited a few minutes or so before he felt the knowledge of his clones came back to him.

"One of them found a team a bit north from here with one we can ambush them." He mentioned.

"Right let's go." Hinata agreed as the three of them went to where his clone found the team. The three of them went into the direction with Naruto leading the way.

Upon arrival they spotted the team and he pointed at them, he gave the single to ambush and they nodded. They went and surrounded the team.

"Hand over your Scroll or else!" Hinata warned.

"Not a chance brats, how about you give us yours." The enemy ninja taunted.

"Hard way it is then." Tenten commented as the teams went to fighting. It wasn't long before the enemy ninjas were disabled and had weapons pointed at their throats.

"Last chance hand us the scroll or we'll pry it off your cold dead hands." Naruto warned.

"Okay, okay take it!" The man fearfully said and grab the Heaven Scroll and gave it to him.

"This better be the real one." He warned.

"It is I swear let us go!" He begged. Naruto nodded and released them.

"Go, try anything and you die." Naruto threatened. The three nodded and left.

"Wow, that was easy, now let's." Tenten began before they all heard a scream.

"Saskue no, stop!!" It was the voice of Sakura. The three of them turned to one another.

"That doesn't sound good." Hinata mentioned.

"Should we do something?" Tenten asked.

"I guess we have to if only for our sensei's sake." Naruto sighed. The three of them nodded to head to the source. Upon arrival they found him with black marks over his body fighting Dosu and his team torturing them, Dosu is badly hurt Zaku was missing his arms and bloodied and Kin looked scared. He saw Sakura begging him to stop, Sai out cold. He also noticed Ino out cold, Shikamaru processing the situation and Chōji also a bit beaten up but he was fine.

"Naruto, it's Sasuke he's gone mad you have to stop him." 'Kin' shouted, he seemed confused before Shikamaru piped up.

"Ino is in control of her." He explained, this brought the man to look at his rival.

"Stay out of this dobe!!" He growled.

"You don't want to do this Saskue, this isn't you." He told him.

"Shut up, what the hell do you know about me!" He growled "I finally have the power to kill him, I won't let you take this from me!"

"Saskue please, listen to him." Sakura begged, he growled at her and threw a kunai hitting her shoulder. "Gah!" She grimaced in pain.

"Torturing people is one thing, but attacking your teammates is going too far!" Tenten spat.

"You should be ashamed of yourself Saskue." Hinata scolded.

"Fuck you whores, I am an Uchiha I do whatever the fuck I want." He growled. Naruto glared at him for that insult he was so lucky Mikoto was his mother or he'd kill him for that.

"I see reasoning is beyond you, guess I'm going to have to stop you the hard way." Naruto mentioned

"Need help?" Tenten asked.

"No, he's mine, even if he didn't insult you this is between him and me." He mentioned.

"You think a dead last loser like you can beat me, don't make me laugh!" He spat and charged him.

"Sasuke!" Sakura groaned.

"Are you still defending him, after he threw a kunai at you?" Shikamaru asked as he bandaged her arm up to stop the bleeding.

"He...he's not himself, that man....Orochimaru he did this to him when he showed up, defeated us and bit his neck giving him a mark." She explained

"You're unbelievable, this is who he truly is, it's time to accept that." He mentioned.

"N...no." Sakura muttered, and got up "He'll listen to me, I know he will." She rushed to stop him.

"Troublesome woman." He muttered.

Meanwhile Naruto and Saskue were fighting, both evenly matched.

"Give up yet teme?" Naruto asked.

"Fuck you dobe, you are not my equal, you are beneath me, like everyone else is!" He shouted and charged him again.

"Saskue stop please!" Sakura begged and stood in their way, Naruto stopped and Saskue too briefly. "I know you're in there somewhere, you don't want to...guh!!" She said no more as she felt herself get stabbed once more this time in the chest, Sakura coughed up a bit of blood and fell to the ground.

"Sakura, no!" Ino controlling Kin shouted and undid her Jutsu, Ino in her own body rushed to her and healed her as best as she could. Kin meanwhile woke up but didn't move as Shikamaru grabbed her with his Shadow Possession technique.

"You make me sick Saskue, if only your parents would see you now." Naruto sighed, knowing Mikoto won't like hearing this.

"Do not talk about my family you worthless orphan!!" He growled "A loser with no family cannot possibly understand how I feel!"

"I pity you, I really do." Naruto sighed once more. "Time to wake you up to reality."
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: During the forest of death

choices: At the third part of the Exam
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
After a long hard fight Naruto looked down at the unconscious form of Sasuke with part disgust and part pity. He didn't want it to be this way but he gave him no choice, turning his attention to Ino and Sakura he began asking her.

"How is she?" That question Ino sighed a bit and told him.

"She'll live thankfully, but it'll be a while before she recovers." She answered him.

"Sakura is tougher than we give her credit for, she just needs to stop following Sasuke around like a love sick puppy." He mentioned.

"I didn't mean physically." She replied "She's tough of that there's no doubt, but she loved him or at least in her mind she did, to think I too was like this."

"At least you both now realize he's no good for you, both of you can do better and deserve better." He mentioned.

"Yeah, you're right." Ino muttered "I can't speak for forehead but I want nothing to do with him anymore."

"For once, *cough* I agree." Sakura weakly added regaining consciousness. "I was such a fool, I hope you can forgive me, both of you."

"Try not to talk Sakura, you're badly hurt, save the apologies for later." Naruto advised.

"No, I need to do this now." Sakura mentioned coughing a bit more "Ino, I threw away our friendship, and for what, a guy that cares nothing for us? Words along can't express my regret and I hope we can be friends again."

"Like you even need to ask, plus I did the same thing so if you forgive me as well we can call it even." Ino smiled causing her to smile back.

"Naruto, I didn't even hate you, not really. I wanted to impress Sasuke and mom said you were a demon and I needed to stay away from you, I can see she's wrong." She mentioned.

"Did she now?" Naruto glared at that "Sakura how would you like to live with us for a while?"

"What, why?" She asked.

"Your mother broke a very serious law, one that will most likely get her killed." He confessed, her eyes widened a bit.

"I don't understand, is there no way around this?" She begged not wanting her to die.

"I'll do my best to appeal imprisonment but regardless of what happens to her she has a crime she needs to answer for." He assured.

"What did she do?" She asked.

"That is something I'll explain later, for right now though will you take me up on my offer, at least until this gets settled?" He asked again.

"I still don't understand but you saved my life and helped me when you didn't need to, I'll trust you on this. Besides it gives me a chance to truly get to know you and hopefully we have a good relationship this time." She replied with a smile.

"Good." He replied, he turned to his girlfriends "Sorry about this but."

"It's fine, I understand." Hinata assured with a smile.

"We'll need to explain this to Naomi as well, and more." Tenten added looking at Sasuke.

"At any rate we need to bring him to the Hokage, her too." Naruto commented pointing to Kin.

"Right, follow me." Shikamaru mentioned as he walked with his time, Kin being forced to follow.

"Good luck passing." Hinata shouted.

"You too." Ino replied as they left sight, Sai got up and smiled his creepy smile.

"I woke up in time to assess the situation, I'll take Sasuke and deliver him to the Hokage." He promised, Sakura weakly got up but managed to keep up with them leaving team seven to themselves.

"Come, we have an Exam to pass." Naruto mentioned, the two nodded and they went to go to their destination.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: After the fight

choices: "Seal his chakra and put him in a mental ward."
She says something else (RC on what)
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
After the second portion of the exam was over everyone involved with the incident gave their report to the Hokage who had varying expressions, regret, anger, shame and determination. Mikoto was there too once she was summoned from the scrolls they opened dawning her new look, having longer blonde hair and had blue see through contact lenses, ones that didn't act as glasses to avoid damaging her eyes. She was told everything too, she was proud of her Master for taking care of Sakura and understood why he invited her in, she was disgusted and saddened by her son's actions and she was angry at the arrival of Orochimaru.

"First in regards to Orochimaru, I want you all to leave him to me and focus on the Exam tell no one of what you reported." Hiruzen started "In the regards of Sakura's mother, I'm afraid she does indeed have to answer for her crime by breaking my law however I'll give her a lighter sentence per Naruto's request." He paused, this earned a sigh of relief from Sakura who was doing better now but still felt the pain of Sasuke's stab, both figuratively and literally.

"I also approve of Sakura living with Team Seven for the time being and depending on what happens this might be a permanent thing. Should Mrs. Haruno behave herself and remember to respect my wishes then I'll let her go, if not she'll stay longer but should she seek revenge, I'm afraid her death is certain." He said with a sigh, Sakura look a bit sad at that but nodded, she was told everything by Naruto per his request and now she understood everyone's treatment for him, this made her sick to her stomach that she treated him so poorly and practically begged for his forgiveness.

Much to her surprise, he waved it off, but she refused to let it end like that and vowed to him she'll make up for everything and took no for an answer. He eventually relented and came to an agreement she'll help with Kurotsuchi's maid duties, maid uniform at all. She blushed when she saw it but she was determined to make it up to him so she was willing to do whatever it took.

"Finally, there's the matter of Sasuke Uchiha." Hiruzen wrapped up, snapping Sakura's attention back to him "Naomi, what do you think should be done with him?"

Mikoto sighed with sadness, Naruto squeezed her hand lightly for support which in turn made her smile in appreciation at him, she turned to the Hokage to give her answer.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Something else happens (RC on what)

choices: On the way to the third round
Seeing all who passed to the third round
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Are you sure that's a good idea?" Hiruzen asked, with Mikoto giving a small nod.

"I am. What he did is horrible and deserves punishment. However, I'm not entirely convinced at least a small portion of what happened wasn't directly because of the seal Orochimaru planted on him. At least in this way, he can learn that his actions have consequences and we could monitor his condition to see if that seal is in any way responsible for a change in behavior."

Hiruzen nodded and said, "A valid point. We can't just write off Orochimaru's seal as mere decoration or a power enhancer. Knowing how obsessed he was at finding new ways to enhance power, it stands to reason he would create a seal that did that while simultaneously causing increased aggression. I'll seal Sasuke's chakra myself and place him in the most secure ward the village has. The rest of you, focus on the trial. Dismissed."

"Yes, sir!" everyone announced before leaving.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: "Seal his chakra and put him in a mental wa...

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Naruto took a gander at all the people that passed to the third round, there was Neji's team, Gaara's team, Shino's team, Shikamaru's team, Kabuto and his team and a bunch of other people he didn't recognize. Of course the sound ninja weren't there as Dosu and Zaku were dead and Kin was in the interrogation room with her fate to be determined depending on her cooperation. Sasuke, Sakura and Sai of course were also eliminated, Sai not caring at all and watching with his creepy smile, Sakura also being okay with this saying her skill level was too low anyways, she was also watching giving Naruto a wave and a good luck motion.

As for Sasuke, he was in the mental ward and he hoped he comes to reason for Mikoto's sake. Tenten smiled at the sight of her instructor appearing as Hayate arrived to be the proctor for the third and final part of the exam.

"Welcome all to the last portion of the exam *cough* *cough.*" He seemed sick and was coughing up a storm as he talked. Suddenly a woman with purple hair and black eyes appeared before him, looking concerned.

"Hayate, please you're not well let me handle this." She begged.

"I've got this Yūgao, trust me, *cough* *cough.*" He coughed out, she didn't seem convinced but nodded and disappeared, a figure reappeared before the Hokage while wearing a cat mask but if you look closely the ANBU was showing concern for the proctor.

"This part of the exam tests your ability to fight *cough* *cough* at random your name will appear on the screen up there, once you see your name you will come down and fight one another *cough* *cough.*" Hayate paused as his coughing got worse. Once he settled down he began again.

"The fight will not stop until one or both contestants are unable to continue, a forfeit occurs *cough* *cough,* or an opponent is killed." He said. Everyone had various reactions towards this, Gaara in particular seemed pleased. "There will be no outside help or you'll be disqualified, are there any questions?" Nobody said anything.

"Good, now if anyone wished to drop out *cough* *cough,* now is the time." He said. Kabuto raised his hand and saw himself out his two teammates however stayed.

"For a guy that claimed he did this five times you'd think he want to be apart of this." Hinata whispered.

"Yeah, something doesn't seem right about this." Naruto agreed. Their suspicions would have to wait though as Hayate began the exam.

"Now, again once you see your names on that screen *cough* *cough* head down to the arena." The board on the screen went by everyone in the third exam, going as fast as it could. Finally it stopped on two people. Ami and Tenten.

"Been wanted to teach this bitch a lesson." Tenten remarked and went down.

"Oh please, how easy." Ami boasted as she went down herself. The two of them went in their battle poses and waited to start.

"Ready?" Hayate began, he nodded to Tenten silently wishing her luck. "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Seeing all who passed to the third round

choices: Gaara tries to kill him but gets stopped
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Ami charged at her but thanks to her training she blocked her strikes and countered her, she went flying a bit.

"Ooof." Ami grunted as she felt the blow "Finally, someone I have to get serious with." She smirked as she stopped holding back and unleashed a barrage of needles at her which Tenten used her sword to block. Ami growled that none of them connected.

"Is that all you got bitch?" Tenten taunted.

"I've just got started." Ami growled as she used a water Jutsu to gain the upper hand but Tenten managed to jump over it and grabbed her and pinned her down sword drawn to her.

"Yield." Tenten warned.

"Don't count me out yet." Ami taunted as she turned into mud, she yelled as she flew down in the air for a punch but Tenten saw it coming and got out of the way to hit her in the back of the head with her weapon. She hit the ground with a thud and Tenten had her sword pointed right at the back of her neck.

"Call it, it's over." Tenten told Hayate.

"Agreed, winner Tenten!" He shouted, she earned cheers from her teammates and from the others as well. She put her weapon away and went back to her seat, Ami regained consciousness and went back herself grumbling of how she could lose.

"Hey, Ami, if you decide to be nicer, maybe I'll give you a rematch." Tenten called out not facing her.

"Maybe I'll take you up on that!" She shouted back, the two turned to each other and nodded before heading up.

"What just happened?" Naruto asked Hinata.

"They earned each other's respect." Hinata mentioned back "Ami maybe a bit rude at times but she takes herself seriously like Tenten, the difference is Ami allowed her success to get to her head while Tenten didn't. When they fought Ami had to really fight for the first time ever and humility finally came to her, in turn Tenten fought a worthy opponent and they both realized they're actually similar in some ways."

"Well explained." Tenten mentioned as she approached her team giving her Master and future husband a kiss which he returned.

"Things I need to learn then, since you'll become my wives." Naruto commented.

"We'll help you out." Tenten winked at him which caused him to blush.

"Now for the next to contestants *cough* *cough.*" Hayate coughed as once more the board randomly chose two people. This time it landed on Gaara and Kiba.

"Our turn Akamaru!" Kiba shouted as him and his dog went to the arena. Gaara calmly went down without a care. Kiba got in his pose but Gaara didn't move a muscle.

"Ready, begin!" Hayate shouted.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Tenten wins

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
To say this was a curb stomp was an understatement, Kiba stood zero chance against him as Gaara's sand blocked every attempt of an attack, he was panting hard bleeding slightly as Akamaru was unconscious.

"How pathetic, I'll end this now." Garra said "Sand Coffin!" Suddenly sand wrapped around Kiba's body nothing he could do to avoid it. He was trapped and the weight of the sand circuling his whole body. Gaara was ready to finish him off as he made a crushing motion with his hand.

"Sand Burial!" He shouted, but a crushing noise can be heard as Kiba cried out in pain. Gaara smirked evilly at his suffering.

"You're not worth my time, die!" He exclaimed as he went to crush him again, but before he could Naruto came in to stop him and glared at the red head.

"That's enough release him!" He warned. Gaara not losing his look gazed at him, a maniacal smirk on his face.

"Mother wants your blood more than his." He mentioned dropping Kiba, Naruto caught him in time.

"Get help now!" Naruto shouted, imediately help rushed in to bring Kiba to the hospital to get treated, he was gasping for air and was unable to move or talk. Akamaru getting up from his stupor whimpered sadly at the sight of his Master like that.

"Don't worry boy, he'll get better you'll see." Naruto assured, Akamaru licked him in appreciation. Hayate while sympathetic still had a job to do.

"Winner by *cough* *cough* disqualification, Gaara." He mentioned. Naruto glared at the red head.

"You made a big mistake, I will make you pay for this." He growled at him, but he just smirked at Naruto.

"I look forward to it." He grinned as he headed back, Naruto heading back as well.

"Do you think you can beat him?" Tenten asked.

"I have to, for Kiba's sake." He replied. Hayate took this time to announce the next set of contestants.

"Now for the next combatants." He said as the board spun names once more before settling on Naruto and Lee.

"Yosh, time for the flames of youth to shine brightly." Lee exclaimed heading down.

"Good luck Masster." Hinata whispered into his ear. Tenten kissed his right one, he smirked at them both before heading down himself.

"Ready?" Hayate began, both Naruto and Lee got in their fighting stances "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Gaara tries to kill him but gets stopped

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
It was a hard fought match, Lee and Naruto exchaged blow for blow and Lee even unlocked some of the gates, but in the end Naruto was standing above him panting. Hayate smiled at the performance before announcing.

"Winner, Naruto!" He smiled as his future wives and everyone else at attendance cheered. He helped Lee get up and the two of them shook hands.

"Well fought, you almost had me." Naruto admitted.

"That was inspiring, your flames of youth burn bright, from now on you're my eternal rival!" Lee posed as he explained.

"Um, thanks?" Naruto blinked not knowing what to see.

"Yosh, now I will do five hundred push up for our next encounter." Lee explained as he went back, Naruto shook his head and went back himself.

"That was tough, but I did it, I'll need to be better for Gaara though." He mentioned as he sat next to his future wives.

"I'm sure you'll be fine Master." Tenten whispered in his ear.

"You did great." Hinata mentioned "I have confidence you'll pull it off." He smiled at them as Hayate began again.

"Now for the next contestants *cough* *cough.*" Hayate coughed as the board activated again. It spun names around before it landed on Hinata and Kankuro

"Guess I'm up." The puppet user said as he went down.

"Good luck Hinata." Naruto encouraged, Hinata smiled and went down herself. The two of them took battle poses as Hayate began.

"Ready?" He started "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: After Naruto defeated Lee

choices: During the interrogation with Naruto and Kin
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Both Naruto and Tenten watched as Hinata fight with the puppet user, dodging his puppets trying to find an opening.

"Her training really paid off." Tenten whispered.

"Yeah, yours as well." Naruto praised, she blushed a bit.

"You improved too." She replied.

"Thanks but I still have ways to go, when I face Gaara I need to be better." He told her.

"If anyone can pull it off you can." Tenten smiled. Naruto then brought up.

"Gramps wants me to try and interrogate our prisoner after this." He told her.

"Why you?" She asked.

"Don't know, he might consider I use, that on her." He guessed.

"Will you?" She asked.

"I don't want to, but if there's no other option." He confessed.

"Makes sense, we have to do what we have to do." She reasoned "Just never lose that about you."

"I promise." He swore. They continued watching in silence as Hinata finally knocked out Kankuro.

"Winner, Hinata!" Hayate exclaimed, she smiled as she went back up to Naruto and Tenten.

"Hey, congratulations." Naruto gushed, Tenten smiled at her too.

"Thanks." Hinata replied.

"I have something to tell you." He started telling her what he told Tenten.

"Hmm, you might be in a hard spot with that one." She began "But I trust you'll make the right decision."

"I'm scared that I might have to use, that on her." He confessed.

"I trust you, if it does come to that I know you'll treat her like you treat us." She smiled. He smiled back at her

"Thanks." He thanked as they watched the rest of the fights.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Meanwhile with Naruto and Tenten

choices: She tries to distract him in an attempt to escape
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
After several lengthy battles the first round of the third part of the exam was over. The contestants that were left drew numbers to see who they were going to fight one month from now in the bigger stadium where there will be many people watching them. Naruto recalled all the fights that happened as he was heading to the interrogation room and who drew what.

Shino fought Neji and after a hard fought match, Neji prevailed. Temari made short work of Ino, Chōji was mismatched against Yakumo and succumed to her powerful Genjutsu's, Shikamaru made quick work of one of Kabuto's teammates trapping him in his shadow possession technique while knocking him out. The other one fared worse and had a draw with his opponent eliminating them both.

Once they drew numbers the matches were as followed, Naruto was fighting Gaara, Hinata has to fight her own cousin Neji, Tenten had the task of trying to deal with Temari and her long range combat and Shikamaru had to fight Yakumo. He sighed at knowing he'll deal with the red head sooner rather than later, but he had a month to prepare and he'll use that time wisely. In the meantime he headed towards the interrogation room where Ibiki was waiting.

"Lord Hokage told me you were coming." He mentioned letting him in "I don't know how you plan to make her crack when I couldn't get a word out of her but good luck." He nodded as he entered the room as Ibiki closed the door. Kin was there with a neutral expression, chained up and her chakra sealed.

"I don't care how many you leaf scum send, I won't say a damn thing." Kin spat.

"Why do you resist?" He asked.

"What you plan to do to me is nothing compared to what Lord Orochimaru would have in store if he found out i squealed." She mentioned.

"You honestly think he cares, he'd of rescued you by now wouldn't he?" He asked.

"Spare me your lies, he'll come, I'm valuable to him." Kin insisted.

"Your failure to cooperate will put you in a position you won't like." He warned.

"Do your worst, I was trained to resist all types of torture and interrogation tactics, ask your friend outside." Kin scoffed.

"Not what I had in mind." He began. "Are you familiar with the Living Puppet Seal?"

"Lord Orochimaru mentioned that, he wanted his hands on it but couldn't find it. Why do you." She trailed and her eyes widened "No, you couldn't have!"

"I did, and I have." He mentioned "I know that technique and I will not hesitate to apply it on you if I have to, but you can be spared of this fate if you tell me exactly what I need to know. Your choice." Kin weighed her options before answering.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: During the interrogation with Naruto and Kin

choices: He uses the Living Puppet Seal on her
He backs off like Kin predicted
Kin changes her mind and talks
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"You don't have the guts." Kin blinked.

"Want to try me?" Naruto warned. Kin waved it off.

"Spare the tough guy act, I see it in your eyes you don't want to use it on me." Kin mentioned.

"I won't deny that, but I will if I have to, don't test me." Naruto advised.

"Go ahead then, enslave me, I dare you." Kin coerced.

Naruto glared at her, he really didn't want to do it, but he wanted this information, he approached her and started doing hand signs.

"Last chance." He warned.

"You're not going to do it, I know it, you know it." Kin boasted. I have nothing to worry about he won't do it, will he? Kin was starting to sweat a bit, maybe this wasn't such a good idea?
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: She calls his bluff

choices: Skip to the next part of the tournament
Meanwhile with Mikoto watching her son in the mental ward
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Just so you know, you brought this upon yourself." He told her finishing his hand signs and bringing out the tools needed to draw the seal on her. After making contact with her skin he started to make the seal.

"No, you were serious?!" Kin gulped as she felt him draw the seal. "Wait I changed my mind, I'll talk!"

"Too late for that, once I start drawing it I can't stop, I'll destroy your mind leaving you a vegetable." He consoled "I really wished you spoke up sooner." Kin paled at that.

"What will happen to me?" She asked.

"Not much, you'll be compelled to do what I order you to if I so choose, you'll call me Master instead of my name, you'll sense I'm in danger and go into puppet mode to defend me if I'm in real trouble but other than that you'll still be you." He explained "Just so you know I'm doing the incomplete version, the full version of this seal locks your memories away too so you'd be a mindless servant without knowing why."

"Why would you do that?" She asked as the seal was nearing completion.

"It's as you said, I hate using this seal, I didn't want it to come to this, I don't want anyone to be my slave, not even my enemy." He explained.

"But I'm still going to be submissive to you, like a puppet?" Kin asked.

"In a sense, but I don't like to abuse it." He answered almost done.

"I see, I suppose this could be worse, you're nothing like Lord Orochimaru." She admitted.

"Since you'll be bound to me forever he won't be your lord any more, you're practically one of us now." He told her.

"I figured as much." Kin sighed. She felt him wrapping up on her arm.

"You'll feel a sharp pain then lose consciousness for a half an hour." He warned as he finished the incomplete version of the Living Puppet Seal and sure enough that's what happened to her as she felt the pain and went unconscious. When she came too she looked at him feeling different.

"Well, you weren't lying." Kin admitted. "I do feel submissive to you, but other than that nothing."

"Good." He mentioned "Now that your bound to me and will do as I say I could force the information out of you, but I'll still give you a chance to tell me willingly."

"I'm actually curious to see if it truly works." Kin said "That and I don't want to betray my soon to be former village, even if my soon to be ex leader is as uncaring as you said."

"Loyal to the end, I respect that." Naruto praised. "Very well, tell me what you know about what Orochimaru is planning." Kin felt the command and couldn't stop herself from replying.

"He's planning an invasion, I don't know the full details but it involves your ex allies Suna." She answered. His eyes widened, he knew Suna and Konoha were allies for a long time, predating the third war. For them to betray the leaf was surreal.

"Why, why betray us?!" he asked.

"They are unhappy with your village taking all the missions and profit, leaving them with nothing." She told him.

"What was your role?" He asked.

"All I was told after that was to test Sasuke's power, I don't know much else, he didn't trust that information to my team and I in case we got caught." She admitted.

"So he used you for as a guinea pig, didn't even sound like he cared if you died." He shook his head.

"It's the life of the ninja, we live and die for our village." She mentioned.

"Like tools?" He brought up.

"I suppose you can use that term, yes." She replied.

"It doesn't make it right." His eyes narrowed.

"Maybe not, but it is what it is." Kin answered "So what becomes of me now?"

"You'll live with me, now that your bound to me you're a non threat and gramps will grant your release, I can convince him to do so."

"Why, I should die." Kin was baffled.

"Not my style, you were doing your job no need to kill you for that." He explained she blinked a few times before smiling.

"You're weird, but you have a good heart." Kin said "What's your name?"

"My name is Naruto, yours?" He asked.

"Kin, it's nice to meet you Master." She replied, her eyes widened at the last part "You weren't kidding about that."

"Nope, but you'll get use to it." He told her "Come, I'll go inform gramps of my intention then I'll introduce you to the others." He untied her and undid her chakra suppression devise and held his hand out. She grabbed it and the two of them left the interrogation room.
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: He uses the Living Puppet Seal on her

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
A month has passed and much has changed, first Naruto introduced Kin to the others who they all treated kindly. She was surprised but was grateful at their generosity and made herself at home and found herself forming friendships with the others, Sasuke was still in the ward being assessed to with no signs of change as of yet but Mikoto was still hopeful. Sakura officially moved in with Naruto as her mother was still behind bars for her crimes, refusing to see Naruto anything else but a demon, she sighed sadly at this. She missed father too but Naruto wasn't to blame for that, maybe one day she'll see it too.

She was happily cleaning his apartment with Kurotsuchi, both of them in maid outfits, Kin thought about joining them, but Naruto talked her out of it with a heavy blush earning giggles from his future wives, Sakura and Kin herself revealing her jest to him. Of course none of them were idle, they trained hard to prepare for their opponents and now here they were in the arena outside. Waiting for the proctor to show up, however it wasn't Hayate but someone else. He wore a bandanna like hedgear and had brown eyes and matching hair, in his mouth is a toothpick which he took out.

"Hello everyone, I'm Genma Shiranui, I'll take over for Hayate from hear on out." He mentioned.

"What happened to Hayate?" Tenten asked, and he looked saddened.

"He was found dead this morning, killed by an unknown assailant." He mentioned, a chilled silence filled the room. Tenten was in tears and Naruto comforted her as best he could.

"Nooooo!" Yūgao cried out as she started to burst into tears, she was helped up and escorted to a private room where she could mourn in peace.

"Such as the life of a ninja, but we must carry on, after the Exam a funeral will be held for him." Genma sadly mentioned, everyone present nodded somberly as this was the life they chose. Mikoto in the stands went to find Yūgao to see if she can help, knowing the pain of losing a loved one herself.

"Let's do our best to not think about it, and focus on the Exam, Lord Hokage and Suna's Kazekage are watching as well as others, you're goal isn't to win but to impress and show you have what it takes to be Chunin." Genma mentioned. "You all know who you're facing so let's begin. First up, Tenten vs Temari."

"Tenten?" Naruto asked, she flashed him an assuring smile.

"I'll be fine, I'll win this, for Hayate's sake!" She said determined.

"Ha, what a joke, if he trained you then you must be just as easy to take down if he died like a bitch." Temari scoffed.

"What the fuck did you say?!" Tenten growled the rest of Konoha glared at her.

"Tenten, she's trying to get under your skin." Hinata mentioned.

"It's working, I'm going to tear her limb through limb!" She growled at took her spot, Temari looked unimpressed taking her spot

"How boring, time to be a disappointment for that worthless trash heap of a corpse." She laughed taking a battle stance herself.

"Now I see why your brother Gaara is messed up, he has an uncaring heartless bitch of a sister!" Tenten snarled.

Temari's eyes widened at that and growled back.

"You have no idea what he goes through." She warned.

"Like you care, I bet you were right there with them inflicting him with whatever he went through." Tenten mentioned. Temari snarled.

"Start the match!" She flat out said.

"Finally something we can agree on." Tenten remarked.

"Ready?" Genma said, both girls glaring at each other. "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Skip to the next part of the tournament

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
The two of them went at it hard, Tenten was finding difficulty getting in close due to Temari's long range advantage and throwing weapons at her didn't work. Luckily she prepared for this and had a sticky bomb on her, one that was a bit heavy. Throwing it at her Temari scoffed but her arrogance was punished as the gooey substance covered her.

"Ugh!" Temari growled "Really?" She tried to move but it was hard. This gave Tenten the opening she needed and charged her, Temari was trying hard to free her fan from captivity, only managing to do so when she felt Tenten's blade right near her neck eyes widened in disbelief.

"Yield it's over." Tenten snarled. Temari made the motion to surrender, only to do a cheap shot and blow her back.

"You cheating bitch!" Tenten snarled.

"We're ninja's, the fight is never over until the opponent dies, you think your enemy will want to be captured, don't make me laugh." Temari scoffed.

Meanwhile on the rooftop Hiruzen and the 'Kazekage' 'Rasa' watched on.

"Temari has a point wouldn't you agree?" 'Rasa' asked Soon, it's only a matter of time he thought.

"I can't argue with that, many ninja fight to the death or kill themselves." Hiruzen agreed Thanks to Naruto's report I'm on to you, once you make your move I'll make mine. He thought.

Meanwhile back tot he fight Temari had the advantage again, but Tenten with quick thinking had an idea.

"Tell me, how often do you beat up Garra?" She asked, Temari growled an sneered.

"What?!" She yelled. "How dare you."

"What, it's a legit question, with how cold you are you must of abused him, or stood by and did nothing, which is worse." Tenten mentioned.

"I." She paused "I tried to be there for him, but the villagers." She muttered. Tenten now understood what was going on.

"Was he treated like a demon?" She asked, Temari's eyes widened again but nodded.

"Thought so, my future husband knows that all too well." She mentioned glaring at the audience when saying that.

"I see." Temari chuckled "Can your future husband save him?"

"If anyone can do it, he can." Tenten assured.

"Doubt it, but it's worth a shot." Temari mentioned "Anything to save my brother."

"I'll tell him to do that then. not that I need to, he'd do it anyways." Tenten assured.

"Thanks." Temari said "Sorry about what I said earlier."

"Apology accepted, I'm sorry too." Tenten said back, "Shall we keep going?"

"No, that won't be necessary, I lost already, I just didn't realize it yet." Temari admitted "proctor I forfeit."

"Got it, Winner Tenten." Genma shouted, the two of them nodded and went back.

Gaara looked angry at her but she didn't care, she just hoped when the invasion happened Tenten can keep true to her word.

"With that match out of the way I'll call the next set of fighters. Hinata, Neji you're up." Genma called out

"Fate has finally granted me this fight." Neji snarled, Hinata said nothing and arrived in the arena as Neji did.

"Give up now, fate has declared you'll lose." Neji spat.

"Still filled with unnecessary hatred, your father's death wasn't my fault." Hinata said sadly.

"Enough of your lies, it's your fault he's dead and now you'll pay!!" Neji growled not interested in what she has to say.

"I was trying to make things better for you but you insist on thinking you're bound to this mystical force and can't change things, but I see words will not sway you." Hinata got into her battle pose. "So action will have to do."

"Fate is on my side, you will not win, I will have my revenge." Neji spat and got into his battle stance.

"Ready?" Genma asked "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Tenten wins

choices: Mikoto arrived to congratulate her team
Temari decides to stall the invasion
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
Neji and Hinata blocked blow for blow, both being close ranged fighters they got up and close both of them had their Byakugan activated, Neji used a kaiten to repel her but Hinata got out of the way and went in behind his blind spot to strike when he finished spinning, Neji groaned as he felt a chakra point seal up from her strike.

"I'm not a pushover anymore Neji, I won't be bullied by you, by the council, or by any of my family." Hinata growled

"A spineless coward pretending to be something she's not." Neji spat.

"People change Neji, this 'fate' you ramble on about is an excuse, one I know you don't believe in, why else do you learn the Hyuga style. For someone who claims to hate us you defiantly learn the technique." Hinata fought back.

"Proctor I wish to kill her." Neji growled, Hinata sighed.

"I pity you Neji, I tried to reason with you but if you insist on fighting me, I'm going to stop going easy on you." Hinata warned.

"Bold talk for a." He didn't finish as she went in hard and fast and attacked him with a speed he's not use to, but he smirked at said.

"You are within range of my divination." He said.

"Actually you're within mine." Hinata mentioned. Both of them readied their attack.

"Eight trigrams sixty-four palms!" Neji cried.

"Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms!" Hinata cried, they exchanged blow for blow hitting each other sixty four times before stopping. They both panted.

"I was never the offensive type so I learned to protect instead." Hinata mentioned "But that doesn't mean I can't do offense."

"True Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms!" Hinata shouted.

"What?" Neji exclaimed as she struck him and sealed every chakra point with her attack.

In the stands Hiashi looked on proud as Hanabi beside him was smiling.

"Sister is doing it!" She cheered, he nodded before getting up. "Where are you going father?"

"To right a wrong." He replied before leaving "Watch over her." A Hyuga guard nodded and watched over Hanabi as he left.

Back to the fight Neji groaned and couldn't move.

"Kill me." He snarled "Fate decreed it so apparently."

"No, I won't, you're family even if my family has forsaken me I will never see you as anything else." Hinata replied "You can defy fate Neji, you're smart, determined and one day the Hyuga clan will be better, I just wish I could've done it, but it's going to have to be you now."

"A pipe dream, a second branch like me has no chance, not while I'm trapped like a bird." He said referring to his Caged Bird Seal.

"A bird can free itself if it wants to, just destroy the cage." Hinata said and extended her hand. Neji looked up at her, nodded and took it. As she helped him up.

"I'll fix the clan, for both of us." Neji promised, Hinata smiled and nodded.

"Winner, Hinata." Genma yelled. Everyone cheered as she head back, at that point Hiashi appeared before him.

"Come with me, we have much to discuss." He told him, Neji glared but followed him to a private area.

"Great job Hinata." Tenten praised.

"Yeah, I knew you could do it." Naruto added. She blushed at the praise.

"On to the next fight, Yakumo vs Shikamaru." Genma shouted.

"Troublesome I have to fight a girl, I should probably forfeit." Shikamaru grumbled.

"Oh no you don't." Ino said and pushed him down and he landed on the arena. Yakumo was there and bowed to him.

"May the best ninja win." Yakumo said.

"At least your not a troublesome woman, still I might as well fight as I'm here." Shikamaru mentioned.

"Ready?" Genma asked "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Hinata wins

1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.content:
"Hey, sorry I didn't catch most of the fight, but I heard the results." Mikoto said as she arrived to sit with her team.

"Hey Naomi sensei." Hinata greeted.

"How's the patient?" Tenten asked referring to Sasuke.

"Still no signs of improvement, I'm worried it might be him." Mikoto sighed "But I won't give up hope, I refuse to believe he's like that."

"I hope he recovers too, I don't want to think about if it isn't the seal." Naruto said. "But on the off chance, what will happen to him?"

"The Hokage is talking about permanently sealing his charka and removing his Sharingan." She sighed "I convinced him to do it, no matter what he's done he's my 'patient'."

"I know." Naruto nodded "I'll do what I can too." He assured.

"Thanks." Mikoto smiled. "Anyways that Yakumo girl is tricky to take down."

"Tell me about it, Shikamaru is pulling out all the stops to try and defeat her." Hinata mused.

"Let's see if he can pull it off." Tenten added.

During the fight Shikarmaru was using strategy after strategy and it looked like Yakumo had him when she stopped and the Genjutsu she placed on him dispelled.

"Shadow Possession finally a success." He said, he went to go finish her off but before he did he stopped. "I forfeit, I'm almost out of chakra I can only hold the technique a few more seconds before you can capitalize."

"Why, I have a weak body, I can't do much other then trap you in Genjutsu's and get a lucky hit in." Yakumo explained.

"I took that into account, you have enough chakra to trap me in an illusion or two, and with me running low I wouldn't be able to dispel it, it'd be troublesome to continue." Shikamaru explained.

"Right, Winner Yakumo." Genma shouted, the crowd weren't happy but Shikamaru didn't care as he went back.

"To think that far ahead, he truly is a genius, if only he wasn't so lazy." Mikoto praised.

"Up next, Naruto vs Gaara." Genma shouted.

"Good luck." Mikoto said and kissed his cheek, Hinata and Tenten followed suit.

"Hey." Kurotsuchi said as she scooted down with them. "Leave one for me." She kissed him in the cheek as well.

He smiled at them and kissed them back and went to face Gaara.

"Prove my existence." Gaara said. Naruto said nothing and got into his battle stance.

"Ready?" Genma started "Begin!"
1511122222222222222112212312221333221222.title: Mikoto arrived to congratulate her team

15221221.content:
Ash, Brock, and Dawn were ready to part ways, Ash to Pallet Town, Brock to become a Pok'mon doctor, and Dawn to prepare for becoming a Pok'mon fashion designer. Piplup had really taken it hard, as he and Pikachu had formed a bond during their trainers' journeys, and saw each other as brothers, not to say that the trainers wanted to actually part ways. Piplup and Pikachu were in a forest with Ash, the two Pok'mon playing a game before they'd have to part, when Piplup tripped over something and face-planted. Piplup got up and dusted himself off, then checked the ground to see what he tripped over. He saw something partially buried underground, and began trying to dig it up. Ash and Pikachu came over.

"What'cha got there, Piplup?" Ash asked as he and Pikachu helped dig it up. The object turned out to be a box with something inside. Ash opened the box to see... "Dolls? Darn, I was hoping it would be something neat." He said as he took out one of the dolls. Even for people who liked dolls, there would probably be a similar response, as these dolls were completely blank, no faces, whether bad or not, or clothes, just pure white. The box was filled with them, and strangely, even though he took one out, it still looked completely filled up. Suddenly the three heard someone coming and turned around. Dawn stepped into the clearing.

"There you are, I've been looking for you guys." Dawn said, before noticing that Ash was holding something. "What's that?" She motioned towards the doll.

"Just some doll I found." Ash replied, holding it up. "There's nothing special... about...it." Ash continued, but was surprised by the end of it, since as soon as Dawn made eye contact with where the face of the doll would be, she got a faraway look on her face, and the doll shifted to look exactly like her, clothes and all. Dawn fell to the ground on her back, strangely not even making so much as a thud as she hit the ground. She just lied there, not moving an inch, not even appearing to breathe, as she stared up, her eyes blank. "Dawn!" Ash cried out as he and the Pok'mon ran towards her. Ash lifted her to a sitting position, noting that she felt next to weightless. "Come on Dawn, snap out of it!" Ash called out as he began shaking her. He dropped the doll, which landed on Dawn's leg, and to the surprise of Ash and the two Pok'mon, the doll sunk into Dawn's body. Dawn's eyes cleared up as she began blinking. "Dawn! Are you alright!?" Ash asked. Dawn turned to him and smiled.

"No need to worry, master!" She replied.

"That's good, I was..." Ash began before his eyes went wide. "Did you just call me master?" Dawn gave a cheerful nod.

"Of course, since I'm your doll now, that makes you my owner, would you like me to call you something else?" Dawn replied, a happy smile still on her face.

"Wait, my doll? What's going on?" Ash asked, tilting his head in confusion. "Also, just call me Ash, like usual."

"Alright Ash, I'll explain. That box you found is an ancient and magical artifact." Dawn begins. "It creates an infinite supply of blank dolls. The first male to touch the box is the owner. If the owner holds up a blank doll to a girl and has her make eye contact with the spot its face should be, the doll turns into a likeness of the girl, and the girl's body becomes a lifeless doll. However, if the doll is placed on the girl's body, the girl regains life, as the doll of the owner of the box."

"Wait, how do you know this?" Ash asked.

"The spell of the dolls gives the girl transformed into a doll all of this knowledge." Dawn replied simply. "Moving on, as a doll, all I can want on my own is for my owner, I.E. you, to play with me, otherwise, I can't want anything unless you want me to want it. Also, I no longer have bones or any of my non-reproductive organs, my status as a doll means that I don't need them, and my knowledge isn't contained in my brain anymore, but in my whole body, which is lucky since I don't a brain is one of the organs that I no longer have. I also don't need to eat, can make myself as heavy or light as needed, and be posed in any position that you want me to be posed in. Everyone who wasn't with you when you became owner of the box will see any girl being your doll as normal, and anyone who knew one of your old dolls will automatically know that they are a doll. I don't feel pain, and you can put me in a "sleep mode," which makes it so that my consciousness shuts down, and I will be unaware of anything you do, or of any amount of time passing. You can also communicate with any of your living dolls mentally, so you don't have to speak your commands if you don't want to. Also, you can keep me from being pregnant if you want, and you can have me age at the same rate as you or not age at all if you want."

"That's a lot." Ash said in awe, the box's magic giving him all of the knowledge of terms used in the description that he didn't know.

"There's one more thing, you can directly take over one of your living dolls, controlling it as if it is your own." Dawn explained. "The only sign of this is that their eye color is replaced with yours, for example, if you took over my body, my eyes would go from blue to brown while you would be in control." One thing hidden from Dawn so that she couldn't prepare Ash for it is that the owner would suddenly have the subconscious desire to increase his collection of dolls.

"So Dawn, what are you going to do about being a fashion designer?" Ash asked, curiously.

"As I have no desires of my own, I have no interest in it, and only wish to accompany you." Dawn said simply. "If you'll allow it, that is." Ash nodded.

"Of course I will, I'll be glad to have you come along with me!" Ash said excitedly. Dawn gave a joyful expression at that.

What happens next?
15221221.title: Dolly Dawn

1523121111.content:
It was another day at Duel Academy, the sun was shining, the birds were singing, and our hero, Jaden Yuki, had once again saved the world from utter destruction.

Looking over his shoulder and saw a figure dressed in a long white cloak and a hat. “Who the heck are you?” she demanded.

“That’s not important, just think of me as a fan.” The person replied, “And I must say my dear that was quite a wonderful display.”

The figure then flicked his wrist and from his large sleeve a long staff emerged from it, “However let’s sees how you fair against me, I’m curious to see how I fair against a Shinigami.”

“Ha, you’re pretty cocky. I don’t know what you are but this will be a very short fight.” Rangiku replied as she readied her zanpakto.

The two of them clashed, the figure using his staff to block each of Rangiku’s attacks as well as us it to cast various spells.

“Wha..what the hell are you?” Rangiku demanded.

“Oh me, I believe the tongue of this world I am a chaos mage.” The person replied.

“A chaos what?” Rangiku asked a confused tone.

“But enough about me, I believe it’s time we brought this contest to an end.” The figure replied, “You’ve been a fine opponent, however, victory is mine.”

“What are you talking about?” Rangiku shot back.

The mage pointed his staff at the buxom Shinigami and it began giving a strange looking glow whilst at the same time he was saying some kind of chant. Just then a strange bolt of energy struck Rangiku in the chest which knocked her to the ground.

As she lay there a burning sensation spread across Rangiku’s body. When she tried to move, she found that she couldn’t.

‘What’s going on?’ These were Rangiku’s final thoughts, it was getting harder for her to think, and no matter how hard she tried, she couldn’t get her body to move.

The mage looked over her, “I hope you like your new life, albeit you really have no say in the matter. I’m sure the guy who finds you will take care of you.” With that, he walked off. “Seriously, the things I do to get these damn plots started.” He said before vanishing.

A few seconds later two people arrived on the scene, the pair being none other than Rukia Kuchki and the human turned substitute Shinigami Ichigo Kurosaki.

“We're here, so where’s the damn Hollow?” Ichigo asked his companion.

“I don’t know, I can’t seem to pick up any kind a trace of it.” Rukia replied.

Just then…

153332222211.title: How does it happen?

1533322222111.content:
"You sure about this? Something seems kinda off about this?"

Suji looked across at his fellow deliveryman "Look, the shipping manifest says we deliver it here, so we deliver it here. I don't see what's so complicated about that!"

Suji sighed. Of all the people he could get saddled with, it had to be Masahiro; the guy was the least popular person in the entire company and completely anal about going by the book. From the moment he'd read the shipping manifest, he knew that even if he had questions Masahiro would disregard any possible problems that might keep him from making the delivery as specified. The man was a colossal prick!

Sighing again, he helped his friend unload the larger boxes which contained fertilizer and potting soil and a few other things as well as the strange wooden crate that was to be delivered to the Koryou High School Gardening Club.

After asking a few students for directions, they finally ended up at the greenhouse. Upon entering, they were greeted by a young student.

"Are you a member of the Gardening Club of Koryou High?" Mashiro asked formally. Suji sighed; this guy was always on the clock, always no-nonsense.

"Sure am! I guess these are the supplies we ordered?" he asked, looking over the sheet at the items being delivered.

"If that's what the manifest says, that's what's there" Masahiro replied, drawing a sharp look from his colleague at his complete lack of social skills.

Kenichi blinked for a moment before flicking through the manifest to make sure everything was accounted for. He stopped at the final entry. "What's with this plant?"

Masahiro, once again the master of tact, replied "I don't know; I just deliver what's on the manifest. Maybe someone else in your club ordered it"

Kenichi shrugged. 'Maybe Izumi put an order in for it and didn't tell me?' he wondered. 'Hope it doesn't affect the club's budget too much, it's stretched thin as it is!'

She was going to be coming later, so he'd ask her then. Not that it was a problem or anything.

As the deliverymen left he began arranging and sorting out everything, putting the potting soil along with the others by the wall in the shade and the fertilizer in the locked room at the back. When everything was done he moved on to the strange looking wooden box. Using a nearby trowel he levered the box open and peered inside.

He wasn't sure what to expect, but not this. The plant seemed to be a group of stems that extended from a raised bulbous base covered in very long, fine hairs. Though the flowers were unusual, they looked almost like an open shark's mouth with petals coloured in a pattern of blues, purples and yellows.

He noticed a note enclosed with the plant in the box. Simple instructions, the plant seemed to be pretty adaptable; all it needed was simple repotting.

Nearly half an hour later the potting was done, but he couldn't help but stare searchingly at the plant. He couldn't explain it, but it just seemed so...interesting!

He leaned in close to look at the flower, it seemed so attractive suddenly. Absently he reached his hand out to brush the hairs on the bulbous base.

No sooner had he touched them than the flowers moved, almost as if they were rearing away from him...only to reel back as the plant fired a cloud of...pollen?...straight into his face. Coughing, he quickly began wiping at his face. He remembered that there was a shower in one of the rooms in back of the place, it being a converted building.

Huffing in frustration he quickly walked towards the shower as he silently groused over yet another thing going wrong today: Ragnarok's goons hunting him, forgetting his bento box with Miu's delicious cooking in it, falling asleep during an important lesson and now this. Not to mention that the shower only had cold water...he shuddered at that thought.

Turning on the water he stepped under the stream of water and shivered at the temperature as it hit his skin. But he realised quickly it wasn't just the temperature of the water; he felt his skin prickle, and he felt oddly...warm...

He decided he'd rinsed enough to get the 'pollen' off and exited the shower. As he was toweling off, he felt his vision become hazy for a moment and he became unsteady on his feet. Regaining his equilibrium he finished drying himself and went to dress himself in his spare PE uniform.

He still felt tired, and wondered if he should visit the nurse or go straight back to Ryouzanpaku.

Which option did he choose?

1543311.content: And whose clothing will our Prinny possess
1543311.title: A Prinny

15433111.content:
It was another glorious day in the netherworld....... If you were a demon,but for the prinnies, the poor damned souls of men forced into servitude to their thankless masters. Being that they no longer have bodies of their own anymore, they are sown into bodies that resemble rag doll like penguin with bat wings and peg legs. Made to work hard while the demons lazy about and are barely paid for their efforts, if at all. It is a sad life to be a Prinny...... Until now!




Within the Castle of the Demon Lord Etna, a Prinny was carrying a basket full of recently cleaned clothes. His main job here was to make sure that Lady Etna's laundry nice and clean for his mistress. He was walking down a corridor to take these clean cloths to get iron and fold, by another group of prinnies, we hears a boom yell of pure anger.

"WWWWHHHHEEERRRREEEE AAAAARRRREEE YYYYYYOOOOOUUUU!!!!!!"

With a chill down his spine as he turns to see Etna racing down the corridor with a massive axe and a face twisted in rage! She addressed the Prinny, " YYYYOOOUUUU!!!!!! DON'T YOU DARE MOVE!" The Prinny stops in his tricks, now breaking out in a cold sweat as Etna stops infront of him, with a look on her face they would make even death scared. " W-w-what can I d-do for you, my lady..... Dood." Etna thrust a pair of pink panties in front of him. " Tell me Prinny........ What. Are. These?" The Prinny is nearly mute with fear, but still answers. " I think......they're panties.... " Etna quickly cuts him off, " YES! MY PANTIES! CARE TO GUESS WHERE I FOUND THEM!!!!!!!"

At this point the Prinny know he was dead. She had found his secret stash that he had hidden. He had to say something, something. "Aw-well, mistress, I, um, it's my job to do, eh, the laundry... So...... Um, dood, um.....OH PLEASE FORGIVE ME, LADY ETNA!" He couldn't think of anything beyond begging for his life, maybe by some Miracle she would be merciful, when the netherworld freezes over. He dropped down, bowing over the basket of clothes with his head down, asking for forgiveness, for mercy! Eyes closed tight to hold back the tears, awaiting whatever fate she came up with. " Mercy? Alright, I will be merciful. You go..... " The Prinny nearly couldn't believe this, was she seriously doing this. He started to lifted his head up, teary eyed, ready to thank her from the bottom of his heart. " Oh thank you lady et-" his words were cut off, as everything went black.

Next thing he knows, everything was black. He felt strange, stranger than usual. He could not really tell were he was, but it felt like he was felt..... Buried and crushed. " Oh lord dood! Have I been buried in the ground, did she bury me? Oh lord dood, am I DEAD! ......Oh wait, I am already dead, but what happened?!" As he tried to move around he couldn't even do that. He then felt a sudden shock and hears the sound of an explosion. Above him he hears a faint chuckle, " Yeah, you can go.... Through a wall. Dang, pervert prinny." That was the voice of Lady Etna..... And that pervert was him..... But wait, he was okay. He wasn't hit into a wall nor did he explode. So what happened to him. He then heard Etna's muffled groan, "That stupid prinny's explosion got my outfit dirty. Great......... Atleast he had some clean clothes ready." The Prinny start to feel himself shuffled around, as off whatever t
Was burying him was being moved around. Then, a blinding light as he felt himself left upward, to facing Etna. " Hmmm, I guess this will do." With that he know exactly what had happened. She had hit with her axe, in fact she hit him so hard that his soul had been knocked out of his body and into the basket of clothes. " OMDG dood. I am in clothes!!"


Which outfit is he in?
15433111.title: Feeling Prinny!

1551311.content:
(Takes place after Starforce 1)

Geo yawned as he rose out of bed

"Morning Omega-Xis." He said, putting on his visualiser to look at his AM-ian companian.

Omega-Xis nodded to Geo "You better wave change, I just saw an explosion go off down town." Omega-Xis pointed out.

"How do you know if it's virus related?" Geo asked, then noticed that there were a large amount of Sattela Police passing by, including... "Of course, if Copper is involved in this, then it has to be virus related." Geo sighed. "But what about mom?"

"Out already, she left a note" Omega-Xis replied.

"Ok, EM wave change, Geo Stellar, on air!" Geo shouted, transforming into Megaman as he teleported to downtown.

---

Whose the one attacking?
1551311.title: One morning that is sure to be chaotic.

choices: They teleport to another part of the wave world
15513112.content:
As Megaman materialised on the wave road he was genuinely shocked. The source of the disturbance was, to both Geo and Omega-Xis's surprise, Queen Ophiuca.

"What the heck?" Megaman asked "How is Ophiuca back?"

"She must have bonded with Luna again." Omega-Xis replied. Ophiuca turned around, noticing Megaman.

."So we meet again Omega-Xis." she said, then seemed to be struggling against her will.

"Help Megaman, she took me by surprise!" Luna shouted.

"Be quiet human!" Ophiuca shouted back.

"Geo, I have an idea" Omega-Xis spoke up.

"Why?" Megaman asked. "All I need to do is fight her"

"Not a very safe idea, if that Platz girl has enough control to immobilize Ophiuca, even for a brief time, then she might be injured or used as a human shield by Ophiuca." Omega-Xis pointed out "I might have a solution though."

"I'm listening." Megaman said, narrowly dodging a Gorgon's eye laser from Ophiuca, who was currently fighting for control.

"Well, I'm an AMian and Ophiuca is an FMian right?"

"Yeah?"

"Well I might be able to make an AM-FM ian link." Omega-Xis said. "Basically, by making an EM wave link and hitting her with it, it would make Ophiuca obey any order you or I make, plus she would have to stay within a certain distance of us. We wouldn't be able to change her feelings towards someone, but she would have to answer truthfully to any questions we have. However..." Omega trailed off.

"What?" Megaman asked.

"Its kind of like an enhanced brotherband, which relies on Luna's love. Plus side: she wont fall out of love with you, even as Geo, but on here's the bad side: Ophiuca and her will both be affected." Omega-Xis explained.

"How would we explain that to our parents without blowing the whole thing up in our faces!" Megaman shouted. When he noticed the odd look given to him by Omega-Xis he added. "I mean without revealing you and my identity as Megaman."

"Say that you found Luna on the street after the disturbance and it was a strange after effect." Omega-Xis suggested.

Megaman face-faulted. "That has to be one of the worst cover stories I've ever heard!"

"You got any better ideas?" Omega-Xis asked.

Megaman sighed. "Fine, how long will it take?"

"I've got it ready now." Omega-Xis replied, glowing gold "Fire away."

"Right." Megaman said, aiming at Queen Ophiuca. "Bondlinkband go!" Both himself and Omega-Xis shouted in unison, firing off a continuous gold stream. As it hit Queen Ophiuca, both Megaman and Queen Ophiuca glowed gold.

As the gold faded away, Queenn Ophiuca shook her head. "What was that Megaman?" Luna asked, before gasping in shock. "Hey wait, how am I in control, that snake lady should be fighting me."

"My idea." Omega-Xis said. "We'll explain later, first we should get out of here." He pointed out, the Satella police arriving on the scene.

What do they do?
15513112.title: Queen Ophiuca? (Luna's path)

155131121.content:
In a blur of Multicoloured energy both Queen Ophiucas (Luna will now be referred to as Queen Ophiucas while in EM wave form, as she fully controls the form) and Megaman teleported from the middle of downtown to just over Vista Point.

"Any reason why Vista Point Geo?" Omega-Xis asked.

"Not really, it just seems to be the most quiet place anywhere." Megaman replied "Now, Luna, do you have full control of your body?"

"And more importantly, Ophiucas herself?" Omega-Xis added.

"With Geo's question, yes I do, and to Omega's question (She must have been introduced to Omega-Xis sometime after discovering Geo's alter ego) the snake lady has gone into a sleep like state, she's there but in a sort of trance."

Omega-Xis paused for a second, then spoke up "You're currently in a state known only to a select few AMians, I'm the last known one of them. It's known as an AM-FM Link, and currently you're under it. It makes any FMian such as Ophiucas in a submissive state has them obey the linker's commands and must stay within a certain distance of the wielder, but the problem is it can only be formed if the one under the command has feelings for the other." He said.

Queen Ophiucas realized what this meant "So you used my love to form the link?" She asked.

"Yeah, and since we're the linkers, and your love was used, it will affect you as well." Megaman said.

"Exactly, but there is one side effect, the link will compel you to have what is equivalent to sex every... week or so I think." Omega-Xis quickly finished.

"WHY DIDN"T YOU MENTION THAT BEFORE?" Megaman shouted.

"Because you'd never had done it otherwise."

Megaman paused for a second "Good point." He murmured. "When does this thing need to happen?"
