1552112.content: Will this take place while Ash is in Unova (I know that usually these things would go in the order that he went to them, but I have plans for this one, and I want to get to it sooner, if someone else wants to start a Unova one, then they can just make it an option later)?
1552112.title: Unova?

15521121.content:
Usually I put the events of a movie as having taken place in between the two episodes that aired right before and after, but seeing as the Victini movie aired right smack in the middle of the Nimbasa Town tournament, I can't do that for obvious reasons, so I'll put the movie after the Archeops episode.

Ash, Iris, Cilan, Pikachu, and Axew were in a forest, one day away from where they would eventually meet Luke and his Zorua. It was currently night time. Iris was asleep on a tree branch, with Axew sleeping in her hair, Cilan was sleeping in his sleeping bag, and Ash was awake in his sleeping bag, looking at the stars, with Pikachu sleeping on his stomach.

"I miss them." Ash said to himself with a sigh. "Brock is working on being a Pokemon Doctor, Max is studying under his father, and Tracey is enjoying working for Professor Oak, but I wish my female friends could still be with us. Misty is only stuck at her and her sisters' Gym since her sisters are so irresponsible, May is currently doing some contests, and Unova has no contests, and last I heard, Dawn was designing fashion clothes for Pokemon. I just wish they would be back, and that we could travel together forever..." Ash said as he fell asleep. Unknown to Ash, however, his wish had been heard.

---

The Millennium Comet had been hit by a meteor, and knocked off course, returning to the view of the Pokemon World. Jirachi had been checking on his friends while the comet was there, and heard Ash's wish.

'Ash has saved this world several times, he deserves some help with this.' Jirachi thought, before sending out a telepathic message to some other Legendaries who he believed could help. Before long, the Mew from the first movie, the Manaphy that saw May as his mother, as well as Azelf, Uxie, and Mespirit, were in a telepathic conversation with Jirachi, who had explained the situation.

'Ash has saved the world several times, and went on to save Mewtwo from Giovanni.' Mew thought to the others, remember the help Ash brought to her son (the Mew from that movie seemed like a girl, and in the games, it says that Mew gave birth to Mewtwo).

'I want Dada and Mama to be together again.' Manaphy thought.

'Poor Ash... always having to part way with his friends.' Mespirit said, getting very emotional.

'We have to help him out.' Azelf said determinately, wishing to help out his chosen one. With them all in agreement, they set to work. Azelf, Mespirit, and Uxie created three sets of Red Chains, Mew created some jewels with her psychic powers, one red, one blue, and one pink, and unknown to Jirachi, made them able to teleport off of the girls and able to appear near other girls an hour after the change is permanent, which would take exactly 24 hours. The Red Chains and jewels were put together to make three necklaces. Manaphy used his heart based powers to make the necklaces connected to Ash's heart, so that the wearers would desire to serve Ash upon putting them on, wouldn't want to take them off until it was permanent, and that they would be able to track Ash down, no matter where he was, or how far away from him the wearers were. They also made it so only girls can be affected. The Millennium Comet was almost out of distance for Jirachi to communicate with the others.

'I wish you luck!' Jirachi thought, before the psychic link was cut off. Mew then proceeded to teleport the necklaces to Misty, May, and Dawn. Misty would get the one with the blue jewel since she loves the water, May the one with the red jewel because of her fondness for the color red (she had changed back into her original outfit not long after leaving Ash's group in Sinnoh), and Dawn got the pink one do to how girly she is.

---

Misty was sitting bored at the Cerulean Gym, waiting for challengers, and wishing her sisters were more responsible so that she could return to Ash and not worry about the Gym's reputation being ruined again. Unknown to Misty, Jirachi heard that thought before the comet was out of range, and told Mew about it. Suddenly, the necklace mentioned before appeared in Misty's hands.

"Huh? That's odd." She said, before feeling an overwhelming desire to wear the necklace. She put it on, and her green eyes became glazed over, the pupils vanishing altogether, as a single sentence repeatedly went through her head, drowning out all other coherent thought. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She thought repeatedly, her body going on autopilot as she stood up and went to get some Pokemon to take with her to go find Ash. She took Staryu, Corsola, and Gyarados's Poke Balls and put them in her bag, unknown to her, Psyduck's Poke Ball rolled into it as well. She picked up Azurill to carry it like she normally does. She heads out of her room and towards the door to leave, when her sisters show up.

"Misty, where are you going?" Daisy asked. None of them saw how Misty's eyes were glazed over since the necklaces were made so that only girls who were affected, and Ash when he finds out about it, would be able to notice it.

"I'm going to find Ash to travel with him again." Misty said in a monotone voice.

"What about the Gym?" Violet asks.

"It's your Gym, why don't you take some responsibility for it?" Misty said in an angry tone. "In fact, why don't you take any responsibly for your actions for once in your lives!?"

"Now come on Misty, that's not fair." Lily replied, about to poorly try to defend their actions, but suddenly, their eyes glazed over, just like Misty's. Mew had decided that these three were causing too much trouble, and after having a memory of Mewtwo brainwashing a Nurse Joy, did the same to Misty's sisters, causing them to do just what Misty told them. They moved out of Misty's way as she ran out, she was stopped by Georgio.

"Hey Misty, let's have another battle, and if I beat you, you'll agree to go on a date with me!" Georgio challenged her, once again trying to get a date from her.

"My sisters are taking over the Gym again, so I don't have to accept any challenges, now move so I can return to the guy I love." Misty said in an annoyed tone.

"Oh come on, what does whoever it is have that I don't?" Georgio asked.

"Move or I'll hit you with my mallet." Misty warned him, pulling said mallet out of hammer space. Georgio refused to move, believing she was bluffing, and got hit by her mallet knocking him out of the way. Misty put away the mallet, and rushed to Vermillion City in order to head out to Unova. Since the only thought going through her head was 'Must find and serve Ash,' she wasn't able to even wonder how she knew he was in Unova.

---

May was in a Pokemon Center, getting back her Pokemon from Nurse Joy. She had her Blaziken, Beautifly, Skitty, Blastoise (Wartortle evolved), Venusaur, and Glaceon with her. Drew was nearby, hoping to ask May for a date. The necklace sent to May appeared in her hands.

"Huh? Where did this come from?" May wondered, before, as like Misty, she felt the overwhelming desire to wear it. She put it on, and like Misty, her blue eyes glazed over, losing their pupils. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' May thought repeatedly. She took her Poke Balls, and ran out the door. She almost ran into Drew, but she stopped in time.

"May, good to see you? Want to go out with me?" Drew asked, believing that she would.

"No, now get out of my way so I can find Ash." May replied.

"Oh come on!" Drew replied. "I thought you came to Johto, and now to Sinnoh since we've competed in the Johto Grand Festival in order to be with me!" He said, putting his hands on her shoulders.

"No, you're just my rival, and I'm thinking of taking a break from contests, and thinking of challenging Gyms." She said, because subconsciously, she knew there were no contests in Unova. "Now let go of me!"

"What? You can't be serious! You love contests!" He replied, not listening to the last part.

"I warned you." May said, before punching him in the gut, forcing him to let go and step back as he bent over a little. May then performed a spinning jump kick to his head, knocking him out. Nobody did anything to her, since she warned him, and he made unwanted advances on her. She then left to find a large body of water in order to use her Blastoise to ride to Unova.

---

Dawn was traveling in Johto, her team consisting of Piplup, Buneary, Pachirisu, Quilava, and, Togekiss (Mamoswine had been sent to Professor Rowan) when the necklace made for her fell to the ground in front of her. She looked at it, before feeling a desire familiar to those reading this chapter. She put it on, and like the two previously mentioned girls, her blue eyes glazed over with her pupils vanishing.

'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She thought, before running towards a body of water. Kenny got in her way.

"Hey Dawn! How about a date?" He asked.

"No way, I'm heading off to find and join Ash." She replied. He then made the same mistake that Drew did with May about asking why she liked Ash, while putting his hands on her.

"Get your hands off of me, Kenny!" She demanded in an angry tone.

"Now come on Dawn." Kenny said. "You know you like me." The poor boy was in denial, Dawn got out of his grasp, slapped him, and then kicked him in the gut as she continued on. Meanwhile, Mew had been doing the same thing she did to Misty's sisters to May and Dawn's families to stop them from getting in May and Dawn's ways.
15521121.title: First batch: Misty, May, and Dawn

choices: Second batch: Latias, Macy, and Princess Salvia (reserved by Starfighter364)
Second batch: Reader's choice of girls
Second batch: Reader's choice of girls
Second batch: Reader's choice of girls
155211211.content:
-a random cave-

As the three girls were traveling to find as, Misty by her Gyrados, May by her Blastoise, and Dawn by Togekiss, a certain clone who Ash befriended years ago after helping him realize that not all humans are bad, otherwise known as Mewtwo was keeping track of what was going on. As Ash is his friend, and seeing as the young trainer seems to attract danger like food attracts a Snorlax, Mewtwo has been keeping track of him, ready to get involved if Ash ever bites off more that he can chew. There have been a few close calls, but thankfully, Mewtwo hasn't had to get involved. Mewtwo noticed something coming up behind him.

'What is it you want Deoxys?' Mewtwo questioned two Deoxys who had come to see him, who just so happened to be the two who Ash saved while in Hoenn.

'Arceus has called for many of us to meet him at the Spear Pillar.' One of the Deoxys replied, the voice indicating that it was a male.

'It has to do with your "mother," and a few of her friends.' The second Deoxys, a female one, added.

'Very well, let's go.' All three legendaries teleported away.

-Spear Pillar-

As soon as Mewtwo arrived, he saw that in addition to him, the two Deoxys, and Arceus, that also present were: The legendary bird trio from the Orange Islands, the Lugia who declared Ash his chosen one, the Ho-oh Ash keeps seeing, the Suicune that teamed up with Ash to save the Celebi he met in Johto, Rayquaza, Groudon, Kyogre, the Mew who met Ash during the Lucario movie, the Darkrai from the first Sinnoh movie, Dialga, Palkia, Giratina, the Celebi from the Zoruark movie, and Victini were all there.

"I am glad you were all able to make it." Arceus said. "Now, we have to decide what to do about the Pokemon who brainwashed those girls."

"I figured this would come up." Mewtwo replied out loud due to Darkrai being immune to psychic powers. "And I have good arguments for why we should leave them alone." All eyes turned to him.

"Pray tell, what would those be?" Lugia asked.

"First let me ask you all this, who here hasn't been saved by Ash personally?" Only Groudon and Kyogre made any indication otherwise. "Now add to that the fact that he has saved all our butts collectively many times due to stopping the world from being destroyed. We owe him several times over, and would never be able to repay him for it, plus I think he's been wronged by a legendary in some way that he hasn't been compensated for in any way."

"Why is that?" Arceus asked, curious.

"I have been watching over him ever since the time he saved my life, which was a few years ago, and he has yet to age past 10 years old and any long term traveling companion has stopped aging after joining up with him, as have the girls who gained crushes on him, and in this newest adventure, his intelligence has been dropped, he's forgotten his whole counter-shield technique, and like most of the humans on this planet, he seems to now believe that Pokemon can only know four attacks at a time, which if he'd think about it, in the past some of his Pokemon knew more than four attacks at a time. Now, in order to protect us and others, or just the world in general, along with stopping evil organizations, he puts himself in life threatening situations, and I'm sure he will continue to save our if he lives long enough. Having more traveling companions will allow him to have the back up necessary to raise his chances of living, plus all three girls wanted an excuse to travel with him again, due to their crushes on him, but had other things that would have stopped them from ever joining him long term otherwise. You also can't deny that the sisters of the one called Misty needed to get their priorities straight, and not just pile up their duties on her since she is responsible, and the fact that the bumblers of Team Rocket have gotten competent enough to almost win a few times, I think some back up would be needed, since I'm trying not to get involved unless I absolutely need to." Every legendary was in shock about the points Mewtwo brought up, but agreed and decided they'd also work on fixing whatever stunted the growth, physically and mentally, of Ash and his companions.

-On the sea, on the way to Unova-

Misty was still on her Gyrados, mindlessly, except for the mantra she kept repeating in her head, waiting until she'd reach shore so she could track down Ash, when she heard something else heading in the same direction, she looked to the side, seeing May pull up closer. If she could think that much, she'd wonder what May was doing there, and vice versa, but when they locked eyes, they each realized that the other was a fellow servant to Ash.

"Hello May, good to see you again." Misty said with a small smile, acting on autopilot.

"Same here." May replied with a grin. "So, I guess this means that the two of us are both searching for Ash in order to serve him."

"Yeah, I'm glad it's you that I'll share that honor with, and not someone who I dislike, like that Macy girl." Misty replied, faking annoyance at the mention of the girl she mentioned, as she was currently unable to even truly feel annoyance at that moment. Suddenly they saw a shadow on the water. They looked up to see Dawn's Togekiss. "That looks a little like a Togepi or a Togetic." Misty said.

"It's a Togekiss, a Pokemon in the Sinnoh Pokedex." May replied. "It's the evolved form of Togetic." She narrowed her eyes, trying to make out the figure on the Togekiss. "Is that... Dawn!" May called out upon seeing her friend from Sinnoh, trying to get her attention, said girl heard May, looked down, and had Togekiss fly her closer. On the way down, she connected eyes with Misty and May.

"So you are a part of this as well May?" Dawn asked May, who nodded.

"Who are you?" Misty asked.

"Misty, this is Dawn, the girl who traveled with Ash in Sinnoh, and Dawn, this is Misty, the girl Ash originally used to travel with."

"Nice to meet you!" Dawn said politely. "You must really be important to Ash, considering how protective he was of that lure he has that looks like you." Misty blushed at that. The three girls eventually got to Nuvema Town and recalled their Pokemon. They made a stop at Professor Juniper's lab so that they could get upgraded Pokedex, and so that May could be registered for the Unova league. Professor Oak, who hadn't returned to Pallet Town yet was surprised to see the three of them all there. The three quickly took off. The moment they were out of site from anyone in the town, they were teleported to right outside of Striaton City. As they were mostly stripped of their minds at the moment, they couldn't wonder how they got there so fast. After a Gym battle that May won, the three went to the Pokemon center, as it had become night time again. Minutes after all three had fallen asleep, the necklaces teleported to the next people to wear them.
155211211.title: Gatherings

choices: Third batch: Anabel, Angie, and Lyra (reserved by Starfighter364)
Meanwhile, with Misty, May, and Dawn

1552112111.content:
Ice is a character that I made up for the sake of this story.

-Altomare-

Latias was walking around in her Bianca form. During the time since Ash had left, she had learned how to speak like a human while in human form. She had also been training her nephews and niece (The two Latios and the Latias shown flying around at the end of Pokemon Heroes) to be able to protect Altomare. She had finished teaching them a long time ago, but she has had no idea where Ash was. She gave a sigh, and then the pink necklace appeared above her and landed on her head and bounced off of it.

"Ow." She said, rubbing her head. She looked down and saw the necklace. "What's this?" She picked up the necklace, and got the urge to put it on. However, since she's a legendary, she was able to resist the urge. "This has that one Mew and her friends' names written all over it." Mew appeared in front of her.

'Hello Latias!' Mew greeted.

'Alright Mew, what's going on?' Latias asked mentally, crossing her arms and tapping her foot on the ground.

'Well you see, it's like this...' Mew began to explain about Ash wanting to travel with his friends forever, and how Mew and her friends decided that the easiest way to do that would be to make the necklaces, and explained what they did.

'So, this means that if I put this on, I will be able to find Ash and travel with him forever, but I'll be completely under his command?' Latias asked.

'Yes.' Mew replied. 'If you want, I can take it away from you so you don't have to worry about falling under its power accidentally.'

'No, I think I'll go with the choice that lets me be with Ash.' Latias replied, putting on the necklace. Her eyes glazed over. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' Latias took off running, with Mew barely getting over her shock in time to chase her down, making sure to stay out of sight. Latias went to a pier that if she flew straight from it, would take her directly to Unova eventually. She turned back into her true form and took off like a jet, not noticing that a small human boy saw her transform.

-Mahogany Town-

Macy was sitting down on her bed in her house, wondering just what to do, she has no clue where Ash (A.K.A. in her mind, her boyfriend) is. Last she heard he had lost to that powerful trainer Tobias, and had done much better than the opponent Tobias creamed in the final round, meaning he deserves second place. Macy sighed, then noticed the red necklace in front of her.

"What's this?" She wondered, picking it up. She felt the urge to wear it, and she did so, having the same reaction mentioned four times now. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She stood up, grabbed the Poke Balls containing her Ninetails (Vulpix evolved), Typhlosion (same with Quilava), Magcargo, Electabuzz, and Starmie. She ran out the door after leaving a note to her parents telling them that she was heading to Unova. As soon as she ran out of the house she bumped into a guy about her age wearing winter gear despite it not being winter, or cold at all.

"Hello, my dear." The boy greeted trying to be romantic. Macy rolled her eyes, which was impressive considering that they were glazed over.

"For the last time Ice, I don't like you, so stop trying. You're just a guy who gets on my nerves" Macy said, before beginning to walk away. The newly named "Ice" got in her way.

"You wound me my dear, only you can affect my frozen heart." Ice replied, Macy began getting out a Poke Ball. "Why don't we-"

"Starmie, Hypnosis." Macy said simply, calling out her Pokemon, who did as instructed, putting Ice to sleep. "He's so annoying." She walks away and goes to the nearest body of water, after which, she gets on her Starmie and takes off.

-Arrowroot Town-

In the mansion in Arrowroot Town, Princess Salvia was sitting in her room, thinking about the time she switched places with Dawn, and entered a Pokemon Contest. She wished she could get out again, but has no excuse to do so that she knew her butler wouldn't shoot down. While this was happening, the blue necklace was searching for the next person to wear it. It found Salvia, and the consciousness allowing it to act on its own realized that she wasn't affected. It mistook her for Dawn, leaving confusion considering that it saw her with Misty and May, but it went ahead and teleported into her room, right on her lap. She looked at it carefully, before a familiar urge overtook her, and she put on the necklace.

'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She thought, standing up. She began to heading to the exit of her mansion, when her butler stopped her.

"My lady, where are you going?" The butler asked her.

"I am going to another region to travel, I must be able to understand the common people if I'm to rule." She said simply. "And with going to another region I can hide my identity."

"Absolutely not!" The butler declared. "I don't know where this absurd idea came from, but I shall not allow it! You will... be allowed to do as you wish..." The butler finished in a monotone as Mew used her abilities on him just like she did Misty, May, and Dawn's family. Salvia went to a store, bought clothes like the ones she wore when pretending to be Dawn, and took a private boat that her family had to head to Unova.

-Meanwhile, back in Altomare-

"But mommy, I really did see a girl turn into Latias!" The boy mentioned earlier said.

"Now son, you shouldn't make up things like that, no one will take you seriously when you're telling the truth if you do." The boy's mom replied. Bianca walked by.

"That's her mommy!" The boy exclaimed running up to Bianca. "Latias! I'm happy to meet you!" Bianca stopped and looked at him.

"What?" Bianca questioned, nervous. "I'm not Latias, my name's Bianca." The boy's mother grabbed him.

"I'm sorry, my son claims he saw a girl turn into Latias, and then said it was you that did it." The boy's mother apologized. "Kids have such active imaginations."

"No problem, he just surprised me, but he should be careful saying things like that." Bianca replied. 'And Latias should have been more careful, I'll have to talk to her about this.'

-Spear Pillar-

The legendaries from last chapter were gathered.

"Ok, we have to do something, this is getting out of hand really quick." Arceus said, starting the meeting. "Latias, a fellow legendary is among the affected."

"Actually, I've kept my eyes on my "mother"." Mewtwo replied, still having issues with calling her that. "And I saw her explain to Latias what would happen. Latias chose this, and that Macy girl wished to travel with Ash and would have done anything for him anyway, so the only issue is Salvia, to which I'll point out it seems she was chosen because the consciousness of the necklace mistook her for that girl, Dawn, meaning it was only doing what the wish stated."

"You know, the fact that you can argue cases for why this is ok really scares me." Ho-oh replied, looking at Mewtwo.

"Fine, I'll let this go, but we have to get this situation under control, and stop girls from falling under the necklaces powers." Arceus replied in an annoyed tone, before dismissing the meeting.

15521121111.content:
The necklaces teleported away the next day, searching for their next victims.

---

Anabel was sitting down on a chair at the Battle Tower, waiting for challengers. She sighed, as no challenger had actually managed to give her a decent battle, let alone defeat her since a certain trainer from Pallet Town that she developed a crush on. She wished she could have gone with him, but she was unable to due to not having anyone to take over. The red necklace appeared out of nowhere and landed right in her hand.

"What's this?" She wondered aloud, before getting the urge to put it on, which she did. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She thought, standing up. She grabbed the Poke Balls containing her Espeon, Alakazam, and Metagross, and then headed to the door, only for Scott to come in.

"Ah, Anabel, just who I wanted to see." Scott greeted her. "The Battle Frontier is temporarily closing, as there has been a decline in decent trainers taking part. I'm sorry if this inconveinces you."

"Don't worry, I actually wanted to leave to find and travel with Ash, and now I have the chance." Anabel replied, not telling him she was going to go and find him anyway, even if that the Battle Frontier wasn't closing temporarily.

She left the building and used her Alakazam to teleport to the nearest ship heading to Unova.

---

Angie was getting ready for a day of working at her parents' daycare in Solaceon Town, when the blue necklace appeared out of nowhere, and landed at her feet. She bent down to look at it, and got the urge to put it on, which she did.

'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She picked up Luxio's Poke Ball (her Shinx evolved), and left her house to find Ash, not even bothering to tell her parents, luckily, Mew took care of any problems from that, before teleporting her to the same place Anabel went to get on a ship to Unova, out of site, of course. Seeing as she couldn't think, she didn't wonder how that even happened. Both girls borded the ship at about the same time after getting tickets. They were given the same room. Anabel found it first, followed by Angie. The two locked eyes, and both knew that the other was a fellow servant to Ash.

"Hello, my name's Angie." Angie said.

"I'm Anabel." Anabel replied. "So, you're heading off to serve Ash too?"

"Yes I am, how do you know him?" Angie asked. With that, the two girls pretending to know what they are doing currently, despite not being able to think, started talking about how they met Ash.

---

Lyra was walking around New Bark Town. She sighed thinking about Ash. She got a crush on him while they were traveling together, and considered calling and asking her father if she could continue traveling with Ash and friends, but then Khoury impressed her so much that she started crushing on him, and since she knew that Dawn also liked Ash, she went back to Johto with Khoury, however, Khoury didn't like her like that, only wanting to be friends, and the crush didn't last too long, with them just being friends, as Khoury didn't even realize Lyra had had romantic feelings for him. She then became depressed that she left Ash's group, although she didn't show it. She was so lost in thought that she didn't see the pink necklace appear, and fall to the ground in front of her until she tripped over it and fell to the ground.

"Ow, what was that?" Lyra wondered as she turned to look. She say the necklace, which she got the urge to put on. Like all the other girls she did. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She took off, with her Marill, having the Poke Balls containing Girafarig and Chikorita with her. Everybody who may try to stop her had a little mental visit from Mew to keep them from doing so. Lyra got to a body of water and took off on Marill, island hoping to keep it from getting exhausted.

---

The Legendaries from before were gathered again.

"Alright Mewtwo, what are you going to say in favor of what's happened this time?" Arceus asked, knowing he's going to have something up his non-existant sleeve.

"The situation is the same as in the first set of girls." Mewtwo replied. "By the way, I don't see why you care, as you don't care for most humans."

"Simple, I don't want this to be on a group of Legendary Pokemon's head, as that could cause all sorts of problems if this goes too far." Arceus answered.

"Then don't worry, it soon won't be on a group of Legendarys' heads, as I've got plans set into motion to make it so that Ash is the one who would choose what happens, meaning that other Legendarys won't be able to complain to us." Mewtwo replied.

"How so?" Arceus asked.

"Once he has the necklaces, they will be his responsibilities, and with the whole saving the world several times thing, there's nothing other Legendary Pokemon could complain about." Mewtwo replied, crossing his arms as he effectively ended the discussion, as the others couldn't counter that.

155211211111.content:
As usual, the next day the necklaces teleported to the locations of the next victims, but this time Mewtwo influenced their direction so that they would head to Unova, so that the girls affected would be able to meet up with Ash before the necklaces teleported again. The pink one, in fact, appeared right where Ash's group was, and landed right in front of Iris.

"Huh? What's this?" Iris wondered aloud, picking the necklace up, getting the urge to wear it. Everyone looked towards her

"That looks neat!" Axew said cheerfully.

"That necklace appeared out of nowhere... What a mysterious taste." Cilan commented.

"Well, I'm putting it on!" Iris said cheerfully, giving in to the urge to put it on. 'Must serve Ash. Must serve Ash.' Went through her head, instead of the previous version, since Ash was right there with her. The mantra faded away, since she was with him, but the power still held.

"Iris, are you ok?" Ash asked. "You seemed to blank out for a moment there."

"Yeah, I'm fine." Iris replied. "There was no reason to be worried, I was just wondering where this necklace came from." She lied.

"Well then, let's hurry on! I want to get to Nimbasa Town!" Ash replied.

"Trust a little kid like you to be so impatient." Iris teased.

"Please stop calling me a kid, and the tournament is only one day away!" Ash replied in a frustrated tone. "If we don't hurry, we might not make it!"

"Alright, I'll stop calling you a kid." Iris replied. Ash, Cilan, Pikachu, and Axew all looked at her in shock.

"That was too easy." Ash said suspiciously. "With all the times I've tried to get you to stop, why would you listen now? What are you up to?"

"Nothing, I'm just in a really good mood." Iris lied, subconsciously trying to deflect suspicion away from the necklace.

---

Bianca was running towards Nimbasa Town, hoping to compete in the tournament, another hope was that she would get to see a certain trainer, minus most of his clothes, again.

'I sure hope Ash will be there.' Bianca thought. 'I'm surprised that no one has figured out that I keep knocking Ash into water on purpose, I mean, it would be next to impossible for me to have done so every single time that we meet.' At this thought, she tripped over the blue necklace, which had appeared in front of her. "Owww." Bianca moaned, she then turned around to see what she tripped on. She picked it up, and began to put it on before even getting the urge. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' She got up, and ran off in the direction she had been going, since she could tell that he was heading that way.

---

Georgia was sitting down at a table in Nimbasa Town, eating a meal. Suddenly the red necklace dropped right on top of her head, bouncing off of her hat, and landing on her table.

"Ow. What was that?" Georgia wondered, rubbing her head. She then saw that it was a necklace and picked it up. "Where did this come from?" The she got the urge and put on the necklace. 'Must find and serve Ash. Must find and serve Ash.' Georgia then began to stand up to run to find Ash, only to realize that he was heading in her direction, and that it would be easier to just wait for him.

---

24 hours later

Ash's group walked into Nimbasa Town, excited about the tournament, when they heard a familiar voice.

"Out of the way, out of the way, out of the way!" Bianca's voice called out as she came running towards the group, crashing right into Ash, and sending him right into the water. Bianca and Iris locked eyes and both instantly realized that they both were in the same boat. Ash got out of the water.

“Why do you keep running into me, Bianca?” Ash asked, frustrated. Bianca looked at him, and, like Iris, the fog cleared from her mind since she had met up with her new master.

“Well, isn’t this an interesting situation.” A familiar voice said, as everyone turned to see Georgia walking towards them, her mind clearing up. Iris and Bianca locked eyes with her, and Iris became enraged.

“No! Why you too!” Iris said loudly in an angry tone. “Why do I have to serve alongside a little kid like you!?”

“I’d say that temper tantrum makes you more of a kid than you claim I am.” Georgia replied with a smirk that made Iris even more angered.

“What do you think she meant by serve?” Luke asked, looking at Ash and Cilan in confusion.

“I have no idea.” Cilan replied. “The mysterious taste has gotten even stronger.”

“What do you think, Bianca?” Ash asked.

“She was referring to serving our new master.” Bianca answered, causing everyone but the arguing girls to look at her in confusion.

“What do you mea-” Ash began, before being cut off as he was glomped from behind by Dawn.

“Ash!” Dawn exclaimed in joy as Misty and May followed behind her, all three of their minds clearing up. “We finally caught up with you!”

“What are you three doing here?” Ash asked in surprise. May and Dawn pouted and Misty looked annoyed.

“We come all this way to be with you, and this is the greeting we get!?” Misty said in an angry tone, hiding how hurt Ash’s response made her.

“I didn’t mean it like that!” Ash explained in a hurry, not wanting Misty to be upset with him. “I’m really glad to see all three of you; in fact, I wanted to travel with you three again, I’m just surprised to see you.” The three girls’ expressions cheered up at that, as all three blushed.

“Ash, shouldn’t you stop those two?” Bianca asked, pointing towards the still arguing Iris and Georgia.

“How can I stop them?” Ash asked. “There’s no way they’d listen to me with how much they argue.”

“Trust me, they’ll stop if you tell them to.” Bianca replied. Cilan raised an eyebrow at this.

“Well, ok.” Ash replied. “Iris! Georgia!” Both girls turned to look at him.

“What?” Both asked, sending each other glares out of the corners of their eyes.

“Please stop fighting.” Ash replied, hoping for the best.

Both shot each other a glare, before saying “Fine.” At the exact same time, turning away from each other with sour looks on their faces. Ash, Cilan, and Pikachu looked on in shock.

“Ash!” A female voice familiar to Ash and Misty shouted, causing both to turn towards it, Misty gritting her teeth.

‘Oh please no, not her.’ Misty thinks in frustration, as Macy ran up, and like Dawn, glomped Ash, but from the front. Misty locked eyes with her, and got a look of anger as she saw that her fears were correct as Macy’s mind cleared up.

“Macy?” Ash asked in surprise. “Why does it seem that the girls that I’ve met are all coming here?” He wondered aloud.

“Ash!” Another voice exclaimed, as everyone turned to look in its direction, and a figure that Ash and Misty recognized grabbed onto his right arm, hugging it.

“Bianca?” Both asked.

“Yes? What is it? And how to you know my name?” Bianca asked, directing the last part to Misty.

“Not you.” Ash replied. “This girl’s also named Bianca.”

“Not quite.” Latias replied. “Although I can understand why you made that mistake, since I couldn’t speak your language the last time we saw each other.”

“Latias!?” Ash and Misty shouted in surprise at this new information.

“You might want to be quiet about that.” Latias responded as her mind cleared up. “Imagine what would happen if the wrong person found out since I don’t have a trainer.” She locked eyes with the other girls

“Would somebody please explain what’s going-” Cilan began, before another voice cut him off.

“Sir Ash!” Salvia shouted as she ran up to him, her mind clearing.

“Another Dawn?” May asked in confusion as Salvia locked eyes with the other girls.

“Not quite.” Dawn replied. “This is our friend, Princess Salvia.”

“A princess!?” Everyone who didn’t know exclaimed.

“Where are they all coming from?” Luke wondered aloud as two more figures ran up.

“Ash!” Angie and Anabel shouted, causing everyone to look towards them.

“Angie and Anabel? You’re here too?” Ash asked in surprise as the two’s minds cleared up, before another voice called out.

“Ash!” Lyra shouted as she ran up and hugged Ash’s left arm.

“Lyra?” Ash and Dawn said in surprise as said girl’s mind cleared up. All of the girls locked eyes, and Lyra got a confused look on her face.

“Why are there two Danes?” Lyra asked.

“First off, it’s Dawn, not Dane!” Dawn replied. “Second, that’s actually princess Salvia.”

“What’s going on here?” Ash wondered aloud.

‘I can explain.’ Mewtwo replied telepathically as he teleported in.

1552112111111.content:
"Mewtwo?" Ash and Misty questioned in surprise, recognizing him.

'Indeed.' Mewtwo responded telepathically with a nod.

"Who's that Pokemon?" Dawn wondered aloud as she used her Pokedex.

"Mewtwo, the Genetic Pokemon. Mewtwo is said to be a clone of the Legendary Pokemon Mew." Dawn's Pokedex informed.

'... How that device had any information at all on me is something I'm going to have to look into later.' Mewtwo commented.

"Such a mysterious Pokemon, I feel an intense taste from this!" Cilan declared, before going on a rant about how amazing Mewtwo seems, before crying out in pain as Misty pulled on his ear.

"Alright, that's starting to get annoying." Misty stated.

"Thank you!" Iris said with a sigh. "He gets so annoying sometimes."

"Anyway, Mewtwo, didn't you say you could explain what's going on?" Ash asked, trying to get them back on task.

'Yes, that's why I'm here.' Mewtwo replied. 'Ash, a couple nights ago, do you remember the wish you made before going to sleep?'

"Yeah, but how do you know about that?" Ash asked.

'I've been keeping an eye on you for the most part since our last encounter, just in case you need help, since you seem to attract danger like food attracts a Snorlax.' Mewtwo replied.

"Yeah, that's true." Misty deadpanned as Ash sweat dropped.

"What was this wish?" May asked.

'Ash was depressed about not being able to travel with you, along with Misty and Dawn, and he wished that he could travel with the three of you forever.' Mewtwo replied. 'Little did he know that the Millennium Comet had been hit by a meteor and knocked off course. Jirachi heard the request, and contacted the Mew I was cloned from, along with the Manaphy that sees you as his mom, Azelf, Uxie, and Mespirit.'

"What could they do?" Dawn asked.

'I want you all to draw your attention to the necklaces that Iris, Bianca, and Georgia are wearing.' Mewtwo replied. They all did so, with the girls mentioning putting on necklaces that looked like those necklaces, to which Mewtwo revealed the necklaces abilities.

"So, the reason that they came to find me, and that they will do what I say is because they have been forced to, with absolutely no say in the matter..." Ash said in a depressed tone. A couple of the girls moved to comfort him.

"It'll be ok Ash, no need to worry." Dawn replied softly. Ash sighed in sadness.

"How do I know that the reason you said that isn't because the necklace made you say it?" He asked.

"Simple." Latias began, causing everyone to look towards her. "Did you tell her to?"

"No." Ash replied.

"We're only forced to do things if you order us to do so." Latias explained. "Since you didn't order that girl to comfort you, that means she did it on her own. Also, I chose to do enslave myself to you." With the exception of Mewtwo, everyone's eyes went wide as they turned their heads to her.

"...What?" Angie voiced the confusion they were all feeling.

'I'm a legendary Psychic type; do you really think I'd fall under a spell by Mew's power that easily?' Latias asked. 'Any powerful psychic, whether they are a Pokemon or human would be able to resist the urge to put on the necklace, although only a legendary psychic could resist the power of the necklace upon wearing it, unless they were weakened enough. I willingly put on the necklace after Mew told me what it does, and I allowed the necklace to bind me to your will.'

'But why?' Ash asked.

'I wanted to join you, but I had no idea where you were. The necklace allows anyone under its power to track you down at any point in time in order to serve you.' Latias explained. Ash opened his mouth to speak. 'Also, I was planning on becoming your Pokemon in order to keep anyone else from catching me anyway, so I really saw no reason to refuse giving up my ability to say no to your orders.' She finished with a shrug as Ash closed his mouth.

'Yes, and with the exception of Georgia and Princess Salvia, every girl here has romantic feelings, and wanted to travel with you anyway, but either had reasons keeping them from being able to do so, or didn't know where you were.' Mewtwo added.

"Then why were we involved?" Georgia asked, crossing her arms, an annoyed expression on her face.

'The princess because she looks like Dawn.' Mewtwo began explaining. 'The necklaces have a consciousness, and the one that enslaved her mistook her for Dawn, so it was just doing its duty. You, on the other hand, were targeted since I directed the necklaces to Unova in order for Ash to obtain them.'

"Ok, but why me?" Georgia asked. "Why not someone else in Unova?"

'That was just the necklace choosing someone from Unova at random.' Mewtwo replied.

"Great, so this means I'm bound to someone I don't love." Georgia muttered. "There goes my chance at a love life." Ash looked depressed, while Iris silently seethed, her earlier order preventing her from throwing some biting words at Georgia for hurting her previously secret crush emotionally.

'Not quite.' Mewtwo replied, to which everyone turned towards him. 'The necklaces connect your hearts to Ash's, which means that you're going to start falling for Ash. How long it takes isn't set in stone, as it will greatly depend on his actions.'

"Quick question." Lyra interupted, everyone's attention turning to her. "What happens if a relative of Ash's puts on one of the necklaces?"

'That person shall be enslaved, but will not gain romantic feelings for him.' Mewtwo replied. He was about to continue his previous explanation, when he was cut off

"Wait a minute!" Anabel exclaimed with a panicked look. "Shouldn't we do something about the necklaces before they teleport again, and we have more girls in this situation!?" Iris, Bianca, and Georgia, began to hurry to get the necklaces off, before being stopped by Mewtwo.

'Hold on. Now that Ash has been informed about the situation, everything that happens with the necklaces is his choice, so long as he doesn't lose them, as him having them in his possession is the only way to stop them from teleporting.' Mewtwo explained.

"Then let's hurry and give them to Ash!" Iris said quickly.

'I have a suggestion for Ash about how to use the necklaces though.' Mewtwo replied.

"Why would I want to do this to more girls?" Ash asked. "It's not fair to them!" Unknown to him, that concern about what happens to the girls accelerated the process of Georgia and Salvia falling for him, as both got light blushes on their faces while looking at him, however, Georgia realized this and shook her head.

'No! This is just the necklace causing me to fall for him!' Georgia thought to herself. "I have to keep my mind clear, I can't think about how hansom he looks. No! Snap out of it!'

'You've run into many female criminals.' Mewtwo began. 'The world is literally better off with them being your slaves, instead of commiting crimes.'

"Yeah, I remember." Ash replied. "I'll agree to it."

'One more thing.' Mewtwo said, eyes glowing, as he flicked his right wrist. Everyone suddenly shook their heads as knowledge passed through their minds.

"What was that?" Misty asked afterwards.

'Something has been wrong lately.' Mewtwo replied. 'something caused every human on the planet to suddenly believe that Pokemon can only know four moves at a time. Also, Ash's knowledge keeps resetting to an earlier point a little after coming to a new region. I've fixed those, along with from some help of reality bending, courtesy of the other legendaries, I've made it so that the girls won't get pregnant unless you both want them to, since you are a male with many slaves who will do anything you tell them to, so long as it doesn't bring intentional harm to you, or alter who controls them, this will probably be needed eventually.' Several girls blushed. Misty walked off, tears in her eyes, but Ash was the only one to see. He followed her.
---

"Misty, what's wrong?" Ash asked, coming up to Misty, who was crying outside a Pokemon Center. "This is because of having to serve me, isn't it?" Misty shook her head.

"No, I'm glad I can be with you forever." She replied through her sobs. "It's just, now you're going to have all those girls with you, so much prettier than me, who will do anything you want them to... where will that leave me? I'll just end up pushed to the side."

"Who says you aren't pretty?" Ash asked.

"It's true, my entire life, I've always been told that I'm ugly, and that I can never be as beautiful." Misty replied. "I became a tomboy because I knew there was no hope of me becoming as beautiful as them, so I figured I shouldn't even bother trying to get someone to fall for me, but I fell in love anyway! What's worse, you obviously don't love me, since I spent so much time fighting with you during our travels!"

"Misty!" Ash said. "Most of what you fought with me about was my fault, and you're wrong." Ash kissed her on the lips. "I do love you. Don't get me wrong, but I wouldn't be against you acting more girly to me in some things, but I prefer you as a tomboy. From now on, don't hide the truth from me, act on your desires."

15521121111112.content:
"So, you two want rooms, not only for yourselves, but for your friends?" Nurse Joy asked having to take out a piece of paper and a clipboard to write all this down.

"Yeah, there are 15 humans in our group." Ash answered. Technically, there were 14, but since Latias was in human form, he counted her.

"Well, here are the keys to the rooms." Nurse Joy replied, handing him four keys since there are four beds per room. Ash, Misty, and Pikachu headed to one of the rooms.

...

Ash and Misty arrived at one of the rooms, entered, then closed the door behind them and sat on a bed, facing each other. “So…how are things at the gym?” Ash chokes out, unable to figure out what to do first.

“Oh umm good I guess. Though I’m really much happier here.” Misty explains casually, her face turning red. She quickly gets embarrassed, and would have normally fled or covered up what she wanted due to shyness deep down, before Ash's command to act on her desires took hold, and she got a gleem in her eye. Pikachu seeing this took this moment to quietly exit the room and give Ash a small ‘good luck’ before finally leaving. Upon Pikachu leaving Misty began leaning in.

“Wait, Misty!“ Ash called out, making Misty pause due to him telling her to wait.

"What is it Ash?" She asked in frustration, feeling a dampness in between her legs as her desires continue coming forth.

"What are you doing?" Ash asked. "This seems really sudden."

“I'm doing what you ordered be earlier, master." Misty said slipping a hand beneath his pants and rubbing is penis to get it hard all the while, which was working.

"I don't remember ordering any of this." Ash replied, confused, with a blush on his face. "And I know I didn't order you to call me master."

"You ordered me to act on my desires, and these are them." Misty replied. "And deep down I've always had a desire to roleplay master and slave with you during sex, with me being the slave. That's why I was so hard on you, I was trying to hide it from myself and get you to try to have your way with me." Before Ash could comment Misty used a loophole to the wait command due to the fact that she had waited this long, and closed the distance between them, and locked lips with the wayward hero, and a sudden shock expression grew on his face. Yet instead of pulling away Ash continued to lock lips with Misty and soon the two began exchanging tongues.

Before long the two had to break for air and Ash weakly rolls off of Misty, unaware that he now was holding Misty’s hand in his. A moment of silence past as the two caught their breath before then Ash turned his head to face Misty. The two looked each other in the eye when suddenly the duo stood up and began to strip. They no longer had control of themselves, natural instinct had taken over and in a matter of seconds the two would share one of the most wondrous things about being human.

15531122211.content:
Latias was flying along the shores of Sinnoh, having heard from the other legendaries that this is where Ash was adventuring. Suddenly she saw him, walking with one human she recognised, the squinty eyed one named Brock, and one she didn't, a blue haired female.

As she landed in a clearing ahead of the group and prepared to enter her familiar (to Ash at least) human form, she saw where she had landed. To her shock it was a place that most beings avoid, the Costhenge. The basic premises behind it is that if a being attempts to transform into anything they will be turned into a transformation costume, unless they are already wearing one. A transformation costume turns the wearer into the form of the costume when worn.

As she laid there, she saw Ash's group show up. Ash picked her up and as her last remaining consciousness faded, she was happy in the thought that she will finally be with Ash forever.

155311222112.content:
Ash didn't know why, but he had an overwhelming desire to put on this costume he just so happened to find here in the middle of nowhere. He could feel something tickling at his ears, like a faint voice begging him to put it on.

"Ash what are you doing?" Asked Dawn, who was more than a little annoyed that Ash had just stopped in the middle of the road when he knew that they needed to keep going if they were to make it to town before dark.

"I, uh, found this in bushes." He said and held up the Legendary Pokemon costume.

The other two walked back over to him, looking over the costume with both confusion and annoyance on their faces.

Of course with Brock that was hard to tell.

"A... Latias costume." He said slowly.

"No way! I've heard of Latias! That's my favorite legendary. Please let me have it!" Dawn pleaded with Ash, using both the puppy dog eyes and the quivering lip techniques.

Ash was sorely tempted to give it to her when the tickling returned, causing him to hold the costume even tighter. He was about to say something when Brock stepped in.

"Look you two, now is not the time to be fighting over a costume of all things. Just put it away and we'll deal with it later." He said.

Ash looked at his older friend for a moment before nodding, he folded up the large suit under his arm. He could wait another few hours until he could put it on.

choices: "Go home and have a little experiment, tell us the results tomorrow."
1553121222221111.content:
Naruto frowned as he entered Tsunade's office. For some reason she had requested himself and Shikamaru to come to her office because of some top secret thing, but it had interrupted his ramen time. Shikamaru was in a similar mind set, but his interrupted time was that of his favorite activity, cloud watching. As the two entered the Hokage's office, they both knew something was going on. It wasn't just the fact that Jiraiya was there as well as the 5th Hokage, but the fact that they both spotted a body that they both recognized

"Why the heck did you call us here to look at a dead sound ninja body Grandma!?" Naruto shouted.

Tsunade sighed when Naruto used his nickname of her, but let it slide. "Why I called you two here, is because of a certain reason that involves this body." She replied. "I know you both probably recognize it, but this is the body of the kunoichi of the Sound Five, the flute user."

"And why did you bring us here to look at that troublesome Tayuya's body?" Shikamaru asked, slightly intrigued as to the fact that Tayuya's body showed no sign of injury.

"That's why I'm here." Jiraiya said. "Recently I managed to stumble across a jutsu that allows us to turn bodies of the departed into suits, allowing a person to where that suit and take on that persona, the perfect disguise as long as no one realises that the person is dead."

"And this helps us how?" Naruto asked. "I'm pretty sure that snake jerk knows she's dead right now."

Shikamaru nodded. "Naruto's right, aren't those seals supposed to link them to... him." He said, then widened his eyes in realization. "I see, you want to observe the cursed seal without Orochimaru knowing, so you want one of us to enter the Tayuya suit and observe it's effects, and because she's dead it's no longer connected to him."

"Close Shikamaru, but not quite." Tsunade said. "We want Naruto to try it out for two reasons. The first is that he probably has a better ear for music than you do."

Shikamaru groaned. "Oh yeah, almost forgot about that." He conceeded.

Jiraiya struggled to stop himself from drooling as he said "Also, Naruto has more experience as a women with his Sexy Jutsu."

Naruto groaned. "Of course you would find a way to drag that into this Pervy Sage!" He grumbled.

"I told you not to call me that!" Jiraiya shouted back.

Tsunade sighed. "As disgusting as it is, Naruto, he speaks the truth. So will you try out this experiment?"

Naruto sighed as well. "Sure, but only if I get something out of this." He said.

"How does ramen paid for life at Ichiraku's sound?" Tsunade suggested with a grin.

"Sure, I agree!" Naruto shouted.

Shikamaru sighed, "It's troublesome, but I might as well, too troublesome otherwise." He said.

"Jiraiya, start the jutsu!" Tsunade commanded.

Jiraiya sighed as he approached the body. "This will take a few minutes, Necrosuit jutsu!" He shouted after quickly going through several hand signs.

"By the way Lady Hokage" Shikamaru began. "Why has her body been cleaned up, does it make much of a difference?"

"Actually it does." A new voice, that of Sakura's, said as said kunoichi appeared from a connecting room. "The body has to be completely clean and undamaged in the skin for the jutsu to work, so Lady Tsunade had to take precautions fixing her up."

Tsunade grinned. "It's good to know that you're studying these things Sakura, have you got the extra things prepared for Naruto?" She asked.

Sakura nodded, then whispered to Naruto. "She means a few changes of clothing for any long term experiments, as well as a spare headband, to complete the disguise."

A few minutes later Jiraiya smiled as a small cloud of smoke appeared over Tayuya's body, which then became flat, as if, and rather realistically, all the bones had been removed. "So when am I supposed to try this thing on?" Naruto asked.

The new Amy giggled to herself as she went to the phone to call up Rouge the Bat. Tails slid into Amy's personality, sighing gently as Amy's bubbly personality came through during the call. Rouge answered the phone with a sigh.

"Tails? What is it?" She asked, obviously having read the caller ID.

"Oh, no, its Amy! Tails wanted me to ask you if you wanted to come help him test something that'd help preserve your beauty. I just tried it out, and he wants a larger sample size or whatever that means."

Rouge paused lightly, 'hmm'ing as she thought about it. "I'll stop by in a bit, but I'm gonna want more details when I get there..." She said as she hung up. At that, Amy looked back into the mirror, smirking again as she stretched. "Oh, Tails, I'm so glad you crawled into me... I'm sure Rouge is gonna love it, too." She said to herself, the fox inside of her enjoying being able to animate her mind with his thoughts. It felt less like controlling her directly, and more like having her on auto-pilot... Though she still followed his exact orders, spoke his words and moved the way he wanted to, she did it in her own way. Like her mind was still active, but was completely under his control. Or was it that he was in full control and she was influencing his actions...? She couldn't really tell, but it was fun either way.

Rouge soon arrived at Tails' workshop, Amy becoming giddy with excitement at having Rouge as a suit as she welcomed her in. "Tails had to leave, but he showed me how to work the thing, its dead simple. Just a press of the button." She said, grabbing her hand and practically dragging her over to the chamber as Rouge went wide-eyed, lurching forward as the pink hedgehog began dragging her to the machine. "Just hang on a second, pinkie! What exactly is this thing gonna do?"

She blinked, smiling lightly. "Oh, Tails said that was a trade secret, but that its a formula he designed himself... He said it was like, uhhhh... You know, he said a lot of things that went over my head, actually..." She grinned, posing. "But here I am, cute as ever!" She blew a kiss, smiling. 1553122222412.title: A Device

15531222224121.content:
Jaune was outside wandering around the grounds of the A Huntsman and Huntress school known as Beacon. As a Huntsman in Training, he was one of many students working toward becoming warriors to face the forces of darkness known as Grimm. It was dangerous work, but it was a dangerous world. Unlike the other students, Jaune did not have prior training. He forged his way into Beacon through fake transcripts. It was only dumb luck that he passed initiation. That and his partner saving his butt. Still, being the weakest student there meant he lost in Combat Classes all the time.

The reason he was walking around the grounds was because of his recent loss and he wanted to cool off.

He kept losing to Cardin, a huge bully, and it frustrated him. Pyrrha, his partner, helped train him and he was improving, just not fast enough. He at least could last several minutes in a fight now instead of being one-sidedly overpowered.

Something shiny gleamed on the ground and drew his attention away his depression.

“What’s that?” He thought and picked it up. It kind of looked like a simple remote with two main buttons. One green and one Red. He had no idea what this was, but it felt important. Like he knew he shouldn’t just ignore it.

“Jaune!”

Someone had snuck up on him and he turned around in shock. His finger slipped and hit the red button. A thin beam of light hit the girl and she began to deflate like a balloon losing all its air. Jaune’s mouth fell open as the girl was left as nothing but a pile of skin and clothes.

Who was the girl?
15531222224121.title: Jaune

choices: Panic. Take her remains and run.
155312222241211.content:
“Oh shit! Oh, shit! Oh, shit!”

Jaune was panicking.

Ruby Rose was like his best friend at Beacon. She was young, got into Beacon, two years early and was friendly, if a little awkward. Just like him. Now she was nothing more than a pile of fleshy skin, black dress, red cape, and combat boots. Jaune believed he might have killed her

1553122222412111.content:
There was no way he could leave what was left of Ruby just sitting there on the ground. In the distance, he heard people talking. Scooping up her skin and clothes, Jaune ran off, careful to avoid anyone. He found an unused and unlocked classroom and dove in. Quickly locking the door behind him. He placed Ruby on the teachers desk and took a moment to catch his breath. Now that he did a bit of running, he mind was finally able to catch up with what happened.

“This remote… thing turned Ruby into this…skin?”

Jaune finally found the nerve to examine her. The skin was smooth, yet stretchy, like a cross between rubber and plastic. There were no eyes or teeth visible and the skin looked hollow. He stuck a hand down her mouth and saw the throat and chest expand. Quickly taking it out, he held her up. The skin skipped out of the clothes and Jaune got a full view. Ruby had always been cute, but the suit was far from it. The only thing that still resembled her was the hair. Looking at her back, there was a hole. He set her down and used both hands to see if it stretched.

It did.

A lot.

He realized he could actually get in there if he wanted. It wasn’t just skin. It was a skinsuit.

Should he try her on or try to turn her back?

Naruto grinned as he opened the scroll he stole, eager to learn as many Jutsu as possible.

I'll pass for sure. He grinned, he was glad he had a thoughtful teacher like Mizuki sensei telling him about this, so he can achieve his dream. Upon looking into the scroll, the first Jutsu he saw was the Shadow Clone Jutsu. He was never any good at clones but it was worth trying out. He practiced a lot, before finally mastering it. Hearing footsteps approaching him, he knew he had to hurry. Before he saw more Jutsu he saw a weird looking seal hidden rather well, which he unlocked, causing a jewel to fall out.

"What's this?" He asked himself, picking it up. It immediately lodged itself onto its head before disappearing, like it was never there. He groaned in pain as he felt himself turn spiritual. "Wh, what?" He asked focusing a bit before becoming solid again. He blinked in confusion. Trying again he turned into a spirit again, this time he saw his own body standing there. He went back in it gaining full control, then he focused one more time and turned spiritual again.

"Cool, I have ghost powers." He grinned. "I'll be a ninja for sure."

"There you are!" Iruka shouted."Do you have any idea what you've done?!"

"Good work demon, I'll be taking the scroll now." Mizuki grinned evilly.

"Mizuki, what is the meaning of this?!" Iruka shouted.

"I'm using this demon to gain power, what does it look like?" He cackled.

"Stop calling me that!" Naruto shouted.

"It's what you are, and you want to know why?" Mizuki smirked evilly.

"No, it's forbidden!" Iruka pleaded but it fell on deaf ears.

"You are the Kyuubi! After the Fourth Hokage sealed you in your new body, you became a demon!" He shouted.

"What?!" Naruto was confused. "Iruka, is this true?" He looked away in shame.

"You had the Kyuubi sealed in you... but you are not the fox." Iruka told him firmly.

"Lying to him will get you nowhere!" Mizuki cackled.

"Leave him alone! I don't care what you say, I'm no demon!" Naruto shouted as he went into his battle pose.

"Whatever helps you sleep at night demon, prepare to die!" Mizuki shouted charging at him.

Ok, this is based on an storyline from an interactive from another site. What about a boy receives an orb from the future, which downloads information into his mind, warning of a zombie apocalypse a few years in the future. The origin of the virus including the location of its creation and identity of its creator is unknown.

The orb was filled with a modified version of the virus that caused the disease, which makes those infected similar to robots, but still organic, and like any meant to heal created from a virus, immune to the original. The boy was infected upon touching the orb, and is the master unit, and is able to infect girls, which also makes them his loyal loving slaves. The boy sets out to save as many as possible, whether by infecting them, or finding the source of the infection before it can be released (which also would make them have to infect others in order to increase his search range).

Those infected by the nanobots have all of their senses, along with their strength, speed, endurance, intelligence, and stamina increased greatly, the boy has those happen to a greater degree. They are also aged up or down to being a teenager if they aren't already, along with gaining a healing factor. The girls breast sizes will be enlarged, and if they are related to the boy, their DNA will be altered to prevent incest. Those infected can alter their appearance in order to look like their normal ages in order to avoid others questioning what happened. They are also immune to mind control, mind altering, mind reading (unless they allow it), being possessed, and having their souls removed (unless it is by their own possession abilities).

Nanobots can be chaneled into Poké Balls and Digivices. Any Pokémon in an infected ball or a Digimon connected to an infected Digivice gets a minor dose of the nanobots even if they are male. These minor infections give the immunity, but not the boosted stats.

Second option, a guy gets a plant that can swallow girls, putting them into pods, which fill with liquid that consumes them, and puts copies of their bodies into another pod, and puts their minds into the copies, but altered to be obedient to the guy, and permanently madly in love with him. If the girl is related to him, her DNA will be altered. The copied body will have lost any disease, injuries, or disabilities, and may have features changed, such as enlarged breasts.

Anything non-organic will be in the first pod, with only the bodies being consumed, thus they will come out of the pod nude. The girls will be able to survive on just sunlight and water, but food itself will still give them more nutrients and energy. The plant has tentacles, that if bit down on, can make it so the person can't move, with their bodies basically becoming rag-dolls until the plant allows them to move. The plant can spew a pollen that makes guys ok with what it is doing, and make the owner ok with using it if they normally wouldn't be.

155332222222121221.content:
Paradise City, a place whose name was at one point very ironic because of all of the conflict and elitism from the students and teachers of many different duel schools, who thought that they were better as people, since they had better cards and better skills due to being able to afford better education. With the help of a young boy named Yuya Sakaki, along with his friends and comrads, who were dubbed the Lancers, everything changed for the better... until one fateful day...

No one was quite sure what the source was, but one day the citizens suddenly found some of their peers walking oddly, moaning, and with their eyes rolled up as far as they could go. Some tried to go to the people who were behaving strangly to see what was wrong, and to help them out, only to have the people attack them, seeming to try to eat them, several people got bitten, and were brought to the hospital to check for infections. Things quickly went horribly wrong, as within hours of being bitten, said people joined the ranks of their infectors, and began biting others. The Lancers quickly responded, and began quarantining the infected, but struggled to find a solution, fortunately, the infected seemed to lose all higher brain function, and thus could easily be outsmarted.

Eventually they settled on one they did not wish, but had no choice. They used their technology, and contacted the other dimensions, negotiating, and agreeing to transfer the people from one of the dimensions (which ended up being the XYZ Dimension, due to already being under repair due to the dimension war recently concluded) to the others, and dropped the infected off in the XYZ dimension, the cutting the connection, so that they couldn't get back, although it could be re-opened so that if any more infected were found, they could be sent through.

The Lancers continued patroling for weeks, unable to find any more infected, until one day, Yuya's girlfriend, and fellow Lancer, Zuzu Boyle, suddenly went missing. Days later, Leo Akaba contacted the other dimensions from the Fusion Dimension, and revealed that the infection was going on in the Fusion Dimension, and that Zuzu was seen amongst them! Even worse, she somehow retained her intelligence, theorized by having three other souls sharing her body, while still having the mindset of the infected. This allowed her to co-ordinate the infected, to devistating effect.

Things quickly went from bad to worse, as Zuzu's dimensional bracelets allowed the infected to jump with her from dimension to dimension, until the Syncro and Fusion Dimensions were completely overrun, and then the full scale zombie invasion came to the Pendulum Dimension, and all heck broke loose. The people of the Pendulum Dimension started getting bitten left and right, making humanity quickly get outnumbered and overwhelmed, in a few short weeks humanity was down to the double digits, with the only Lancers being left being Yuya, Declan Akaba, and Sora Perse.

Yuya tracked down Zuzu and tried to use her retained intelligence to reason with her, and get her to stop. Unfortunately, it didn't work, although she challenged him to a duel. Yuya tried using his dueltaining to try to appeal to the Zuzu he knew, while Sora used the solid vision of his duel disk summon his monsters to keep the infected off of their backs, while Declan watched over the survivors, including his little sister Riley, while monitoring the situation from their base. To their horror, one of the infected got through Sora's defense and bit Yuya.

With Zuzu pleased that Yuya would soon be joining her side, everyone was soon shocked to discover Riley started glowing with a familiar dark energy that they thought was long gone, and went into Yuya, causing him to take on the form of Z-ARC, although unlike previously, it wasn't a monstrous version of Yuya, but instead, Z-ARC's original human form. To everyone's surprise, while Z-ARC took over again, this time he was on humanity's side, and soundly defeated Zuzu, as she didn't have Ray's Natural Energy Cards.

After Subduing Zuzu, and gathering Sora and Declan together with him, Z-ARC revealed his dark powers protected him from the infection, much like with the parasite during the Dimensional War. However the trace remains of both merged with his power and created a new virus in the form of some nanobots that could counter the first, although they weren't sure about any side effects, although he could absorb inanimate objects and re-summon them, break down and absorb metal to replenish nanobots, and have an increase in strength, speed, and intelligence. While understandably distrustful of Z-ARC, Declan realized that spreading the new virus could not possibly make things any worse. They tested it on Declan, Sora, Zuzu, and some other volunteers, and discovered that the nanobots seemed to have no effect on males, but turned females, including Zuzu (whose mind assimilated her counterparts inside of her), who mostly went back to normal, into essentially organic robot love-slaves to Z-ARC, while giving them Z-ARC's nanobot abilities on a lesser scale, and replenish supplies by having sex with Z-ARC while he has his sperm changed to not make them pregnant.

Having their only chances being extinction of humanitiy, or females becoming loyal love-slave robots to Z-ARC, and thus have a chance of human survival, the latter was chosen. Upon female zombie infected being infected with the nanobots, they all transformed like the other girls, but it was immediately discovered that it didn't restore the brain damage done by the mind rotting caused by the virus. Thus they were forced to find other methods...

---

The door to the base closed as a frustrated Z-ARC walked, followed by a happy Zuzu.

"So, Declan, how's it coming along?" Z-ARC asked the prodigy currently working on a metal sphere.

"Almost done, although I wish we had another choice." Declan replied.

"Don't we all?" Z-ARC responded with a sigh.

"So, why are you so upse-" Sora began, only to be cut off.

"I don't mind, Master!" Zuzu said with a beaming smile, tilting her head for a cuteness factor. "I'll be glad to be by your side, especially since your going to make Yuya the one in charge!" Z-ARC gave Sora a look that practically shouted 'Now do you see?'

"Seeing any version of Ray like this is hard, especially since Yuri was my only fragment without romantic feelings for his version of Ray." Z-ARC said. 'Granted Yuya also had feelings for Celina to a slightly lesser degree than with Zuzu.'

"It's done." Declan called out, opening it up and putting it in the path of a laser that he made for the space-time travel for the plan. "Now just put the cards you want to send back inside, close it, and then transfer the nanobots turn Yuya into a master unit, along with the all the memories you can fit, and we'll use your and Zuzu's powers to send it back."

Z-ARC nodded, as he put the deck he'd built especially for Yuya inside, along with Zuzu putting in the cards from her and her counterparts' decks that they didn't have in the point in time the sphere would go back inside as well, and then closing it as Z-ARC and Zuzu put their hands on it (Zuzu's being the one with the bracelets), and closed their eyes, focusing on the transfer of the nanobots and the memories that Z-ARC wanted to send back and that Zuzu wanted Yuya to give her and her counterparts. When they filled it as far as they could, he nodded to Declan, then had Zuzu put her hand with her bracelets on it on the sphere as well.

"Here goes everything." Declan said, starting up the laser, and firing, sending the sphere back in time, to the first point in time where Yuya was alone in between being challenged by The Sledgehammer and dueling him.

Notes:

1. Stargazer and Timegazer Magician will turn into their Pendulum versions upon Yuya touching the sphere, while the original Odd-Eyes Dragon will remain the same.

2. Yuto, Yugo, and Yuri will be transported by Z-ARC, who has been mostly purified by his future self, to Yuya, and then be absorbed by him, giving him their cards, although not giving him doubles of their Dimension Dragons, while giving him their memories, and Yuto and Yugo's feelings for their Bracelet Girls.

3. When Yuya infects someone, he can give them copies of some of his cards (will not give Syncro, Fusion, and XYZ other than the instances I mention), and gives the base forms of the Dimension Dragon to the Bracelet Girls from their respective dimensions (Except for Zuzu, who get's Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon, Harmonizing Magician, Trump Witch, and other Pendulum Magician of the choice of whoever makes a chapter where he gives her some).

4. After one Bracelet Girl is infected, he can use the fact that Ray's mind has been infected to give orders to the others that they will follow, thinking that they are their ideas.

1553322222221222121.content:
Team seven found themselves bound to a strap table with Orochimaru laughing.

"Now sit tight, I will conduct a lot of good experiments on you." He chuckled as he went into the back with Kabuto waiting.

"Kabuto, is it ready?" He asked.

"Almost Lord Orochimaru, your newest creation will soon be complete." He explained

"Good!" He chuckled, the two of them watched as their creation was nearing completion. They waited for thirty minutes before finally it was complete however it looked unstable.

"L...lord Orochimaru, I think we should wait until it's stable." Kabuto mentioned concerned.

"Nonsense, it's perfect, come my creation you have ninjas to play with." He chuckled and released it. But when he did the thing let out a vile gas and attacked them violently.

"Look out!" Kabuto screamed. Meanwhile Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura were trying to escape.

"Damn it, if only we can escape." Naruto struggled.

"Speak for yourself dobe." Sasuke said already freeing himself, he freed Sakura and Naruto before they headed out of Orochimaru's lab, and running for their lives to escape the sound village. Once they left they sighed with relief.

"Where's Kakashi sensei?" Sakura asked.

"We can't look for him, we have to move." Sasuke demanded.

"No, those who abandon their friends are worse then trash, we look for him." Naruto insisted.

"If you want to get yourself killed be my guest, Sakura." He turned to her. Normally she would side with him but for once in her life.

"I'm going with Naruto." She told him. Sasuke scoffed.

"Whatever." He left them behind to head back to the village. Sakura looked saddened and Naruto tried to cheer her up.

"I'm sure he's just stressed, come on let's find Kakashi sensei." He told her, Sakura nodded and the two searched for him. During their search Sakura suggested.

"Let's spit up, it'll be faster and safer." He nodded at her suggestion and the two of them went to look for them separately. Naruto searched everywhere he could, avoiding hostiles as best as he could.

Come on where are you? He thought, but his thought was interrupted as he tripped over something. Shaking his head he saw the culprit to find a weird orb. Curious he picked it up and felt weird as a message popped up in a weird hologram.

"To whom this may concern, if you are receiving this message then my plan to send this orb back in time worked." The man explained "I don't have much time so I'll be brief an apocalypse is coming, the damned are everywhere, humanity is nearly gone. But I refuse to let it end this way, I worked hard for a cure and I found one in the form of this, nanobots. They will render the subject immune to the disease, however it has several side effects." He paused.

"It only works on women, and once infected by the nanobots they become your love slaves doing whatever you want, fixing this was impossible, Those infected by the nanobots have all of their senses, along with their strength, speed, endurance, intelligence, and stamina increased greatly, you the one with the orb has this as well. They will age up or down to being a teenager if they aren't already, along with gaining a healing factor. Their breasts sizes will be enlarged, and if they are related to you, their DNA will be altered to prevent incest. Those infected can alter their appearance in order to look like their normal ages in order to avoid others questioning what happened. They are also immune to various effects." He paused again.

"You the owner of this orb will be the Master, you cannot refuse this you were already infected upon touching this orb, you need to save humanity by finding the source of the infection and curing it or saving as many women as you can. I know this is a lot but you have to believe." He paused when he heard a groan and the image had several zombies appear slowly towards him "Oh no, I have to hurry fast." The message ended there. Naruto blinked in confusion at all of this.

This can't be real, can it? He asked himself, pocketing the orb. He does feel different, but before he can think about this any further Sakura appeared.

"There you are I found him, he's unconscious and he needs our help." Sakura said, Naruto looked at her for a bit. If what the orb said was true then he couldn't wait. He approached her and held his hand out grabbing hers. Before she could question what he was doing she felt a surge go through her, Naruto watched as her bust size grew a bit and spasm a bit before calming down. Sakura at that point knelt before him.

"My beloved Master, how may I serve you?" She smiled warmly at him still on one knee eager to obey him. Naruto blinked, No way, this is real. He thought about what to do next.
