15533222222212221212.content:
This was sureal, he couldn't believe this. Everything the orb told him was true, this meant that it was up to him to stop this apparent zombie apocalypse that was going to happen. 155332222222352221112.content:
"Ok, what am I here for?" Naruto asked, tilting his head in confusion as he walked into a shop that he'd been told to go to by an employee, who told him they had an order for him. "I'm pretty sure I didn't order anything... especially since only the Ichirakus are truly willing to sell me anything that's not expired or heavily damaged..."

"I assure you, mister Uzumaki, this is all legit." The owner, who was standing behind a counter, replied. "My company travels between different worlds and realities, being willing to sell things to customers, and someone has ordered and prepared a gift for you."

"Other worlds...?" Naruto asked, incredulously, a deadpan look on his face, more sure that it was a prank.

"The boy with an energy source that can defy the laws of physics, and who has a demon stuck in his gut shouldn't be skeptical about anything." The owner said, causing Naruto to gain a look of shock and alarm.

"How did-" Naruto began, before being cut off.

"Remember, alternate realities, this isn't the first version of your world we've been to, and we have a database." Was the response.

"But who would have bought me something here, heck, what does this place even sell?" Naruto asked.

"This shop takes in people who have committed crimes worthy of the death penalty, people who have attacked us, our business, and/or stolen our property, or people who want to get away from their lives, whether through not wanting to go on, or to belong to others..." The owner began, all the while, Naruto having a shocked look on his face. "... and convert them in some way. The client in question for this case had a combination of wanting out of her life, and wanting to be with you, as she loves you, but has been too shy to come up to you and let you know."

"What...?" Naruto trailed off in shock. "Someone loves me? I-I honestly didn't think that was possible with how I'm treated. Why doesn't she want her life?"

"She doesn't have a good family life." The owner replied. "The majority of her family members have done their level best to destroy her confidence, due to feeling she's too soft." Naruto looked horrified.

"W-What, why!? Family's are supposed to protect and support you, right?" He asked, the owner looked down with a sigh.

"The key words there are "supposed to."" He said. "That doesn't mean it always happens... Anyway, she also transferred all of her inheritance to you... and, since you are considered an adult due to that headband, you are your own guardian, thus you have rights to all of your inheritance, unless stated otherwise, which includes all of that. That means the only things her father still owns are things he's already willed to her sister, and many of his personal belongings. He no longer even owns his home, or land, since she was the clan heiress and officially next in line to inherit those." Naruto began gaping as his brain tried to process that.

"Th-Then who is she?" Naruto asked, trying to wrap his head around the situation.

"I'll show you right now." The owner said, with a nod. "Miss Hyuga, your new master is ready to see you!" He called out, looking at a doorway.

"Affirmative." A female voice called as the shy former heiress, now robot servant of her crush, walked out, a confident sway in her step, and a pleased look on her face. While she usually wore a pair of dark blue pants, blue open-toed boots that went just a little above her ankles, and a heavy tan jacket with her clan's symbol just below the shoulders and fur around the waist over a black fishnet shirt, hiding her curves, she was now wearing grey shorts, with darker grey open-toed boots that went just below her knees, light grey leggings that went up to just below her shorts, a lavender vest with lines going down, and a sash that was a shade of grey between that of her leggings and shorts wrapped tight around her stomach, making her breast size far more noticeable. Her hair was grown out to close to her butt. The only things that were the same about her outfit were the wrapping on her right leg, above the leggings, where her kunai pouch was strapped on, and that her headband was still around her neck.

"Wait, you're Hinata, from my class. You love me? Since when?" Naruto asked, trying to be discreet in his checking her out.

"Since you saved me from those bullies as a child, master." Hinata replied, giving a smirk as she saw him trying to avoid being noticed to look at her. She shifted her position a little, thrusting out her chest a little to draw his attention to her mounds. "Really, master, did you really not get this, you now own me, and every inch of my body. If you want to check me out, at any time, that's your right."

"Wow, you're personality is so different now." Naruto said in surprise, trying to wrap his head around what was going on.

"When I had myself converted, I had tweaks made to my personality, in order to make me more confident, and willing to encourage you to do with me that you wish." She replied. She sashayed up to him, wrapped her arms around him firmly, pulling herself into him tightly, causing her breasts to be pressed up against his chest, and put her head beside his, with her mouth right against his right ear. "Anything I can give you that you desire is yours..." She whispered in a breathy voice, causing a certain part of his autonomy to stiffen as he blushed a shade of red normally on the face of the girl embracing him as she then snuggled her head into the crook of his neck.

"But, how can being turned into a slave cause that?" Naruto asked.

"Ah, right, I forgot to mention." The owner began, drawing the attention of the two teens. "Hinata knows this already, due to her signing up for it, but we don't technically turn the girls into our slaves in the way you're thinking. We turn them into living dolls, organic robots, and skinsuits. Hinata here had herself made into a robot."

"That's right, this has given me photographic memory, an increased thought processing speed, immunity to Genjutsu, accelerated healing, my body being more durable, my muscles being able to exert more force, thus making me stronger and faster, and not being able to get tired as easily." Hinata explained.

"Yes, you won't really get this, but in context, what she went through is a slightly improved version of what a scientist named Gero did to a brother and sister in another reality. We actually have several versions of the sister in stock for each different kid of product, if you want to buy her." The owner commented.

"Wait, if he did that to her, then what's the difference in how she was?" Naruto questioned.

"Because, I said it's an improved version." Was the reply. "They didn't have the healing or immunity to mind control, and they didn't have to loyalty properly programmed in that we put in. This led them to kill there creator, and, in several realities, devastate humanity." Naruto paled in horror at the thought of the loss of human life on that kind of scale. "However, out process doesn't give them infinite energy or an energy barrier while Gero's did."

"Anyway," Hinata began. "I also bought several new outfits, including some outfits like a maid uniform and a bunny-girl outfit, in case you want to see me in them, several toys you may want to use on me for fun, and had several techniques from some of the future versions of me in here downloaded into my brain."

"Wow..." Naruto said, stunned.

"Now, if you want, you can buy more girls." The owner informed. "You actually get a pretty huge discount due to several factors, and can afford to buy another girl or two without the money you got from having Hinata's funds given to you." Naruto looked curious.

"What kind of girls are there?" He asked.

"Well, there are girls from this universe who haven't been born yet, as well girls from a wide variety of universes, who will be adapted to be able to function properly in this reality, since most universes don't have chakra. In fact, in a universe that's untouchable to us, this reality, and the others we can use are works of fiction, and there are several girls, who are, in that universe, along with Hinata, voiced by a particular woman if you want to check them out." Was the response.

"Well..." Naruto began.

155332222222352242121.content:
The fate of the world was at stake, Anise the Witch, the counter evil to the Goddess of Mana herself, she's an immortal being that can never truly die as long as the Mana Goddess exists, but the heroes had to try.

"Watch out." Faerie's voice said inside Duran's head as he dodged an attack, blocking another with his shield, Angela used her magic to cast holy light on her while Resiz used her spear to stab at her, she then used a spell to lower Anise's defenses.

"Duran, NOW!" Reisz said, Duran nodded and slashed at her with his tech attack, Anise grunted in pain as she laughed.

"Foolish worms, I cannot die." Anise laughed as she used her dark wave to push them back, Duran grunted in pain as he healed the group with lumina's powers.

"We can't give up, our homes depend on us winning." Duran said.

"Who said anything about giving up?" Angela asked as she cast another spell. Anise yelped in pain as she recoiled.

"Fools, you will pay for your insolence." Anise growled as she summoned a giant black meteor, the three of them worked together to protect themselves, the three of them were hurt but not out.

"Begone witch!" Resiz shouted, Angela used more of her spells as Reisz charged with her lance, Duran coming from up top to slash at her, Anise felt herself recoil again, but she doesn't fall. Still the fight has taken its tole.

"Wretched creatures, but no matter, I can always wait until you die from old age, I am eternal, you're not." Anise cackled, "but before I go, FADE FROM EXISTENCE!" The witch used the last ounce of her strength to blast them with unknown magic.

"What is she doing?!" Faerie asked.

"Goodbye, this will erase you from history itself!" Anise laughed as she went back to her domain to rest.

"NO!" Duran yelled as he used his protection magic, Angela and Resiz stood behind him.

"You dummy." Angela said.

"Better me than you." Duran smiled, Angela blushed but said nothing.

"Duran, we don't know what this will do." Resiz warned.

"Hopefully something I can block, right Faerie?" Duran asked.

"Um.....I don't know, I never saw this spell before." Faerie said. Duran gulped.

"NOW you tell me?!" Duran yelled, it was too late as the spell attacked and hit all three of them, they all screamed in pain but Duran used all of his might to repel the spell.

"I won't.....let you.....hurt my FRIENDS!" Duran yelled, he used every ounce of magic he has to block the attack, causing him to light up while the girls still yelled in pain, suddenly there was a huge flash of light. Duran groaned as he got up, seeing Angela and Resiz unconscious.

"I....I did it." Duran said. "Hey Faerie!" There was no response, "must of been knocked out like the rest of us." He'll worry about that later, he had to help Angela and Resiz, he went to the purple haired girl and blonde haired girl respectively.

"Angela, Resiz!" Duran cried, shaking them awake, he checked their pulses, luckily they were still alive. After a bit the two of them woke up.

"Ugh, my head." Angela said.

"What happened?" Resiz asked, they looked at Duran who sighed of relief.

"Had me worried there, but we did it." Duran said, they looked confused as Duran was worried, something wasn't right.

"Did what?" Angela asked.

"The attack, defeating Anise." Duran listed.

"We did?" Resiz asked confused.

"Er, yeah we did, you doing okay Resiz?" Duran asked, however what she said next shocked him to the core.

"Who's Reisz?" Reisz asked, "and who are you?"

"I would like to know that as well." Angela admitted, "as well as my own name."

"Come on guys this isn't funny." Duran panicked, but they looked more confused, "you're not joking are you?"

"Sorry but I really don't know who I am." Angela apologized.

"Neither do I, can you help us?" Reisz asked. Duran was panicking really hard now, whatever that spell did gave them amneasia.

"Faerie wake UP!" Duran yelled.

"Ugh, Duran you can be so careless sometimes!" Faerie said getting out of her head to show her tiny body with wings, "though you did it, you beat Anise."

"WE did it Faerie." Duran said.

"Aw thank you." Faerie giggled, "but I didn't do much."

"No, I mean yes, but Angela and Reisz helped out too." Duran said.

"Who?" Faerie asked. Duran was really confused now.

"Them!" Duran pointed at Angela and Reisz who were equally confused.

"Who are you two?" Faerie asked.

"We have no idea." Angela said.

"We were hoping you'd tell us, strange creature." Reisz added, they were wary of her, but she came from that nice man and they felt safe with him, trusted him.

"If this is a sick joke, please drop it now." Duran said, they all looked confused together, "I was afraid of that."

"Sorry Duran, I have no idea who they are." Faerie said.

"Duran, what a nice name." Angela smiled.

"I agree." Reisz added, "so who are we?" Duran was panicking and confused, the only thing he can surmise was that spell erased their memories, Faerie's too but only of them, was everyone else effected as well, he had to figure this out.
155332222222352242121.title: Angela and Riesz

choices: Duran went to get help, but unfortunately nobody remembers Angela or Reisz
Duran noticed Angela and Reisz were oddly comfortable around him
Along the way, Duran desperately tries to jog Angela and Reisz's memories
1553322222223522421211.content:
"Let's get out of here first." Duran said, the dark place of Anise still intimidating as ever, Duran motioned the girls to follow and they did so, trusting him completely, they went through the portal and back to their own world as it closed behind them. Faerie sighed in relief.

"I'm glad that's over, now what were you doing there?" Faerie asked Angela and Reisz.

"We don't know, we don't remember anything." Angela said.

"Did we get captured or something?" Reisz asked.

"No, you helped me fight Anise, we're a team, along with Hawkeye, Kevin, and Charlotte." Duran told them.

"Duran, it's only been you four." Faerie chimed in, "I'd recall these two helping us."

"That's just it, you don't and I have no idea why." Duran said.

"So we helped you fight this witch?" Angela asked, "but who are we?"

"Your name is Angela, you are the princess of Altena, the magic kingdom, the Crimson Wizard manipulated your mother in attacking my kingdom of Valsena!" Duran explained.

"That's awful, I'm sorry." Angela said.

"It's been resolved, we stopped the man and returned your mother to normal." Duran assured.

"Oh, what a relief." Angela smiled.

"What about me?" Reisz asked.

"You're Reisz, princess of Laurent, your kingdom was attacked by a witch named Belladonna, who controlled Nevarl, she also kidnapped your brother Elliot, but she gave up and returned your brother when her plan failed, the Crimson Wizard and the Darkshine Knight......my father took care of them and Goremand." Duran explained.

"Oh, I'm a princess too." Reisz mentioned.

"Looks like we're both royalty." Angela nodded, "and you say we helped you?"

"Yeah, but I have no idea why Faerie doesn't remember you at all." Duran said.

"I'm really sorry, but I have no idea who they are, or what you're talking about." Faerie said, "the queen of Altena never had a daughter, and the prince of Laurent is an only child, the amazons asked you to find him."

"What?!" Duran asked, this made no sense, that's not what happened at all, "Faerie that's far from the truth."

"But that's what happened, I don't know who these girls are but I never seen them before in my life, maybe the battle made you stressed." Faerie said.

"Then why do you explain they were WITH me?" Duran asked.

"I don't know, maybe Anise kidnapped them to turn them into her minions." Faerie said, "but we certainly can't leave them here, we have to help them."

"I am, by bringing them home." Duran declared.

"Thank you for helping us Duran." Angela meekly said, Duran sighed a bit, this is nothing like the Angela he met, nor was it the Resiz he met either, how did this happen, why did that spell give them amnesia, why does Faerie think they don't exist anymore, these are questions he needs answers too, and fast.

"We appreciate your kindness, we'll follow you wherever you go." Reisz smiled at him, Duran sighed again.

"No problem, I'm sure someone will help you remember." Duran offered, the two of them nodded and followed him, Faerie went back inside his head to rest, he was sure Angela's mother or Elliot will remember them.
1553322222223522421211.title: Duran began telling them who they are while fin...

choices: Duran notices Reisz and Angela getting more affectionate while waiting
While they were waiting Duran notices all traces of Angela are gone
Valda summons the waiting heroes to her
15533222222235224212111.content:
Duran didn't know what to do, he had two amnesiacs traveling with him and Faerie doesn't even recognize them, but he had to fix this somehow, his first stop is to Altena, surely Angela's own mother will recognize her, after being controlled by the Crimson Wizard and nearly trying to kill her.

"Does this place look familiar at all Angela?" Duran asked as they approached the cold area of Altena.

"No, I'm sorry." Angela said.

"I don't recognize it either." Reisz mentioned, "I take it this is her kingdom?"

"It is, her mother is queen." Duran said, the Altenian mages stood by on guard.

"Oh hi Duran." The female mage said, "how's the hero king?" It was weird how friendly they all are now, it seemed like yesterday that bastard wizard caused this kingdom to attack his home.

"He's doing well, I actually came to see the queen, her daughter wants to see her." Duran said, but the answer he received wasn't one he was expecting.

"Duran, are you feeling okay, the queen doesn't have children." The guard mentioned. Duran's mouth gaped and pointed to Angela.

"Her, your princess!" Duran furiously said.

"Do you know who she is?" The guard asked the other.

"Nope." The other female mage said, "I think you're confused Duran."

"I know I'm not, let me speak to the queen, she'll sort this out." Duran pleaded.

"Okay, if you insist." The guards shrugged. He went to the queen who smiled at him.

"Ah, the hero who freed my mind, words still cannot express my gratitude, how is the hero king?" Queen Valda asked, was it him or was she blushing a bit, nah that's ridiculous, right?

"King Richard is fine." Duran said, "Your majesty, do you recognize this girl?" Duran asked pointing to Angela, the queen looked at her and shook her head.

"Sorry, I never seen her before." Valda said.

"She's your daughter." Duran said, "please try to remember." Valda shook her head.

"There is nothing TO remember Duran, I am without child, always had been, though admittedly if I had a daughter I'd like her to be as lovely as her."

"Thank you your majesty." Angela smiled, "I'm sorry for the mix up, I don't know who I am, and this man said I'm from here."

"That is very terrible, I hope you recover your memories soon, but sadly he is mistaken." Valda insisted.

"No, I trust him." Angela shook her head.

"Your loyalty is admirable." Valda smiled.

"Can she at least stay?" Duran asked, "maybe something, ANYTHING will help someone remember her?"

"Again there is nothing to remember her, but your insistence on this tells me you are not delusional nor are you pulling a prank." Valda said.

"I don't know who I am either, this man said Anise the witch cast a spell to cause us to be this way." Resiz brought up.

"Hmm, Anise you say?" Valda hummed, "it is possible her sorcery is capable of such things, very well I'll do what I can to help, perhaps we can solve this mystery of why I don't recognize the girl you claim to be my daughter."

"Thank you your majesty, I'll go try Laurent now, surly Elliott recognizes her." Duran suggested.

"Prince Elliott is an only child, at least from my perspective, if what you say is true, going there will be fruitless." Valda said.

"No...." Duran was stunned.

"I'm sorry, but I'll do what I can to help, we might need the mana goddess." Valda mentioned.

"Of course!" Duran smiled.

"I still don't get this, but if anyone can help it's certainly the mana goddess." Faerie said

"Thanks again for helping us." Resiz said hugging Duran, Angela joined in the hug.

"We're lucky to have you in our lives." Angela smiled, they nuzzled him a bit causing Duran to blush and Valda to giggle, probably the only time he's glad she doesn't recognize her own daughter, he'd be executed for sure for this.
15533222222235224212111.title: Duran went to get help, but unfortunately nobod...

choices: Valda thinks she might know of a cure
Valda has no idea how to fix them and tells them to ask the mana goddess
Valda already talked to the mana goddess
155332222222352242121112.content:
Duran sighed again as he waited with Angela and Reisz next to him, he really hoped Queen Valda can help out, or at the very least have a plan of action, the mana goddess is his best bet but he wants to run through all other options first, no need to rely on the mana goddess if this can be a quick fix, but this is Anise he's dealing with, still there is hope, there just has to be. Angela and Resiz were leaning on his shoulder with content smiles, he dare not disturb them, he didn't have the heart to, whatever Anise's spell did, it changed them. Not only do they have amnesia, but everyone else doesn't know who they are, also they are oddly close to them, trusting his every word, staying by his side even being affectionate towards him, if the situation was different Duran would be flattered but, this isn't the real Angela and Reisz, these two are shells of their former selves, blank slates.

"What the?" Duran asked, his thoughts were interrupted at the scenery, there were pictures of Valda but nothing on Angela, she's the princess so she had to have SOMETHING, but there was nothing, no traces, no anything, he tried asking the guards but all they would say is they had no idea what he was talking about, a pained expression emerged as he realizes Valda is right, as far as everyone is aware they don't exist anymore, whatever Anise did caused them to not only lose their memories, but erase them from history itself, the only question is, why is he immune, could blocking that spell with his own magic have anything to do with it? If so, then why do Angela and Resiz cling to him, if only he knew more.

"Is something wrong?" Angela asked, her head on his shoulder looking at him, Reisz as well, Duran felt warm but he shook it off, now wasn't the time to give into teen hormones.

"There's no trace of you here, your mom is right, that spell Anise cast somehow erased you from history itself, on top of giving you amnesia." Duran said.

"So, we're like this because of a spell?" Resiz asked.

"Yeah, but don't worry, I'll do everything I can to fix this." Duran assured.

"Thank you." Angela smiled, Resiz as well as they still leaned on his shoulder.

"You're doing so much for us, if there's anything we can do to repay you, feel free to ask." Resiz smiled.

"Er....that's okay, helping you is enough." Duran blushed, damn hormones, but he can't take advantage of them, he won't.

"What will happen if there is no cure?" Angela asked.

"I......I don't know." Duran admitted, "I'm the only one who remembers you it seems so, I guess I'll have to take care of you."

"I'd like that." Angela warmly said.

"Me too." Resiz added, as they snuggled him again, "it helps your handsome."

"Charming too." Angela agreed, Duran gulped a bit, what the hell did the spell do to them?

"Duran?" A female mage asked, "the queen asks for you."

"On my way." Duran told her, he got up with Angela and Reisz as they went towards the queen, hopefully she has good news.
155332222222352242121112.title: While they were waiting Duran notices all trace...

choices: Duran encounters another of his allies along the way
Duran encounters monsters along the way
Along the way, Angela and Resiz act more affectionate towards him
1553322222223522421211122.content:
"Your majesty, I trust you have good news?" Duran asked as Valda looked upon the three heroes waiting in anticipation.

"I'm afraid not, in all my years in studying magic, I have never encountered anything like this before." Valda informed him, "I don't know how to fix it I'm afraid."

"No." Duran said.

"So, we can't ever go back?" Angela asked.

"Well I never said that, the mana goddess can help after all, I trust you can find her?" Valda asked.

"She should still be at the Mana Sanctuary, but we'll need the elements' help to get to her again." Duran said.

"Their powers have dwindled after the destruction of the mana tree, the goddess herself is weakened, I don't know if she CAN help." Faerie said as she got out of Duran's head.

"So it's possible we might be stuck like this?" Resiz asked.

"I don't know." Faerie said, "it's weird how a spell can erase you from existence like this, but on the off chance we can't fix this, what do you plan to do Duran?"

"Like I said, I'll have to take care of them, it's only right." Duran said, he honestly can't think of anything else, they had nowhere else to go, nobody recalls they even exist, damn that Anise.

"You're very kind." Angela smiled.

info.brief_description: The boys of anime/video games somehow control the bodies/minds of girls from their series.
info.description:
No gay/lesbian stuff or incest, unless it is canon. If a guy is possessing a girl, and another girl knows it's a guy in the body, then this can be ignored. Romance between a boy in a girl's body and a boy in their own body is ok, but if that is used, then the boy must stay in the girl's body permanently.

The Britannian Royal family from Code Geass is a massive exception to the incest thing, not only due to them being in a mindset that would encourage it, but it's been outright mentioned before that at the very least Lelouch was in love with with Euphemia at some point.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

Stick to the story that's going on, don't switch it all the sudden without any explanation.

A boy in a girl's body must be referred to as a girl as soon as it is revealed that they are in a girl's body (and vice versa in the case of a body switch).

A boy's mind can't be altered by any of the stuff used to do the options, beyond making them ok with, or willing to using the abilities or objects.

If there is ever a debate on the gender of a character, then ask me, and I'll decide. Characters that are counted as female:
Haku (There is no way that Haku is a boy in my opinion).

The Super Smash Bros. series can't be used for body switch stories lines inside this story, if you want to make a body switch story for Super Smash Bros, then check out my story Super Smash Bros Switch.

If someone ends the story, I'll either remake the chapter so that it isn't over, or get rid of it if it isn't usable at all.
